Experience with new customer development","- 福利制度：◆ 優秀的人才值得好的待遇，Festo每年依照市場情況，修改薪酬理念，以確保有足夠的條件去招攬市場人才：

column1: 1. 依照職位敘薪原則，提供具競爭力的薪資待遇
2. 依照不同職級，規劃出不同類型的獎金
3. 對於後勤單位，每年年底撥補年終獎金作為犒賞
◆ Festo尊重與遵循當地法規，依照勞基法的規定足額投保保險，保障員工權益
1. 足額提撥勞保/健保/新制退休金
2. 另有公司團保規劃，眷屬一同享受保險福利
3. 意外險等險種
◆ 除了良好的薪酬規劃之外，員工活動亦是Festo關心的一部分，因此我們每年度規劃一系列的員工福利制度：
1. 年度國內旅遊
2. 員工慶生會
3. 家庭日
4. 成立職工福利委員會，讓員工享有更多福利
5. 年度尾牙舉辦
◆ 訓練發展，好的訓練發展規劃，將讓員工與公司一併成長，Festo於大中華區的總部(上海)規劃一系列的必修與選修課程，提供員工快速進入並適應自動化工業產業。
1.新人業務職前培訓，讓業務新人直接到上海接受最直接的職前訓練，除了可以學習到業務技巧/ 商務談判/ 行銷手法之外，更能直接體會到Festo的文化薰陶。
2.專業訓練：訓練部門每月依照需求提供不同的選擇課程，員工可依照需求報名
3.外部訓練，依照不同的部門需求，我們提供相對的外訓支持。
◆ Festo依照台灣市場狀況，提供多元化的請 / 休假制度，讓員工可以依照個人需求使用休假：
1.平日上班時間為08:30~17:30，中午休息1個小時，上班時間可彈性調整提早或晚到30分鐘。
2. 公司施行週休二日
3. 新人入職滿一年，提供優於勞基法的帶薪年假使用(12天起跳)
4. 一年30天的病假中，前7天為不扣薪的全薪病假
◆ 除了具競爭力的薪資、良好的休假制度以及訓練系統之外，另外也規劃了許多補助供員工申請，其中包含：
1.結婚禮金
2.生育津貼
3.旅遊補助
4.住院慰問金
5.公務手機通話費補助
6.出差加保旅遊不便險",https://www.104.com.tw/job/3cfnj

2023/11/22,System Engineer,台灣昕諾飛股份有限公司,"We’re looking for a System Engineer to join our Professional Project Team in Taipei.

Working for Signify means being creative and adaptive. Our culture of continuous learning and commitment to diversity and inclusion creates an environment that allows you to build your skills and career. Together, we’re transforming our industry.

As the world leader in lighting, we’re constantly ahead of the curve. Through our leadership in connected lighting and the Internet of Things, we’re breaking new grounds in data analytics, AI, and smart homes, offices, cities and more!
Signify is one of the few companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder: doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025.
As a System Engineer you’ll be responsible for :

•    Work with Architecture Manager and Proposal to support pre-sales activities: system design and illustration, BOQ generation, attending customer meetings as technical support, drafting commissioning plan;
•    Work with Project Managers for project delivery planning and execution;
•    Lead system commissioning process and SAT;
What you’ll do

column2: Develop detailed design for the relevant programmable building blocks of the solution to deliver;
Review/ verify the control design, schematics and drawings delivered by the Technical Designer;
Build mock-ups to test inter-operability and/or features of the sub-system;
Perform remote and on-site commissioning;
Provides technical expertise in sales presentations, product demonstrations, installation, and maintenance Fix issues upon the request of the Architect Manager;
Preparation of system testing and turnover documentation including scoped documents, test records, test procedures and other similar required documents;
Oversee and coordinate 3rd party Subcontractors as required;
Participate in system turnover walkdowns for both Construction and Customer; initiate, track and resolve punch-list items for assigned areas of responsibility;
Develop, train and deploy user instruction/ manuals to customer organization during handover;
Work with all Stakeholders in the creation of quotes for architectures selected, system additions and upgrades;

column1: Your qualifications

column2: Diploma/Degree in Electrical, Electronics, Instrumentation, Control or Computer Engineering;
Fluent in English;
Be flexible with working hours (with compensation);

Knowledge and experience in indoor or outdoor lighting control systems or protocols such as DALI or DMX, telecommunication systems and networks, field communication bus such as BACnet or Modbus, are added advantages;
Knowledge and experience in Windows server setup, API application, LAN network and cloud application, are added advantages;
AutoCAD knowledge;
Take initiative, accepts responsibilities and has a sense of urgency;","專案經理,專案管理主管,專案業務主管",待遇面議,全職,台北市南港區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,不拘,大學以上,電機電子工程相關,不拘,不拘,不拘,,"- 福利制度：多元性

2023/11/16,倉儲專員 (Warehouse Associate),日煙國際製造股份有限公司,"本招募持續開放中，直至確定人選為止
部門： 供應鏈及生產管理部-倉儲單位
工作地點： 台南市, 台灣
直屬主管： 倉儲經理
職位： 正職員工
職務內容—目的
任職者負責倉庫中所有物料往來的即時及準確性，以確保物料庫存的正確性。該職務人員須負責確保安全與正確的保存物料，以及所有運輸往來皆在倉庫IT系統中精準地記錄。
您的工作 – 職責
倉儲管理
-針對所有入庫的物料進行入庫及出庫需求，並確保所有物料的數量及正確性。
-根據發票、交貨清單及進貨確認資料去準備正確的交貨文件。
-及時及準確的控制物料管理，以提供正確的物料週期。
-所以卸貨、裝貨及物料管理及製造部的物料問題皆須按照計畫並即時準確執行。
-將所有物料入庫並放置在倉儲，防止任何受損，遺失及偷竊。做好所有維護工作去保護物料品質並維持倉庫良好的整潔。
系統
-在倉庫IT系統中準確紀錄所有異動情形，例如物料領取、入庫、庫存差異、存放位置及物料發放。
類別
-確保倉庫IT系統中登記的所有數據與實際數量相符。並依據物料進出規律及存貨數量的規律進行必要的登記及記錄於其他相關文件，報表等。
-遵循文件管理流程及存放方式的相關規定。
其他
依據主管交代其他代辦事項。
This job advertisement will remain open until filled.
Department: Warehouse Management
Location: Tainan City, Taiwan
Reporting to: Warehouse Manager
Role: Permanent
WHAT IS THIS POSITION ABOUT - PURPOSE

The incumbent is responsible for in time and accurate realization of all material movements in the warehouse to ensure correctness in material stock and movements (all movements according to the plan).
This person is responsible for ensuring correct and safe ways of material storage and that all physical movements are online and accurately registered in the warehouse IT system.
WHAT WILL YOU DO - RESPONSIBILITIES
Warehouse Management
Picking up and unloading deliveries of all incoming material to the warehouse, confirming quantity and physical conditions of the material.
Preparing correct documentation of deliveries based on invoice, delivery list, and confirming documents of inbound process.
Control in time and accurate execution of material movements in order to provide correct material flow.
All unloading, loadings, material movements, and material issues to production departments need to be executed on time and according to the plan.

Placement of all inbounded material in the warehouse, protecting them against damages, losses, and stealing, making all treatments/maintenance tasks to protect the quality of material, and sustaining a good level of cleanliness in the warehouse.
System

Online (parallel to physical movement) registering of material movements in warehouse IT system, such as material pick up, putting material into the bin, material inbound, stock difference, changing the physical location of material, material issue, and material shipment.
Category

Ensuring that all data registered in the warehousing IT system are equal to the physical quantity in the warehouse. Conduct all needed registrations according to the law of material movements and stored material quantity, as well as all other registrations, lists, schedules, reports, etc. Follow all rules connected with documentation flow and way of storing them.
Other

Manage various tasks and projects as they arise and upon the manager's request.","倉管,倉儲物流人員",待遇面議,全職,台南市安南區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,"日班/晚班，Day shift/Night shift, two days off shifts are required，需輪班",依公司規定,一個月內,1人,1年以上,專科、大學、碩士,不拘,英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,"Excel,Outlook,PowerPoint,Word","商品進貨入庫作業,盤點作業規劃執行,安排出貨管理及統計,倉庫貨物標示╱置放╱盤點,倉管流程訂定與管理,倉儲系統維護與管理,庫存管理規劃作業,商品收貨╱退貨作業,理貨╱揀貨╱補貨作業,簽收╱驗收作業","- 其他：我們要找的對象?

Working for Signify means being creative and adaptive. Our culture of continuous learning and commitment to diversity and inclusion creates an environment that allows you to build your skills and career. Together, we’re transforming our industry.

As the world leader in lighting, we’re constantly ahead of the curve. Through our leadership in connected lighting and the Internet of Things, we’re breaking new grounds in data analytics, AI, and smart homes, offices, cities and more!

We’re on the lookout for forward-thinking innovators with a passion for sustainability. If you match this description, get in touch!
What you’ll do
This role is responsible for SAP PS sales, costs, and profit as per company standards and as agreed in the final order acknowledgement.

Your qualifications

Process-driven with excellent time management skills.

2023/11/16,E-Commerce Key Account Assistant Manager,台灣昕諾飛股份有限公司,"We’re looking for a E-commerce Key Account Assistant Manager/ Specialist to join our Consumer Lighting Channel in Taipei, Taiwan.

Working for Signify means being creative and adaptive. Our culture of continuous learning and commitment to diversity and inclusion creates an environment that allows you to build your skills and career. Together, we’re transforming our industry.

As the world leader in lighting, we’re constantly ahead of the curve. Through our leadership in connected lighting and the Internet of Things, we’re breaking new grounds in data analytics, AI, and smart homes, offices, cities and more!
Signify is one of the few companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder: doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025.

As a E-commerce Assistant Key account Manager/ Specialist you’ll be responsible for E-commerce key account management to drive Taiwan Signify EC KA strategy and implementation based on growth marketing initiatives.
We’re on the lookout for forward-thinking innovators with a passion for sustainability. If you match this description, get in touch!
What you’ll do
Development and engage with EC key customer to build up the trustworthy partnership to achieve growth objective.
Plan and implement business strategy and take ownership of joint business plan with our key E-commerce plate form with our ecosystem.
Optimize the in-shop/ out-off-shop resources for consumer CDJ influencing and enhance the purchase intent to conversion.
Monitor competition by systematically collect and diagnosis current marketplace information on pricing, products, new products, ATL & BTL investment.
Internal and external main focal between E-commerce plate-form, distributor and internal stakeholder
Annual contract, quarterly, monthly and weekly reporting to make sure sales underpin our objective.
Your qualifications
5+ years above EC related experience, MNC preferred.
Bachelor's degree above in business related field
Strong interpersonal skill
Strong Microsoft Office skills- Excel/PPT
Detail orientated and operation hands on
Fact based logic thinking and can adapt to fast-paced working mode.

Our candidate profile is just a guide. We know that many talented people only apply for jobs when there is an exact match. If you don't fit all the criteria but believe this role is for you, we would very much like to hear from you.
What you’ll get in return…

We’re offering multiple opportunities for career development, like mentoring, coaching and stretch assignments, with strong international exposure for dynamic profiles. Learning is fundamental to our culture. Through continuous learning, we are transforming the industry. You have the chance to learn every day, acquire new skills and perspectives through customized online programs, and on-the-job experiences.

- Enhances Subcontracting estimation capabilities by gathering and organizing relevant data.
- Supports projects to ensure that the Subcontracting process is managed in a timely and proficient manner.
- Make the subcontracting strategy in line with the company's development strategy and project execution strategy.
- Manage to formalize and standardize working procedures/processes and templates to improve the efficiency and data consistency.

- Keep good coordination with project teams, CI and other departments to ensure the smooth progress of work.","採購主管,採購人員,發包人員",待遇面議,全職,彰化縣二林鎮,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,5年以上,大學、碩士,不拘,"英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,中文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通",不拘,"專案成本╱品質╱風險管理,專案時間╱進度控管,專案規劃執行╱範圍管理,協商談判能力","- 其他：- Bachelor degree or above, major in engineering or related;

[彈性工作模式]
默克的全新工作模式為員工提供更大彈性，使主管和員工雙方在經過討論後做出最佳工作安排，提升工作效率並兼顧個人生活；依照不同的工作類別、單位及地點，默克提供彈性工作時間、地點及部分工時之選擇。
[多元職涯發展]
(1)多元化的人才發展計畫
人才是默克的最大資產，除了工作中的專業訓練，我們更提供豐富的訓練課程，例如：實體、線上工作技能培訓，或語言能力課程等，從全球總部到當地市場也設有多元的潛力人才或領導技能培養課程。默克亦更投入大量資源與知名顧問公司、機構合作，提供給員工最完整的職涯發展規劃。
(2)多元職能/國際輪調機會
默克非常支持員工在不同職位發展輪調，鼓勵拓展更多職涯可能性，更提供豐富的國際職涯機會，歡迎員工依照自己的生涯規劃與目標申請。
(3)職涯雙軌制
在默克，我們實施職涯雙軌制，讓員工依自己的意願與專長，選擇發展管理職或專業職，無論是想要專精於特定領域，或是有興趣發展管理職能，在默克都可以找到最適合自己的發展機會。

2024/01/16,Tool Service Center Team Lead,歐商_喜利得股份有限公司,"As a Tool Service Center Team Lead in Taiwan, we expect you to not only be involved in technical issues, but also to engage people to work with you. You’ll lead a team which calls for training, developing and motivating them, both individually and as a unit. In fact, we’ll measure you as much on developing your team as on achieving targets.

This position highly impacts our business. Hilti has a culture of delivering the best after sales service as we can to our customers and this position will be responsible for the Repair team in Taiwan. Besides training and developing the team, we expect that this person can influence them to achieve good results in our KPIs (Quality / Cost / Efficiency) and driving optimization of the workshop processes.",經營管理主管,待遇面議,全職,新北市五股區,管理4人以下,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,6年以上,專科以上,不拘,英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,不拘,"工作任務╱業績項目分配,督導人員工作績效","- 其他：•
column2: Understanding / ability to learn and manage the change by adopting new management processes (Quality / Costs / Efficiency/ training of team members); Change agent for lean repair process for the team & active driver of mid to big CIP projects; developing & executing training plans for assigned employees.
Apply Hilti standards for the repair process and Health & Safety.
Be responsible for the application of a Lean approach for the continuous improvement of operations.
Customer oriented and understanding of service operations with proven success record of operational excellence and continuous improvement by collaborating with all cross-functional functions.
Degree holder in Engineering or related disciplines.
Six Sigma Green Belt is preferable.
Minimum 3 years of experience in repair, maintenance, or operations management with previous experience in leading a team.
Fluent in both written and spoken English and Chinese.
Someone with potential and high ambitious to move to next level in their career.
Experience in SAP usage is an advantage.

- 極佳的抗壓性","- 福利制度：Air Liquide 不僅為法商在台投資最大的製造商，也是唯一連續4年榮獲HR Asia Awards -「亞洲最佳企業雇主獎」的氣體製造商。
Air Liquide 傾聽員工聲音、鼓勵員工發展、提升員工體驗。如果你具備好奇心，喜歡接觸不同領域與挑戰、擁有高度彈性來面對解決問題、追求長遠多元發展與自我成長，那你絕不能錯過Air Liquide。你將加入一個安全為核心、重視多元與包容、實踐創新及永續行動的環境，讓你打造專屬的Air Liquide Career。
在Air Liquide，我們有：
■ 開放、擁抱多元的企業文化
■ 重視安全及員工體驗的工作環境
■ 鼓勵與支持人才多元發展及成長
■ 拓展國際視野，與不同國籍與背景的同仁一同合作
加入Air Liquide，跟我們一起成長！#IChooseAirLiquide
你的努力與實力備受矚目：
■ 具競爭力的薪資
■ 績效導向年度調薪制度，薪資再成長
■ 通過內部專業認證，技術津貼上看5,000元 (依職務需求而不同)
■ 員工即股東：以員工優惠價認購法國集團股票，增加被動收入
■ 員工推薦計畫，推薦優秀人才扮演獎金獵人
優於法令的假期，不只休息，更是培養感情、充實自我的好時機
■ 10天特休、8天Air Lquide彈性假，到職即享有 (第一年到職按比例發放)
■ 5天全薪病假，放心看病與休養
■ 14週產假 + 10天陪產假，讓媽媽及伴侶能充分兼顧家庭
■ 子女及兄弟姊妹婚假，不怕錯過家族喜事
讓健康與安全，作為你堅強的後援：
■ 員工團保，涵蓋人壽、意外、醫療及癌症保險。
■ 眷屬團保優惠價，提供父母、子女共同保障。
■ 免費年度健康檢查 + 加購項目優惠價客製個人需求。
■ 防護具及量身訂製耳塞，降低危害風險，保障工作安全。(依職務需求提供)
友善與舒適工作環境，提高工作效力：
■ 信任制的彈性工時及遠距辦公，靈活運用私人時間 (依職務需求調整)
■ 全自動研磨咖啡機、氣泡水機及茶包，讓你無限暢飲
■ 亞東水果日，提供新鮮水果或果汁補充維生素
■ 免費零食小點心，享受下午茶時光
■ 健身房、哺乳室、不定期視障按摩服務及瑜珈等課程
■ EAP員工協助方案，提供法律、財務、身心等諮詢服務，職場私生活不再兩頭燒
■ myVoice 調查，讓集團聽見你的心聲，提升你的員工體驗
運用人才發展資源，提升職能專業、打造職涯舞台：
■ 液空大學：多元主題與多國語系線上課程，隨時充電學習不中斷
■ 輪調文化：鼓勵跨職務、跨國 / 子公司輪調，培養及拓展多元職能
■ 透明、公正、績效導向升遷制度
■ 內部競賽獎勵與績優員工表揚，為你的液空職涯增添亮點
福委會與多元福利，職場生活更有趣：
■ 優渥的國內外旅遊津貼
■ 生日禮金及禮券，慶生續攤沒負擔
■ 三節禮金、禮品及應景活動，找回傳統節慶的回憶
■ 婚喪病生育補助，讓你窩心不傷心
■ 社團活動補助，結交志同道合的朋友
■ 樂活講座，輕鬆吸收生活及旅遊新知
■ 家庭日及志工日，培養親友感情還能為環境永續及弱勢關懷貢獻心力

column2: Ensure to comply with AP and local safety, health and environment standard, fulfill the mandatory safety requirement and activities: safety training, safety meeting, BSP (APT, JSA etc) and all other requirements by AP EH&S and local regulation.
Monitor the serviceability of plant equipment and facilities and ensure they adhere to safety, housekeeping and environmental requirements.

Responsible for all rotation and static mechanical equipment inclusive of compressor, pumps, valve and other mechanical equipments, such as: centrifugal and reciprocating compressors, cryogenic pumps, heater exchangers, pipelines, centrifugal expanders, varying from facilities.

Response to maintenance requirements that could be scheduled or unscheduled/emergency jobs, on 24/7 base, prompt response to requests for assistance and putting in the time and effort to meet our customer’s expectations.
To be familiar with all equipments in plants, maintain all mechanical equipments accurate documents integrity and equipment history database reachable.
Provide hand-on technical skills at the troubleshooting and all related maintenance work or supporting work responsible.
Perform preventive maintenance work and support to implement  MI work, such as SAP PM01-03 tasks, troubleshooting, repair for all responsibly equipment.
Coordinate or assist of supervision the contractor’s work in the facility or shop to guarantee safety and quality and reliability.
Provide technical reports through the specified datasheet or checklist in the system (ERP,SAP) or other model required.
Implement CI (continuous improvement) saving activity, idea tracker provision.
Follow to improve equipment’s reliability and focus on CoNC.

Reporting-Time entry weekly, and prepare technical reports either written or through entries into the resource management system to maintain accurate documentations on the plants, and to provide information for others in the organization to carry out their responsibilities effectively.
Business travel within region is required based on the actual need.

Support CoNC root cause investigation and action plan.","機械工程師,機械裝配員",待遇面議,全職,台南市善化區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1~3人,3年以上,大學、碩士,"機械工程相關,機械維護相關",英文--聽 /略懂、說 /略懂、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,不拘,"機械加工設備之維護保養,機務維修保養,機械產品故障排除檢修,組合裝配機件及安裝與校驗機械,操作控制及故障排除,改善設備問題及功能提昇","- 其他：•

2024/01/15,Service Coordinator,瓦錫蘭股份有限公司,"We are looking for a Service Coordinator, a local point of contact with customers and internal stakeholders in the delivery of Field Services (FS) & Workshops (WS) for Marine Power. Service Coordinator is part of a team managing the daily activities and schedules of MP Parts & Field Services team located in Taiwan. In this position Service Coordinator will be reporting to the FS Operations Manager. This position will be located in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
About the position, Service Coordinator, your role will include the following accountabilities:

column2: Responsible for the successful coordination relating to FS&WS jobs.
Attend in offer reviews, ensure proper handover from Sales Proposal team.
Close cooperation with Resource Managers assigning engineers to jobs.
Act as contact person for the customer during the work order, interact with relevant internal stakeholders.
Liaising with customers to coordinate detailed schedules, parts, tools, authorizations and permits, and to formalize service bookings.
Take responsibility for briefing and debriefing of the engineers before and after the jobs.
Lead and coordinate Field Service activities, including work scopes, personnel, tools, spare parts, schedule, costs, etc.
Issue Tech Requests when applicable.
Implement service follow-up, ensuring customer satisfaction and obtaining feedback, maintaining service record files and KPI's.
Identify and implement improvements through cost efficient means.
Review revenue/cost before invoicing, maintain KPI of the jobs on hand.
Continuously stay up to date with company policies and guidelines.

column1: To be successful in this role, you should have:

column1: 2024/01/15,"Business Development Manager – Solutions, Taiwan (MEA, ES&O)",瓦錫蘭股份有限公司,"Wärtsilä Energy Storage & Optimization (ES&O) is the leading global energy storage optimizer. Our mission is to deliver integrated energy solutions that build a resilient, intelligent, and flexible energy infrastructure - unlocking the way to an optimized renewable future. By integrating renewables, energy management technology, and storage with traditional energy resources, we reinvent clean energy production from the largest and most complex grids to the most remote and essential microgrids. We play a key role in Wärtsilä's vision towards a 100% renewable energy future through flexibility, reliability, and integration for a more sustainable world for us all.

In Energy, we are driving long-term and increasingly profitable growth. This requires excellence and collaboration from everyone in the team. We call this ""Energy Next"". Learn more on the Compass article link for the reorganization news. Changes will drive clearer responsibilities, accountability, governance & performance management.
We are looking for a Business Development Manager – Solutions, Taiwan to join our dynamic, fast-paced, MEA Sales team. The position will be based in Taipei, Taiwan.

The ideal candidate has a successful track record for originating new opportunities and closing deals, a strong market presence, capable of leading teams, influencing stakeholders in an interdisciplinary organization and able to make clear decisions and build commitment to those decisions across the organization. The candidate should thrive in a fast paced, constantly changing environment. This role will report to the Area Sales Director – MEA, ES&O.
Want to join the ride? What will you be doing?
As Business Development Manager – Solutions, Taiwan you will:

column2: Originate new business opportunities and pipeline for energy storage sales projects and agreements.
Screen and respond to Expression of Interests and budgetary offer requests for BESS with the objective of progressing to the firm bid stage.
Work collaboratively with the team members and other internal stakeholders with the objective of closing profitable deals for new build and service agreements.
Promote Wärtsilä products/solutions to create strong market presence and build long-term relationship with existing and new customers throughout the life cycle.
Promote Energy Business strategic objectives and value based selling propositions to support customers' decisions.
Developing successful partnerships with key customers and strategic partners.
Accurately forecast and deliver sales with profitability and risk profiles according to Wärtsilä directives.
Increase awareness of Wartsila products and services and develop tailored business cases and promote the full life-cycle value for the customers.
Accountable for strategy and account planning for the assigned customers
Develop long term customer relationship & satisfaction, by supporting customers in their lead development and decision-making process and ensure high level satisfaction.
Ensuring customer focus, solid understanding of market trends and customers’ business drivers, managing customer relationships and positioning to create trust and demand.
Active participation in negotiations (technical & contractual) and ensure quality aspects related to commercial, technical, risks and compliance are addressed.
Represent voice of customers to internal stakeholders.
Develop a solid understanding of relevant local legislation and the requirements for doing business.
Manage, follow up and report progress by keeping CRM updated.
Drive Wärtsilä Purpose and demonstrate Wärtsilä values.

column2: Demonstrated experience in grid-scale energy storage business development and sales. Understanding of the business environment of Taiwan electricity market, financing, power utilities, independent power producers (IPP), equipment suppliers, and other relevant energy market stakeholders.
Minimum five years of experience in a professional business environment.
Consultative selling skills, ability to understand customer needs and develop a winning solution.
Demonstrated success influencing senior level stakeholders in utility, IPP, or large energy corporate environments.
Proficiency in energy storage business, technology and products, and commercial understanding of energy storage contracts.
Experience and understanding of engineering, construction, and commissioning process of utility-scale assets.
Fluency in English and Mandarin.
Master or Bachelor level education in Engineering, Business or Economics. MBA is considered a strength.
Willing and able to travel at short notice and spend time with customers.
Recognised leader with great ability to build trust and lead high performing teams.

Boundaryless mindset, is happy to challenge status quo and change the game.  Has passion for innovation, and ability to adapt to fast changing market demands and simplify complexity to actionable plans.
Superior skills in communication and negotiation,
Knowledge to use CRM
Appreciates diversity and is able to build psychological safety and inclusion to the organisation
Drives Wärtsilä Purpose and demonstrates Wärtsilä values, Customer Success, Passion, Performance
Successful applicant must be authorized to work in Taiwan without sponsorship.

2024/01/11,Human Resources Generalist,美商ARRIS_棱合股份有限公司,"Reporting to the global head of people and in partnership with local leadership, the HR Generalist will will act as the HR resource to ARRIS Taiwan employees for HR information, coaching, consulting, training, HR processes all other HR related support. Our ideal candidate has human resources experience in a manufacturing or production environment.
As our Human Resources Generalist, You Will:
- Partner with the global director to plan, organize, and operationalize all human resources functions in Taiwan.
- Provide quality consultation and solution to people leaders and employees and aligning HR policies and programs with the business.
- Manage end-to-end local recruitment.
- Develop employee programs and events and promote a positive workplace culture.
- Coordinate the local performance management activities.
- Administer compensation, benefits, and payroll processes.
- Ensure compliance with Taiwanese labor laws and handle reporting.
- Implement all local people initiatives to align with company strategy, budget, and legal compliance.
- Other duties and special projects in coordination with global and local leadership.
You Will Ideally Bring:
- A variety of HR experience; generalist, recruiting, business partner, etc.
- Proven ability to work in a matrix environment, get results and drive change through others.
- Working knowledge of Taiwanese labor laws and regulations impacting employees.
- Excellent written and spoken Chinese and English communication skills.
About ARRIS

Founded in 2017, ARRIS is a global manufacturing technology leader headquartered in Berkeley, California. We launched Arris Composites Taiwan 立合 in 2021, funded in part by Taiwania Capital, Taiwan's national investment arm. By partnering with cutting edge startups, Taiwania establishes partnerships with companies worldwide to boost Taiwan's economic growth.

ARRIS’s revolutionary design, materials, and manufacturing platform lets brands completely reimagine their products. We simultaneously leverage the highest strength and stiffness to weight carbon fiber composites, the game-changing functionality of integrated electronics, and the task-specific properties of metals, resins, and other materials.

Our leadership team includes industry veterans with decades of experience in additive manufacturing, conventional high-volume manufacturing, composites, material science, and industrial automation. 2024/01/11,Advanced Materials Production Engineer,美商ARRIS_棱合股份有限公司,"Arris Composites is seeking an Advanced Materials Production Engineer with an operations and process skill set. When issues arise, you’re driven to figure out root causes with the team and quickly identify potential solutions. When things are running smooth in production, you are still looking for areas of opportunity to improve the overall process flow (faster speeds, better quality, consistent results, lights out operation).  You’re deeply committed to quality and efficiency and have a desire to streamline technical workflows.  You are an organized individual, with the capacity to order and maintain an inventory of raw materials, schedule production runs, and maintain and supply an inventory of finished materials. You can understand a production process and making decisions to maintain, optimize, and streamline production. Your operations knowledge and organizational skills will inform the efficient production of advanced composite materials to meet supply chain needs. You should be a team player with a great attitude, a desire to constantly learn and improve, and welcome constructive criticism and direction.
ABOUT ARRIS

Founded in 2017, ARRIS is a global manufacturing technology leader headquartered in Berkeley, California. We launched Arris Composites Taiwan 立合 in 2021, funded in part by Taiwania Capital, Taiwan's national investment arm. By partnering with cutting edge startups, Taiwania establishes partnerships with companies worldwide to boost Taiwan's economic growth.

ARRIS’s revolutionary design, materials, and manufacturing platform lets brands completely reimagine their products. We simultaneously leverage the highest strength and stiffness to weight carbon fiber composites, the game-changing functionality of integrated electronics, and the task-specific properties of metals, resins, and other materials.

Our leadership team includes industry veterans with decades of experience in additive manufacturing, conventional high-volume manufacturing, composites, material science, and industrial automation. With offices and manufacturing hubs in the United States and Taiwan, we’re transforming the global manufacturing sector and enabling top brands to streamline supply chains, onshore critical manufacturing capabilities, and deliver the most innovative products imaginable.
As Our Advanced Materials Production Engineer, You Will:

column2: Drive mechanical and electrical continuous improvement projects.
Create 2D and 3D drawings for machine components/tools.
Develop and maintain relationships with suppliers and vendors.
Maintain up-to-date inventory for raw and finished materials.
Maintain supplies necessary for materials handling and production.
Schedule machine maintenance and calibration work.
Setup efficient operations and SOPs to start/stop/repair manufacturing line
Maintain, monitor, improve production capability and efficiency.
Troubleshoot process and equipment problems.
Work collaboratively with technical and non-technical team members to achieve shared goals.
Work with a multidisciplinary team in a dynamic work environment.

2024/01/11,Global Graduate Programme 儲備幹部計劃 - Operations (February 2024),英商英美菸草商務股份有限公司台灣分公司,"BAT TAIWAN IS LOOKING FOR A GLOBAL GRADUATE – OPERATIONS FUNCTION
SENIORITY LEVEL: Management Trainee
FUNCTION: Operations
SALARY RANGE: Base Salary + World Class Training + Fast Track Development
LOCATION: Taipei City, Taiwan

Disclaimer: We might not have an open role at this moment, but, because our work environment is very dynamic, we would love to hear from you! We encourage you to apply and the moment we have an opening, the Recruitment Team will contact you as soon as possible.
Anticipating your enthusiasm, please be advised that we expect the recruitment process to kick off in February 2024.

The Global Graduate Programme in British American Tobacco targets to develop graduates into management level position. In our Global Graduate Programme, you will work in a real job context with genuine responsibility; rotate through different functions. The Trainee with proven potential and performance record will be provided excellent career advancement opportunities within the organization after graduation.

The Graduate Talent must meet a series of performance targets during their training period and will be reviewed by every half a year. Failure to meet the predefined standards will mean departure from the programme.
This year, we are looking for Global Graduate Programme in functions of:

•    Operations – The programme helps you develop exceptional commercial skills through rotations and extensive projects. You will fully understand the dynamics of the market you are operating in, and how the Operations departments (Manufacturing, Supply Chain, Quality and Procurement) work together to achieve outstanding business results.
Show us what you’re made of, and we’ll give you:
•    a real job with real impact from day one
•    world-class leadership training and mentoring
•    an array of corporate benefits that certify us as an Asia Pacific Top Employer
•    international travel opportunities across the region
•    2 weeks of incredible training at the BAT Academy in the UK (or virtural) along
with graduates across 40 countries and the global leadership team
•    the flexibility to tailor your functional experience to align with your passions
•    the chance to progress to a management role in 18 months
Qualifications, if you:-
•    are internationally mobile and are looking for an international career in

【安全先行】安全促進宣導及行動、員工安全提報建議，打造職場安全環境

RESPONSIBILITIES:

column2: Act as the technical point of contact for the sourcing, purchasing and inspection of critical bolts, bearings, screws, nuts, springs, etc.  by understanding supplier manufacturing process and how quality risks can be mitigated.
Become thoroughly familiar with the manufacturing process of assigned parts.

Review issues on assigned parts and solve to the root cause, implementing changes at the supplier, at SBS or both, as appropriate, drive further actions to closure, and re-source to new suppliers where appropriate.
Work with procurement and sourcing to find exceptional suppliers and vet them appropriately for quality and engineering capability.
Conduct design for manufacturing (DFM) reviews with selected suppliers to ensure parts are manufacturable per print and customer requirements.
Conduct comparative analysis (CPAL) studies to evaluate and approve suppliers for dual sourcing.
Demonstrate innovation, technical excellence, attention to detail, self-direction and courage.
Drive for results and customer satisfaction by collaborating with teams, leading projects and continuously driving improvement in the supply base.
Create technical prints based on samples or customer requirements.
Maintain supplier database.

column1: PREFERRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:

column2: Familiarity with mechanical testing and properties of materials.
Master's degree in engineering or business.

Knowledge of statistical techniques and methods, e.g., design of experiments, Lean, Six Sigma, etc.

Experience with working with international teams.

As a global leader in patient-focused medical innovations, we offer rewarding opportunities and exciting challenges in a truly international, dynamic and friendly work environment.

We are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive work environment where all employees can grow, personally and professionally. The Solution Consultant provides pre-sales services to both internal and external customers focusing on the implementation and deployment of Plex offerings. The primary focus of the position is to support the Plex Sales Team in working with our Customers on their Digital Transformation with Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) and Manufacturing Operations Management (MOM).

Reporting to the Manager of Solution Consultant, in this position you will be providing pre-sales support (Technical, Operational, and Value oriented) to the Plex Sales force and ensure a consistent and efficient handover to our delivery organization and by that help drive these engagements to a successful closure.

The role requires excellent communication skills and the ability to interact and influence effectively across all levels of the company. In addition, strong commercial, product/service/solution and application skills are necessary. This position requires moderate to extensive travel primarily within region but could include opportunities in our other global regions.

在 Tesla，我們的 Tesla 顧問始終如一地為我們所有當前和未來的客戶提供令人難以置信的教育、身臨其境和令人興奮的體驗。 他們構成了特斯拉的前線，是我們的品牌大使，支持我們通過為客戶創造難忘的體驗來加速世界向可持續能源過渡的使命。
作為 Tesla 顧問，從客戶走進我們的展廳了解 Tesla 的那一刻起，您就將為他們提供支持。 我們創造了有史以來最具創新性的車輛之一，您將幫助提供同樣創新的購買體驗。
Responsibilities:
• 及時、個性化地讓客人走進來，目標是開啟對話並確保他們感到賓至如歸
• 了解我們的客人是誰，是什麼讓他們來到特斯拉，他們的購買意圖和時間表，從而創建一個強大的客戶檔案
• 通過回答客人的問題並根據他們的興趣和議程提供量身定制的體驗來教育和激發客人的興趣
• 展示對所有 Tesla 產品和服務的精通，以及對 EV 車主的當地激勵措施
• 通過收集客戶聯繫信息並為表現出購買意向或潛在購買意向的個人安排試駕，幫助 Tesla 保持健康的銷售渠道
• 定期更新 CRM 系統以確保管理層可以獲得準確及時的銷售和交付信息

• 準備車輛和主持交付預約，包括根據個別客戶的需求和舒適度量身定制的新車主介紹","汽車銷售人員,國內業務,門市／店員／專櫃人員","月薪40,000元以上",全職,台北市內湖區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,不限,不拘,大學以上,不拘,英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,不拘,不拘,,,https://www.104.com.tw/job/87qx1

We strive to create a comfortable working environment and competitive working conditions so that our employees can balance their physical, mental and professional development and actively safeguard their rights and interests. As the needs of our employees are as important as the development of the company, we are committed to providing a humanised workplace and system to fulfil the Taipower Group's promise of caring for its employees.
Human Resources Policy
Integration of labour and capital, friendly workplace, sound career development and benefit sharing.

In accordance with the PEWC Group's Human Resources Policy of ""Labour and Capital Integration, Friendly Workplace, Healthy Career Development and Benefit Sharing"", and based on the business philosophy of ""Teamwork, Excellence and Sustainability"", we create an institutionalized, rationalized and humanized management atmosphere, listen to our employees' opinions and needs, and build a harmonious labour-management relationship and a benefit-sharing work environment, as well as improve employee functions, cultivate and retain excellent talents, and provide our customers with high-quality workplace services with good human resources. We will also improve employee functions, cultivate and retain excellent talents, and provide customers with excellent products and services with good quality human resources.
Remuneration policy is based on the principles of merit, reasonableness and motivation.

Our salary policy is based on the Group's principles of performance, reasonableness and employee incentives, which reasonably reflect the nature of work, working conditions, job rights and responsibilities, expertise and performance, and motivate employees to achieve the goals of high efficiency, high quality and high remuneration.
1) Review the internal salary and external market comparison every year, and continuously review and improve to provide competitive salary.
2. Year-end bonus: We will guarantee one month's basic salary bonus.
3. Annual salary adjustment: The percentage of salary adjustment will be determined in the second half of each year based on operating performance, price level and the level of related industries.
Flexible work schedule system
We have developed a flexible work schedule system that takes into account the needs of our employees and their job characteristics:
Flexible commuting system: to meet the temporary needs of employees.
Extensive weekly rest: To enable employees to take care of their families and personal lives, and to achieve physical and mental balance.

2024/01/15,Clinical Research Manager,美商默沙東藥廠股份有限公司台灣分公司,"Our Clinical Research and Pharmacovigilance team push the boundaries of global healthcare through research and innovation. Through clinical trials and surveillance, we ensure the safety and efficacy of our existing and pipeline products to produce safe, effective, innovative medicine.
THE OPPORTUNITY

This role is primarily accountable for end to end performance and project management for assigned protocols in a country in compliance with ICH/GCP and country regulations, our policies and procedures, quality standards and adverse event reporting requirements internally and externally. For certain studies, the CRM could be responsible for several countries in a cluster.
WHAT YOU WILL DO
Primary activities include, but are not limited to:
- Main Point of Contact (POC) for assigned protocols and link between Country Operations and clinical trial team (CTT).

- Responsible for project management of the assigned studies: proactively plans, drives and tracks execution and performance of deliverables/timelines/results to meet country commitments from feasibility and site selection, recruitment, execution and close out.

- Accountable for performance for assigned protocols in a country in compliance with ICH/GCP and country regulations, our policies and procedures, quality standards and adverse event reporting requirements internally and externally.
- Reviews Monitoring Visits Reports and escalates performance issues and training needs to CRA manager and/or functional vendor and internal management as needed.
Performs Quality control visits as required
- Responsible for creating and executing a local risk management plan for assigned studies
- Ensures compliance with CTMS, eTMF and other key systems in assigned studies
- Escalates as needed different challenges and issues to TA Head/CRD/CQM and or CTT (as appropriate)
- Responsible for collaboration with functional outsourcing vendors, investigators, other external partners in assigned studies
- Serves local business needs as applicable in his/her country (If delegated can sign contracts and manage budgets)
- Collaborates internally with HQ functions and locally with PV, Regulatory and GMA to align on key decisions in his/her studies.  GHH to be consulted as needed.
- As a customer-facing role, this position will build business relationships and represent the company with investigators
- Shares protocol-specific information and best practices across countries\clusters

2024/01/15,Field Service Engineer - Energy Products 能源-FSE客服維運工程師(電機相關科系畢業),台灣特斯拉汽車有限公司,"The Role
主要負責特斯拉能源產品維修與保養，須具備配電配線經驗以及英文溝通能力。歡迎風電、太陽能相關經驗技師應徵。
Tesla is looking for an experienced and dynamic Field Service Technician to work in one of the most progressive companies in the world.
We are seeking experienced service technicians with excellent oral and written communication skills to work within the Energy Products team.
Tesla needs a diversely talented and highly mobile technician ready to move quickly in order to keep our systems fully operational.

The primary job is to service, troubleshoot, or upgrade stationary battery equipment and Tesla charging infrastructures as needed. Applicants should be self-motivated team players with a positive attitude!
As stated, this role will require a significant amount of travel set around the service and upkeep our stationary battery network.
Responsibilities

column2: Troubleshoot and repair equipment as defined by the service engineering team.
Be ready to travel for extended periods of time covering multiple locations.
Perform complex and precise electro-mechanical debug, rework and repair.
Perform tasks requiring a high level of skill and patience.
Operate a variety of hand tools, power tools, diagnostic and measuring equipment (including DMMs and oscilloscopes).
Develop and follow best practices and procedures for various maintenance activities related to Tesla Energy equipment.
Maintain high levels of communication and feedback within the Tesla Energy service organization; prepare daily updates of work completed, problems identified, and future timelines.
Have flexibility to provide support outside your region and possibly outside the country as required.
Perform other related duties as assigned per our growth and diversity across applications.

Actively work across Powerwall and Supercharger sites, ensuring they stay online and performing at an optimal level.","電機工程技術員,電機設備裝配員,電機技師／工程師",待遇面議,全職,台北市內湖區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,週休二日,一個月內,1人,3年以上,大學、碩士,電機電子維護相關,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：Requirements

2024/01/15,"(Senior) Field Service Engineer, Battery Energy Storage Systems",瓦錫蘭股份有限公司,"Wärtsilä is leading the transition towards a 100% renewable energy future. We Wärtsilians help our customers unlock the value of energy transition by optimizing their energy systems and future-proofing their assets. Did you know Wärtsilä has delivered 74 GW of power plant capacity and more than 80 energy storage systems in 180 countries around the world?

In this fast changing world of energy, we are constantly on the lookout for future-oriented talent to join our team and to work towards enabling sustainable societies through innovation in technology and services - together. Want to join the ride?

We are now looking for a skilled (Senior) Field Service Engineer, Battery Energy Storage Systems to join our dynamic, fast-paced Field Service team in Energy Storage & Optimization, Lifecycle Services, Energy Storage & Optimization Business. This is a permanent opportunity, and its preferred locations are Kaohsiung or Taipei, Taiwan.
What will you be doing:
As (Senior) Field Service Engineer, Battery Energy Storage Systems, your work will focus on these responsibilities:
- Perform Commissioning, Field Service, Warranty and/or Agreement related activities according to the work plan.

- Service Technician or Engineer needs to be able to take the ownership of technical deliberations and field service activities and must be able facilitate technical contact point between internal and external stakeholders.
- Participate in development of new working methods within own responsibility area.
- Make analysis with adequate conclusions and recommendations for how to solve complex technical problems of the customer on-site. Report the related work progress to relevant stakeholders.
- Solve complex technical and operating problems of the customer as well as report and propose product improvement needs to reach quality and cost targets and ensure customer satisfaction.
- Create quality Service Work Reports within set time limits.
- Follow up and participate on field tests if any.
- To support in providing advanced applications training for internal local field service resources team.
- Participate in customer meetings as local representative in the electrical and automation and / or mechanical aspects if needed.
- Provide sales support to internal stakeholders as needed.
To be successful in this role, we expect you to have:
- BSc. in Electrical Engineering or Electronics Engineering or any relevant experience in the field of Battery Storage and Solar (PV)
- Electrical & Automation System and solution knowledge
- Electrical & Automation Mechanical System and solution knowledge e.g., HVAC a plus
- Experience with programmable logic controllers, frequency drives, electrical protection devices, computer systems, Ethernet networks, firewalls, OPC-servers, and PLC
- Experience in electrical and/or mechanical installations and commissioning
- Experience in commissioning new power plants as an electrical and automation or mechanical Engineer a plus
- Experience with Energy Storage System
- Leading field tests and developing new products with customers and research and development organizations within the company
- Customer understanding
- Good in Written, and Spoken English
- Fluent in Written, and Spoken Chinese
- Local working permits, certifications a plus and knowledgeable of local regulations
Willing and available for travel (domestic and international) up to 60% of the time
- Car driver’s license
- Proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point
在瓦錫蘭，我們相信賦予權、所有權和對我們的工作負責。我們支持彼此的成長，共同創造是我們創新的真正基礎。我們有勇氣看到機會並採取主動。
我們是真實的和誠實的，我們堅信一個多元化和包容性的工作社區，每個人都可以成為真正的自己。我們並不總是第一次就做對了，如果犯了錯誤，我們一定要從中學習和成長。
我們希望每個人都能自由發表意見。這就是為什麼我們建立了一個環境，讓您和您周圍的每個人都感到有能力，讓您感到安全和受到照顧。你渴望成為這個雄心壯志的一部分嗎？
您將成為一個在當地開展業務的全球組織的一員，並在一個令人興奮和充滿活力的工作環境中與高度積極和熟練的同事一起工作。我們提供有趣和具有挑戰性的工作任務，以及在一個優秀團隊中的個人和專業發展。
若您對此職務有興趣, 請在 2024 年 1 月 31 日之前提出申請, 請至瓦錫蘭網站了解更多的訊息。

Job Description:

column2: Support the implementation of organization's Human Resource strategy so that the organization attracts, manages, develops and retains the employees it needs to achieve its current and future business objectives.
Manage and/or administer the organization’s compensation and benefit, talent acquisition, training and development and employee relations programs.
Conduct salary market survey, assist salary adjustment during annual salary review cycle and to prepare and deliver communication to employees.
Manages and execute regular payroll process & ensure its accuracy in timely manners.
Calculates the variable pay for employees under supervision of Head of HR (profit sharing, quarterly incentives, etc.).
Responsible for financial audit with regards to compensation and benefits by providing relevant information.
Prepares the compensation and benefits budget, regular monitor and adjust of the budget during regular budget planning exercises.

Closely cooperates and manages the relationship with external partners such as salary benchmarking consulting company, headhunters, manpower agent, tax consultant, payroll partners, government authorities…etc.
Manage talent acquisition end to end process. Including intake meeting, sourcing, interviewing, design offer package, salary negotiation, contract production and on boarding.
Plan and organize training courses and sessions, manage and monitor the assigned training budget.
Support Head of HR to for training and development programs implementation.
Source and manage the internal and external training partners such as training platforms/software supplier or external/internal trainers.
Responsible for executing performance management program/activities.
Responsible for administrating performance management tools and offer user guideline and performance management guidelines to people manager and employees.
Provides process expertise and identifies improvement potential in order to increase efficiency, effectiveness and customer satisfaction.

Responsible for HR digitalization projects.",人力資源人員,待遇面議,全職,台北市松山區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,週休二日,一個月內,1人,3年以上,大學,"商業及管理學科類,語文及人文學科類",英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,"Excel,PowerPoint","執行日常招募業務,員工教育訓練與需求分析,績效與薪酬管理,行政事務處理,報表彙整與管理,勞工保險相關法規","- 其他：Qualifications and Requirements

2024/01/15,Product Sr. Executive - Sterile Goods Management / Operation Room Supply,德商B. Braun Group _台灣柏朗股份有限公司,"Those who begin a career at B. Braun can look forward not only to exciting and challenging work but also to long-term career development.
Our goal is to help shape medical progress together. This means that we are constantly facing new challenges, which we tackle with passion and commitment.

Many who embark on a career at B. Braun remain loyal to the company for decades because, in addition to knowing that their work here matters, they also receive the recognition, support, and encouragement needed for a successful career.
Join us for an exciting opportunity!
In This Role, You Will:

column2: Evaluate market trends, market shares, customers’ behaviors, competitive landscape to identify market opportunities for existing and/or new products/services and educate internal sales staffs.
Executes short and long-term product management strategies and plans for existing and new products.

Together with sales team, perform a range of activities to effectively market assigned products/services, such as conducting market research; setting prices; successfully launching new products; overseeing advertising campaigns; and monitoring sales performance.
Monitor, analyze, and evaluate product performance and customer feedback to generate new product ideas, screen and explore high potential products to complete Business Unit’s product portfolio.
Management of existing product lines and continuously search for new product opportunities ( both B. Braun and external ) and prepare detail market opportunity analysis
Prepare detail and concreate New Product Launch Plan and submit for approval according to its process.

Closely collaborate and work with local, regional, global Demand Planning and other Supply Chain department personnel to ensure right inventory levels are maintained at all time depending on business situation and environment.
Manage Consignment, FOC, Samples, Demo sets and support annual stock count exercise initiated by Finance department.
Ensure all prices of products are well maintained in system and conduct annual price review with Finance department.
Ensure up to date scientific evidence / studies and documentation provided by Region and Global HQ
Conduct routine products/services training programs to strengthen the knowledge and skill of new & existing sales staff and distributors.

Prepare compliance, sponsorship, educational grant and speakers agreements for all organizing events and activities which requires customers’ involvement and must fully comply with B. Braun's compliance policy.
Support product training/seminar/demo/sample trial activities with customers.
Create of promotional materials including local brochures and develop
Cooperate with RA and MA for new product registration and reimbursement application.
Ensure frequent and effective communication with the headquarters in Asia Pacific and Germany.
Protect organization's value by keeping information confidential.
If Business Unit requires due to Gov’t regulation, acquire and manage patient’s data with our implanted devices and keep in proper database.
Responsible for identifying the vigilance suspicion when receiving complaints, completing complaint reporting form in English.
Responsible for reporting to vigilance team when identifying product safety concerns during regular screening of internal journal or any case study.

2024/01/15,Accounting Supervisor,德商B. Braun Group _台灣柏朗股份有限公司,"
column2: Manage the day-to-day Financial and Accounting activities of the organization.

Perform complex accounting activities in accordance with accounting principles and standards to control the organization's financial resources and ensure that it complies with all relevant regulations, laws, and reporting requirements.
Reconcile complex accounts and check the accuracy of journal entries to ensure that the general ledger is accurate and complete.

Check and analyze financial information and prepare monthly and annual financial reports and accounting statements so that the management has accurate and timely information for making financial decisions. These reports may include profit and loss statements, balance sheets, depreciation statements, cash flow, debtor and creditor lists, repayment and accrual schedules, regulatory reports and filings.

Complies with local tax filing requirements by studying regulations; adhering to requirements; advising management on required actions; calculating quarterly estimated tax payments; assembling data for quarterly and annual tax filings.
To ensure all accounting entries are accurate and in compliance with regulatory standards.
Lead the yearly Audit activities and meet Audit requirement by working closely with Company appointed external Auditor.
Provides technical accounting advice by studying operational issues; applying financial principles and practices; developing recommendations.
Updates job knowledge by keeping current with financial regulations and accepted practices; participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications.
Supervise and coach accounting staff to ensure organization’s accounting activities are conducted accurately, ethically, consistently and according to relevant regulations, laws, and standards.

2024/01/09,"Territory Manager, South, Surgical",台灣愛德華生命科學股份有限公司,"Key Responsibilities:

• Serves as main point of contact within own business unit for assigned territory and/or customer base utilizing full understanding of cardiovascular anatomy, pathology and physiology relevant to EW medical products as it relates to the business

• Builds and manages strong, long-lasting relationships with customers and other influencers, expands network in assigned region to push Edwards positioning in the market utilizing creativity and influencing skills with new or existing customers on buying decisions using tact and diplomacy
• Develops and closes new business opportunities , and identifies areas of improvement to meet sales targets while developing and executing annual plan to achieve region objectives
• Other incidental duties

Medical Devices Industry Experience Required",國內業務,待遇面議,全職,台北市中山區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,8年以上,大學以上,不拘,英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,不拘,"業績目標分配與績效達成,業績與管理報表撰寫,客戶情報蒐集,產品介紹及解說銷售","- 其他：• Full knowledge of the strengths and limitations of own products and competitor products
• Develops deeper understanding of own business, medical devices industry and selling environment of own region
• Full knowledge of customer organizations and how market environment impacts customers
• Full understanding of hemodynamic monitoring and/or cardiovascular anatomy, pathology and physiology relevant to EW medical products as it relates to the business
• Ability to manage competing priorities in a fast paced environment
• Strict attention to detail
• Understands customer needs, feedback and objections and explains products to influence customer perception of value
• Utilizes creativity and influencing skills with new or existing customers on buying decisions using tact and diplomacy

• Adhere to all company rules and requirements (e.g., pandemic protocols, Environmental Health & Safety rules) and take adequate control measures in preventing injuries to themselves and others as well as to the protection of environment and prevention of pollution under their span of influence/control","- 福利制度：台灣愛德華還提供以下福利：

我們的文化
在台灣愛德華工作是什麼感覺？
作為以患者為中心的醫療創新的全球領導者，我們在真正國際化、充滿活力和友好的工作環境中提供了有益的機會和令人興奮的挑戰。
我們致力於營造一個多元化和包容性的工作環境，讓所有員工都能在個人和專業上成長。為實現這一目標，我們提供在職發展、培訓機會以及由專門的員工團體（E.NOW、愛德華基金會慈善團隊、可持續發展活動等）提供的支持和指導。
What is it like to work at Edwards Lifesciences in Taiwan?
As a global leader in patient-focused medical innovations, we offer rewarding opportunities and exciting challenges in a truly international, dynamic and friendly work environment.

We are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive work environment where all employees can grow, personally and professionally. To achieve this, we offer on-the-job development, training opportunities and the support and guidance provided by dedicated employee groups (the Edwards Network of Women, Edwards Foundation charity team, sustainability activities, and others).

2024/01/09,Clinical Application Specialist 臨床產品應用專員 (物理師),瓦里安台灣股份有限公司,"*工作地點不僅限於台北，亦考慮台灣其他城市。
1. 應用專員以到院或遠端方式提供客戶臨床應用培訓。
2. 向總部營銷或物理學家團體提供有競爭力的產品性能信息。
3. 協調或領導客戶和/或員工培訓課程。
4. 也可以在研討會，培訓計劃和貿易展覽會上進行大型小組演講。還可以為當地，區域和國家客戶貿易活動提供產品演示。
5. 建立並維持良好的客戶關係。.
6. 必須具備放射治療的知識或背景，並且他們在醫院現場實踐有益。深入了解客戶交付經驗以及過去自己的經驗。
7. 對AI、程式語言(SQL、C、C#、C++、Python、Matlab)有基本的了解尤佳
8. 有放射治療相關證照(醫事放射師證書、輻射防護師證書、醫學物理師證書)尤佳
9. 須精通中文，若精通英語优先考慮。","醫藥業務代表,FAE工程師,業務支援工程師",待遇面議,全職,台北市大安區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,週休二日,不限,1人,3年以上,大學以上,不拘,英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,中文打字20~50,不拘,"- 其他：1. 放射等相關科系畢業
2. 3年以上相關工作經驗.
3. 熟悉癌症放射治療臨床流程。
4. 引導客戶建立或草擬 新的/進階臨床技術的開發與應用。
5. 具備良好的溝通能力。","- 福利制度：法定項目

2024/01/08,Heart Failure - Finance Manager Asia,台灣雅培醫療器材有限公司,"KEY PURPOSE OF ROLE:

Business Partner of Commercial Team to deliver financial commitments to Corporate. Work with other Support Functions (e.g., Supply Chain, Marketing, Shared Services Organization) to ensure operation efficiency and compliance with Abbott policies. Proactive on P&L review and provide recommendations on driving profitability and sustainability of business in Asia.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
Monitoring of Financial Deliverables
-Work closely with the commercial team and other functions (e.g., supply chain, Marketing, finance shared services) to deliver revenue and division margin commitments.
-Review monthly account comparison reports and discuss abnormalities with Country Business Managers.
-Prepare and analyze geography’s profit and loss statements (countries and consolidated).
-Work with the management team to monitor and optimize operating expenses against Plan/Forecasts.
-Partner with Supply Chain in S&OP for the management of product rationalization (product phasing) and short UBD inventory to reduce scrap.
Financial Planning and Analysis and Reporting
-Responsible for the financial planning and analysis and finance related operational matters of the countries(Countries and consolidated).
-Collaborate with the business units to establish the annual budget and monthly/quarterly forecasts, product contribution monitoring, variance analysis and commentary.
-Partner with business units in developing sales strategies that have incremental impact on Market position and Division Margin.
-Assist commercial team with consolidation / analysis of the market intelligence information, including market share.
-Ensure month end closing is done timely and accurately. Liaison person with APAC Regional Office and other functions / divisions (where applicable).
-Preparation of management / financial reports as requested.
Distributor Management
-Support Country Manager/Distributor Manager in review and preparation of distributor agreements to ensure terms and conditions are consistent with business objectives.
-Monitor distributor agreements to ensure continuity of distributorships to meet market demands.
-Consolidate, analyze and track inventory movements (purchase and usage) for key distributors.
Compliance
-Perform revenue recognition and analysis to ensure compliance with GAAP and internal controls (new revenue recognition policies, e.g., equipment leverage deals).
-Provide support to Country Manager/ Business Manager in coordination and preparation of legal agreements and review of agreement performance (Equipment/Products Leverage Deals).
-Support Capital Expenditure Request process.
-Support Healthcare Professionals Sponsorships process.
-Develop, implement and monitor operational policies and procedures for Asia to ensure compliance with corporate polices.
Tender Management
-Analyze tender compliance from pricing and supporting documentation perspectives.
-Monitor the tender contracts throughout its lifecycle.
Others
-Recommend, develop and implement improvements and standards (efficiency, accuracy, simplification) to the reporting and analysis process.
-Continually review and improve operational efficiencies and effectiveness in Asia.
-Being Subject Matter Expert for SAP in HF division.
-Other as hoc projects/assignments as requires (e.g., Division Margin improvement Project).
OTHER FUNCTIONS AND RESPONSIBILITIES
-Handle and process customer feedbacks/complaints/product experience in timely manner and according to Abbott Medical Asia’s and Abbott Medical country’s policy and requirement
-Execute the job responsibilities according to applicable standard operating procedures of Abbott Medical Asia and Abbott Medical Country Affiliate

-Ensure applicable standard operating procedures of Abbott Medical Asia and Abbott Medical Country Affiliate are executed","財務分析／財務人員,財務或會計主管",待遇面議,全職,台北市內湖區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,8年以上,大學以上,"會計學相關,財稅金融相關",英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,"Excel,Outlook,PowerPoint,Word","財務及營業分析,財務策略建議與分析,財務報表分析","- 其他：QUALIFICATIONS:

2024/01/08,APAC - Compliance Specialist II,荷商波士頓科技有限公司台灣分公司,"[Purpose Statement]

The role of Compliance Specialist II is to provide compliance advice and support to franchises across the APAC Boston Scientific business. In this role, you will oversee the review and approval process of the company’s interactions with healthcare professionals across the region to ensure local and corporate compliance policy requirements are met and adhered to.

You will be required to liaise with multiple stakeholders including sales and marketing teams, Asia Pacific countries leadership, functional teams and the company’s global legal and compliance team. You will also play a key role in implementing and continuously enhancing the Asia Pacific compliance program.

This position will be based in Taipei, Taiwan. It will be part of a newly launched Asia Pacific Compliance Centre of Excellence, within Boston Scientific’s growing Asia Pacific Legal & Compliance organization.
[Roles & responsibilities]

column2: Maintain a thorough working knowledge of internal compliance policies and industry code of practice across APAC.
Coordinate with business functions, franchises, global compliance, and external stakeholders to ensure compliance to policies.
Implement, maintain and enhance Boston Scientific’s compliance review and monitoring process of interactions with healthcare professionals across APAC to ensure compliance to company policies.
Perform risk analysis on findings across APAC and work with local stakeholders to develop, implement remediation plans and monitor to ensure effectiveness of the program.
Identify gaps in current processes, develop solutions to enhance the APAC compliance program by collaborating with local and global compliance team.
Learn, understand and keep current with the various APAC medical device industry standards.

column1: [Requirements]
Qualifications and Skills:

column2: Bachelor's degree in a related field.

Excellent analytical skills and attention to detail, with the ability to interpret complex regulations and apply them to practical situations.
Effective communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to convey compliance requirements to stakeholders at various levels of the organization.
Strong organizational and project management abilities, with the capability to prioritize and handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
Proficiency in using compliance software tools and systems.

2024/01/08,Electrophysiology- Clinical Specialist,荷商波士頓科技有限公司台灣分公司,"ABOUT THE ROLE

The position of Clinical Product Specialist, Electrophysiology (EP), provides field/remote clinical, technical & educational support in EP to assigned accounts across Taiwan. The primary focus is to support new therapy introduction of Pulsed Field Ablation through our future launch of the FARAPULSE™ system, demonstrating clinical expertise to influence superior outcomes. Frequent travel will be required.
WHAT WILL YOU BE RESPONSIBLE FOR?

column2: Utilizing your technical knowledge of:

column1: o
column2: The field of electrophysiology (including propagation of electrical circuits within cardiac tissue and the pathophysiology of electrical rhythm disorders), biophysics of radiofrequency, cryo-thermal ablation, 2D and 3D electroanatomic mapping principles to provide:
Clinical support including basic troubleshooting, and clinical guidance to diagnose and treat cardiac arrhythmias.

Provide the measurement of electrical circuits within the heart and perform stimulation protocols as per physician requests to measure the electrical conductivity of the heart to aid in the diagnosis of cardiac arrhythmias.
Develop a deep technical understanding of, and provide the technical training of company products to Cardiac Electrophysiologists, Cardiac Physiologists, and Nurses
Travelling as required to meet customer demand for the services described above.

Attending cases face to face (or remotely) with customers, operating Boston Scientific products where appropriate, and providing detailed training/advice to physicians on clinical attributes/techniques associated with Boston Scientific electrophysiology products including:

column1: o
column2: Providing clinical support for a full range of Boston Scientific EP.

Developing a deep understanding of the workflows and specificities of each hospital & business relationships with hospital personnel (e.g., through informal conversation, meetings, and participation in conferences) to make new contacts in other departments within the hospital and all stakeholders to ensure that products are trained and utilized in accordance with the Directions for Use.
Ensuring timely collection and reporting of all required medical documentation pertaining to our procedural device operation.

Responding to complex customer needs and complaints regarding products and services by developing creative and feasible solutions or working with other related personnel (e.g., sales, clinical, research, marketing, technical support) to develop optimal solutions.
Completion of relevant administration including reporting, stock validations, and inventory management
Attending meetings, conferences, and exhibitions as required to promote Boston Scientific products and services.
Being available to support the broader Taiwan Rhythm Management business on an as-needed basis.

column1: SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS

column2: Previous clinical case experience within electrophysiology/rhythm management essential
Strong technical and clinical skills
Proven experience in building and maintaining customer relationships.
Proven ability to absorb complex technical information, apply this knowledge in the field, and share the experience during the team meeting.
Tertiary qualifications in preferred disciplines including biomedical engineering and science-related disciplines.
Exposure and understanding of conventional EP. Ability to interpret EP signals. Exposure to 3D Mapping or cryoablation. Troubleshooting skills and experience in EP.

【全方位保險】提供員工及眷屬團體保險，並由公司全額負擔保費

== 兼顧工作與生活，樂在工作 ==
【 EAP員工協助方案】提供24小時外部專業諮詢服務，守護同仁及眷屬身心健康

【健康促進】健康促進講座、運動及各項保健宣導
【志工關懷】每位同仁一年8小時給薪志工假，志工服務彈性選擇
【多元共融】委員會定期舉辦訓練、講座及活動，促進性別、年齡、種族、身心障礙及性傾向多元共融
【安全先行】安全促進宣導及行動、員工安全提報建議，打造職場安全環境
【友善環境】孕婦專屬停車位、哺乳室、性別友善廁所
== 暢快學習，發展不設限 ==
【專業職能精進】專業職能課程，技術證照以及定期回訓補助、英文學習補助
【領導力培育】因應不同職級需求，量身打造國內外領導力培訓課程
【內部傳承學習】內部種子講師團隊年度徵選、培訓及回訓補助
【多元企業大學】 線上學習系統，豐富學習資源隨身帶著走
【SPRINT Program】新進人員到職90天學程，入職夥伴(Buddy)支持

【薪酬獎金】每年定期檢視薪資結構、依個人績效及公司年度運營成果發放年度獎金

2024/01/06,R0111867 Associate Key Account Manager- 中區,台灣武田藥品工業股份有限公司,"OBJECTIVE
- Define and implement the new drug access plans in key accounts to accelerate the new listing action in assisting the unmet medical need and patient access expansion of the Takeda portfolio.

- Consolidate account needs, manage resource allocation, and support facilitating cross-functional collaboration internally and externally to develop sustainable business models as the best business partner in the organization.
- Develop a long-term partnership with key accounts and build trustworthy and strategic relationships with key decision makers (KDMs)
ACCOUNTABILITIES
1. Account planning
-Account profiling
1.1 Collect general account information and conduct situation analysis to determine which key accounts in scope.
1.2 Segment key accounts and define different strategy for individual customer segment.
1.3 Clarify customer goals, identify/ prioritize key account needs and define key account value proposition and business objectives.
-Develop and implement account plans based on business target to address complex customer needs.
-Drive growth, monitor the account performance tracking metrics and optimizes resource allocation for the account.
-Managing changing customer profile and keep the data in KAM on-line system updated.
2. Price negotiation & risk management
- Annual public tenders and price negotiation after drug expenditure target (DET) and price volume agreement (PVA) price cut.
- Manage grouping issue, price competition and any unexpected more discount request.
- Estimate price and target impact before each price bidding/negotiation for balancing discount control, product lifecycle maintain and target achievement.
- Develop pricing strategy to minimize the discount rate of key products and protect the reimbursement price.
- Simulate DET price cut impact to each product.
- Actively mitigate the impact of competitor/ generic listing
3. New Listing acceleration
- Cooperate with commercial teams to clarify the target listing hospitals and listing schedule
-Accordance with hospital regulations to prepare and submit relevant listing dossiers
-Under the price threshold of new listing of each account and seek the favorable perspective on own new products
- Observe the situation of competitors and formulate the best new listing plan
- Drug review committee (DRC) call plan
- Cross-Function support to find the unmet medical need and assist patients to obtain new drugs support acceleration
4. Build long-term partnership with key accounts
- Upgrade negotiation from pricing negotiation to trust & value-based negotiation:  creating the value proposition and strategy to help account succeed.
- Navigate shifting stakeholder priorities to build triple win solutions with account decision-makers
- Works with accounts to generate improvements in patient health outcomes
- Leverage regional/head quarter resource to involve key accounts in the regional/ global plans (e.g. clinical trials, drug access plan or other multinational activities)
5. Integrate internal resource to maximize key account growth
- Regular update meeting with leadership team and all cross functions to align critical priorities across marketing, sales, market access and medical to deliver account value
- Maintain expertise in and translate account insights/needs to key internal stakeholders for improved account solutions/resources
- Ensure executive sponsorship and organizational change alignment, communication, enablement and monitoring

- Lead the discussion of issue and opportunity with sales team in individual key account and take the responsibility of all overlapped work areas.","醫藥業務代表,國內業務,國內業務主管",待遇面議,全職,台中市中區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班，09:00~17:30,依公司規定,一個月內,1人,6年以上,大學、碩士,"藥學相關,醫藥衛生學科類",英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /精通、寫 /中等,"Excel,Internet Explorer,Outlook,PowerPoint,Word",不拘,"- 其他：Qulifications:

The Field Ambassador Associate Manager is expected to deliver below business objectives with independent working capability and limited supervision from the line manager

Responsible for the deployment of brand ambassador programs in the field for the HTS category. The job scope includes recruiting, building, training, and managing 3rd party brand ambassador team by coordinating and collaborating with other cross-functions. The brand ambassador role is for HTS product communication/education guides after-sales service across different consumer touchpoints and also supports internal/external events.

New HTS channel development and management: With the market access of the new HTS category, there are potential business opportunities in new and unconventional channels other than existing traditional channels such as CVS and General Trade. 2024/01/05,Finance Analyst - Entity Accounting,傑太日煙國際股份有限公司,"【WHAT THIS POSITION IS ABOUT - PURPOSE】

The incumbent is responsible for the accounting operations of JT Tobacco International Taiwan Corp. (JTI) and Japan Tobacco International Manufacturing Co., Ltd (JTIM).  The incumbent is also responsible for the coordination with General Business Service (GBS) center based in Manila for any General Ledger (GL), Intercompany (ICT), or Accounts Receivable (AR) transaction-related matters that GBS or factory could not resolve; support the development of the accounting process streamlining project via Robotic Process Automation (RPA).
【WHAT WILL YOU DO - RESPONSIBILITIES】
《Financial Accounting and Reporting》

．Keep accounting books in line and comply with JTI accounting standards (IFRS), corporate policies and procedures, Taiwanese GAAP (generally accepted accounting principles), and requirements of the National Tax Authority.
．Support monthly, quarterly, and year-end financial closing including preparation of analysis and schedules necessary for a smooth close.

．Review monthly balance sheet analysis prepared by GBS for local statutory reporting, audit review, and management purposes, as well as proactively identifying and performing timely clearance of aged items.
．Ensure all information is maintained and filed in a proper manner and accessible for future tax and financial audits; be the point of contact for external auditors.
．Proactively support the managers and perform detailed Balance Sheets, Profit & Loss analysis, and account reconciliation within prescribed deadlines.
《​​​​​​​Inter-company Transactions》
．Ensure timely processing of intercompany accounts receivables, including liaison and coordination with other intercompany entities.
．Comfortable holding accounting / financial discussions in English with the ability to problem solve and summarize key issues; ensuring timely and smooth transactional flow is upheld.
．Knowledge of Taiwan withholding tax regulations as part of the intercompany transaction expert.
．Monitor intercompany-related activities performed by GBS.
．Maintain a list of intercompany reconciliations for external auditors.
．Ensure timely and accurate process of inter-company cross charges and receipts
《​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Internal Control and Compliance》
．Offer regular training to end users on any latest changes to the Global Operating Guideline as well as any revisions to local policies and procedures.
．Assist in the execution of internal control compliance and provide guidance to cultivate compliance culture within JTI and JTIM.
．Perform finance-related JSOX control procedures as part of JTI and JTIM entity requirements.
．Support JSOX coordinators for annual key control walkthrough review procedures and global internal audits to ensure full compliance by all the key control stakeholders.
《Accounts Receivable》
．Ensure timely processing of customer invoices and receipts

．Monitor accounts receivable-related activities performed by Customer Service Team and GBS; be the first point of contact for any transaction-related matters AR and VAT that the Customer Service Team and GBS could not resolve.
．Take the lead to liaise and coordinate all AR and VAT-related matters between key business stakeholders in the factory, market, and other intercompany entities.
《RPA Project / Development》
．Support process streamlining analysis preparation, help the managers & team to identify potential risks or issues early, and develop RPA process with the support of external consultants.
．Engage in the new RPA implementation process and coordinate with key functional users, ensuring the project progress on-time delivery in each phase
．Assist the manager & team with a smooth roll-out of the RPA process
