2024/01/05,Customer Engagement Associate Manager,傑太日煙國際股份有限公司,"【WHAT THIS POSITION IS ABOUT - PURPOSE】

The customer engagement associate manager is mainly responsible for building long-term engagement plans in new channels for various audiences. He/she must have strategic thinking as he needs to understand business objectives, explore the business opportunity to broaden touch points, create an engagement platform to enhance customer affinity, and also work independently to build an effective long-term plan. He/she will need to have sensitivity in market dynamics as well as sales data & field feedback to continuously evolve and elevate the engagement platform. He/she will highly collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to ensure all the programs are aligned & executed smoothly with high quality, so he/she is expected to be both a good team player & leader with a flexible, open, curious mindset with an “all possible” attitude.
【WHAT WILL YOU DO - RESPONSIBILITIES】
．Lead the strategy building for innovative approaches to the target audience.

Have a full understanding of the Taiwan consumer segmentation and in-depth knowledge about the organized and independent retail environment. Leverage the knowledge to develop a creative approach on consumer consumer-centric basis to explore commercial opportunities. It requires new idea generation with a holistic view, comprehensive plan development, clear measurement design to bring value back to the company, and execution quality to create an impressive experience among the target audience.
．Lead the long-term engagement platform for the new channel.

Based on company goals & market needs, develop a long-term engagement platform for new channels to enhance awareness & retention for various audiences. It requires long-term strategic thinking, flexibility in program planning & execution with quick response to market dynamics, and creativity in using appropriate tools to target audiences, including digital & non-digital.
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​．Sales data analysis & program result assessment.

​​​​​​​Responsible for analyzing sales data so as to quickly capture market dynamics for program planning. Work with the digital team, field marketing, and field force to collect sales data & engagement tracking in specific channels for future business needs. Based on all the quantitative data & qualitative feedback, adjust the plan according to quickly match the market dynamic.
．​​​​​​​Media & VIP program development.

Work with the corporate communication team for media engagement support, program design, communication content development, etc. It requires the PR relevant experience so as to have a smooth collaboration cross-functionally.
．​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Ad-hoc projects and team administrations.

2024/01/05,Portfolio and Strategy Manager Global Travel Retail,傑太日煙國際股份有限公司,"【WHAT THIS POSITION IS ABOUT - PURPOSE】
The incumbent, working closely with the Head of Portfolio and Strategy, will drive the setting of direction for assigned brands worldwide in Global Travel Retail
and for all other brands in assigned Travel Retail geographies addressing the brand-relevant travelers and in alignment with HQ Brand Groups' guidelines.
The coverage under the responsibility of the Portfolio and Strategy Manager will span over multiple channels & multiple countries (aligned to GTR sales
regions) and will include the strategic and operational management of a portfolio of 100+ SKUs as well as the strategy management of one assigned GFB
worldwide within Global Travel Retail.
【WHAT WILL YOU DO - RESPONSIBILITIES】

．Manage the development of the product and brand portfolio, pricing, trade, and distribution strategies for assigned brands based on HQ Brand Group guidelines, best practices, and market dynamics in order to maximize portfolio/brand performance and ROI.

．Support assortment and pricing analysis for the assigned geographies and brands. Monitor performance and make the necessary portfolio corrective actions where required. The geographic span reaches various channels & various countries to be covered at the same time (aligned to GTR sales regions).

．Be a communication and collaboration hub driving actions with multiple stakeholders. i.e. Travel Retail M&S Operations and Marketing Activation groups as well as managers of Brand Equity, Finance Team, and Strategic Insights in order to ensure alignment and integration of global activities for portfolio & pricing. ．Manage several GTR internal and external stakeholders (brand groups, brand equity, R&D, and GSC) to ensure timely and in-budget implementation of new products and new brand/brand styles within the given geography (multiple countries).

．Remain a main point of collaboration for GTR when it comes to packaging and product development with R&D and NPD GBS. Budget responsibility covers the evaluation and tracking of OTCs for relevant projects and NTM/FG write-off monitoring support.
．Manage the Business Approval Process (BAP) and product/ packaging development process related to the product and brand portfolio for assigned geographies and brands.
．Maintain newly created P-SKUs and SKUs as well as existing SKUs of the relevant brands within GTR forecasting systems ensuring portfolio correctness for each customer.
．Act as GTR PLM Expert. Coordinate activities related to PLM and ensure NPD process smoothness.

．Contribute to the implementation of the brand portfolio, consumer, and trade strategy for the A&SP. Assist in coordinating the development of M&S annual and strategic plan with different M&S Groups in the assigned travel retail geographies to contribute to the final GTR A&SP.

．Work closely with JTI HQ relevant Brand Groups in order to ensure full alignment between GTR Brand Strategies and HQ BG Strategies. 2024/01/04,R0107362 Market Access Manager,台灣武田藥品工業股份有限公司,"OBJECTIVE

The main purpose of this position is to design, develop and implement activities that enable TAKEDA Taiwan to secure optimal reimbursement and realize the maximum potential of patient treatment for current and future pipleline.

Demonstrate leadership through cross-functional communication which aims to establish and maintain optimal registration, pricing & reimbursement and listing (both at launch and throughout the lifecycle of the product).
Facilitate patients’ access to innovations by providing sophisticated evidence, addressing unmet needs and close engaging with key stakeholders.
Accountabilities
1. National Pricing and Reimbursement
-Develop various pricing scenario considering product labeling, patient flow, treatment guideline, current competition status, national insurance policy and product life cycle management.
-Build different business case simulations to gain internal alignment on pricing and reimbursement scop. Through this to facilitate team to achieve optimal reimbursement objective.
-Develop innovative pricing models i.e. risk sharing program, pay for performance, price-volume, price capping,  etc…and calculate ROIs
2. Evidence Based Payer Value Proposition
-Translate insights to innovative payer value propositions
-Identify evidence requirements and design the clinical trials to support value story
-Test value story across key stakeholders
-Build relevant, solid value arguments with supporting health economic and budget impact analysis (BIA) models
-Generate PE/HTA reports or conduct CEA model studies
3. Analyze and Shape Payer Market for Pipelines
-Initiate burden of illness studies to understand patient flow, unmet need, treatment pathways
-Develop market insights, including epidemiology and health political insights
-Map key stakeholders and influencers
-Identify and rank unmet need and value drivers for payer
-Conduct the campaigns for increasing disease awareness and sense of urgency of treatment
-Conduct clinical meetings to gain insight and create advocates
-Identify and engage relevant patient groups; support the establishment of specific patient advocacy group if needed
4. Build Stakeholders relation and policy shaping
-Build up strong relationship with key stakeholders including government officials, experts and maintain regular interactions.
-Lead/ Assist with the development and implementation of public relations and government affairs strategy as it pertains to the market access environment
-Work with finance dept. to estimatepricing impact and simulate the long term market trend for business planning.
-Regular update market dynamics, macro/micro environment change and policy change to leadership team
-Interface on regular basis with key internal and external stakeholders to review and address their challenges
-Work with IRPMA and related associations to follow up policy and environment change and engage in future policy recommendation

-Manage TAKEDA related products reimbursement guideline change","其他醫療人員,市場調查／市場分析,產品管理師",待遇面議,全職,台北市信義區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,依公司規定,一個月內,1人,5年以上,大學以上,"醫藥衛生學科類,生物學相關",英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,熟悉藥事行政與法規,"- 其他：1.University or above, major in life science related.

2024/01/04,R0112471 (Associate) Diagnostic Service Manager,台灣武田藥品工業股份有限公司,"OBJECTIVES:

The (Associate) Diagnostic Service Manager (DSM) is the internal diagnostic expert and commits to establishing Takeda’s medical affairs presence with external stakeholders through provision of diagnostic service support.

This role is responsible for planning, implementing and managing diagnostic testing service (DTS) supported by Takeda independent of prescription/ treatment influence. In addition, this role will also ensure adherence of service program strategy, objectives and KPIs while adequately managing relevant service risk by complying with company compliance and regulatory requirements. Hence, this position will work closely with both medical affairs and multiple cross-functional colleagues to lead the diagnostic related initiatives, as well as providing relevant scientific expertise and training to cross-functional stakeholders as needed. DSM will contribute to the achievement of enterprise success by advocating and putting the patients’ diagnostic needs at the forefront.
ACCOUNTABILITIES:
OVERALL-
• Build solid understanding of prioritized therapeutic areas and collaborate with cross-functional teams to build and drive diagnostic service strategies abiding by company's DTS guidance
• Map the key pathways of patients within the healthcare system to identify focus areas for resource allocation to deliver diagnostic service to patients

• Execute diagnostic service development, deployment, reassessment, termination/close out and risk mitigation. Program deployment includes but not limited to territories engagement, resources (materials) availability, status monitoring, service continuity, if applicable
• Perform 3rd parties' selection, develop and adopt provision of service performance, and perform oversight of quality and compliance in partnership with company's quality department
• Monitor performance and budget:
- Define and monitor performance metrics (KPIs)
- Manage and monitor budget expenditures vs plan
- Capture metrics to measure success in diagnostic service
- In accordance with key performance indicators, monitor progress against objectives
• Ensure that all interactions with patients are in full compliance with laws and regulations and reflect ethical principles and corporate philosophy
1. DIAGNOSTIC EXPERTISE
2. EXTERNAL STAKEHOLDER MANAGEMENT
3. STRATEGIC PLANNING
4. CROSS-FUNCTIONAL COLLABORATION
5. COMPLIANCE

Read and analyze the market, competitor information and potentials
Fair understanding to territory and healthcare system

Be a professional problem solver

Customer Management

column2: Know the business and anticipates future opportunities.  Persistent and resilient when confronted with obstacles – find the way.
Agility and accountability to successfully manage multiple tasks including digital transformation concurrently under aggressive timelines in a dynamic environment.

Build strong relationships with peers and cross functionally and with partners outside of team to enable higher performance.  Motivates and can influence others, including those over whom they have no direct authority.
Strong professional knowledge, selling skills, territory management and execution
Deal comfortably with ambiguity, uncertainty and risk and make high-quality decisions with less than perfect information.
Step up and take leadership to own toughest challenges.  Raise the bar and is never satisfied with the status quo.
Act courageously, say what needs to be said and manage conflict constructively.
Connect unrelated concepts, generate original or unique ideas.  Embrace the ideas of others, nurtures innovation and manages innovation to reality.

column1: Good communication skills, with the ability to interact effectively","- 福利制度：工作時間
。每週工作五天，四十小時，提供彈性工作時間安排(工作時間與居家工作安排)。
。每月第二個禮拜五，以及三大節日前一工作日可提早下班
休假制度
。各種休請假同於或優於勞基法規定。
。年休假:到職當年即享十二天年假。
。生日假:員工生日當天享有一天給薪假。
。公司彈性休假日與「艾伯維日」:除法定12天國定假日外，員工每年享有額外八天給薪假。
薪資制度
。基本薪資每年依市場變動調整架構，最具市場競爭性 。
。薪資依績效調整，良好表現者得到相對的獎勵。
。每年固定年終獎金，依職別另有不同的績效獎酬計劃 。
福利制度
。勞工保險、全民健保
。員工及眷屬團體保險（壽險、意外傷害險、醫療住院保險、癌症險、重大疾病險）。(適用正職員工)
。退休制度及離職金辦法。(適用正職員工)
。三節年節獎金、禮品。
。員工旅遊及活動補助，婚喪喜慶、生育禮金禮品。(適用正職員工)
。年度健康檢查、流感疫苗接種 。
。資深員工服務獎勵。(適用正職員工)
。家庭日、志工日、綠色環保活動。
。員工協助方案(適用正職員工)、職醫護臨場服務。
訓練制度
。有系統的業務人員業務推廣訓練核心課程。
。各種職能、績效管理、主管發展訓練核心課程及外語訓練辦法。主要以在職訓練，從工作中學習為主軸。
。專業訓練經理規劃訓練體系，公司並培訓內部講師群執行核心課程。主管及行銷企劃人員可輔以艾伯維海外訓練體系。
。員工發展方案 – 探索者計畫，建立人才庫、強化人才發展平台，並增進人才跨職能的發展機會。

column2: Monitors activities conducted by clinical investigative sites as they relate to AbbVie clinical studies to ensure successful execution of the protocol. Ensures adherence to federal regulations and applicable local regulations, Good Clinical Practices (GCPs), ICH Guidelines, AbbVie Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), Monitoring Plans, and to quality standards in conducting clinical research.

Conducts site qualification, initiation, interim monitoring and study closeout visits for Phase 1-4 studies in accordance with applicable regulations, Good Clinical Practices (GCPs), ICH Guidelines, and AbbVie Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and business processes.

Overviews the overall activities of site personnel over whom there is no direct authority and motivates/influences them to meet study objectives. proactively manages the site and ensures action plans are put into place as needed to ensure compliance. Ensures regulatory inspection readiness at assigned clinical sites.
Ensures quality of data submitted from study sites and assures timely submission of data, including appropriate reporting and follow-up for all safety events by site personnel.
Ensures safety and protection of study subjects through compliance with the study monitoring plan, AbbVie SOPs, ICH Guidelines, and applicable regulations.
Trains study site personnel on the protocol and applicable regulatory requirements in collaboration with pertinent project team members.

Manages investigator payments as per executed contract obligations. Negotiates investigator/hospital agreements with stakeholders. Maintain and complete own expense reports as per local and applicable guidelines.
Identifies, evaluates and recommends new/potential investigators/sites on an on going basis.

Potential sites may be identified through networking or internal AbbVie requests to assist in the placement of planned clinical studies with qualified investigators.","生物科技研發人員,醫藥研發人員,其他醫療人員",待遇面議,全職,台北市中山區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,一個月內,1人,3年以上,大學以上,"生物學相關,化學相關,醫藥衛生學科類",英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：•
column3: Appropriate tertiary qualification, health related (e.g., Medical, Scientific, Nursing) preferred.

column2: Minimum of 3-5 years of clinically-related experience, of which a period of 2-3 years is preferable in clinical research monitoring. Experience in on-site monitoring of investigational drug or device trials is required.
Current in-depth knowledge and understanding of appropriate therapeutic indications as they relate to the conduct of clinical trials.
Current in-depth knowledge of regulations governing clinical research, ICH/GCP Guidelines and applicable regulations.

Strong planning and organizational skills and the ability to work effectively and efficiently in a dynamic environment with competing projects and deadlines. Ability to work, understand and follow work processes within the assigned function.

Strong analytical and conceptual capabilities, interpersonal skills, and ability to communicate with clarity. Ability to address study related clinical site issues with appropriate guidance and initiates and communicate corrective action as indicated. Ability to use functional expertise and exercise good judgment.
Demonstrated business ethics and integrity.","- 福利制度：工作時間

【全方位保險】提供員工及眷屬團體保險，並由公司全額負擔保費
【 年度健檢】每年定期健康檢查，員工進階健檢
【 公司贈飲】每月一箱公司產品贈飲、三節及生日贈飲
【 福委補助】員工福利委員會補助 (婚喪喜慶及教育獎勵)及福委特約商店優惠
【 生活平衡】員工旅遊補助、年度春酒
【 休假福利】優於法令預給特休假、每年5天全薪病假
【 太古可口可樂專屬】上班期間公司飲品無限暢飲、可口可樂商店員工優惠、公司產品員購價
== 兼顧工作與生活，樂在工作 ==
【 EAP員工協助方案】提供24小時外部專業諮詢服務，守護同仁及眷屬身心健康
【 VIOCE員工建議箱】鼓勵員工署名或匿名表達心聲與提供建議，共同打造良好環境
【健康促進】健康促進講座、運動及各項保健宣導
【志工關懷】每位同仁一年8小時給薪志工假，志工服務彈性選擇
【多元共融】委員會定期舉辦訓練、講座及活動，促進性別、年齡、種族、身心障礙及性傾向多元共融
【安全先行】安全促進宣導及行動、員工安全提報建議，打造職場安全環境
【友善環境】孕婦專屬停車位、哺乳室、性別友善廁所
== 暢快學習，發展不設限 ==
【專業職能精進】專業職能課程，技術證照以及定期回訓補助、英文學習補助
【領導力培育】因應不同職級需求，量身打造國內外領導力培訓課程
【內部傳承學習】內部種子講師團隊年度徵選、培訓及回訓補助
【多元企業大學】 線上學習系統，豐富學習資源隨身帶著走
【SPRINT Program】新進人員到職90天學程，入職夥伴(Buddy)支持
== 鼓勵高績效文化，關注職涯發展與表揚 ==
【薪酬獎金】每年定期檢視薪資結構、依個人績效及公司年度運營成果發放年度獎金
【職能晉級路徑】供應鏈及設備服務技術職能晉級路徑與年度評核
【職涯機會無設限】鼓勵職務輪調，提供內部職缺申請、人才調遷補助與人才推薦獎勵

column2: Build up capability and knowledge for Metrology including Standard Method requirements, Operation, and Calibration methods on site.

== 兼顧工作與生活，樂在工作 ==
【 EAP員工協助方案】提供24小時外部專業諮詢服務，守護同仁及眷屬身心健康
【 VIOCE員工建議箱】鼓勵員工署名或匿名表達心聲與提供建議，共同打造良好環境
【健康促進】健康促進講座、運動及各項保健宣導
【志工關懷】每位同仁一年8小時給薪志工假，志工服務彈性選擇
【多元共融】委員會定期舉辦訓練、講座及活動，促進性別、年齡、種族、身心障礙及性傾向多元共融
【安全先行】安全促進宣導及行動、員工安全提報建議，打造職場安全環境
【友善環境】孕婦專屬停車位、哺乳室、性別友善廁所

【內部傳承學習】內部種子講師團隊年度徵選、培訓及回訓補助
【多元企業大學】 線上學習系統，豐富學習資源隨身帶著走
【SPRINT Program】新進人員到職90天學程，入職夥伴(Buddy)支持

column1: 2024/01/17,【彰化TPU廠】PCT(Process Control Technology)Expert 程控自動化主任工程師,台灣科思創股份有限公司,"YOUR TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
1. Responsible to lead maintenance technicians to define PCT (Process Control Technology) maintenance strategy.
2. Responsible for DCS training to train new employees, regular re-train employees and ensure the effectiveness of training.
3. Responsible to support the site capital investment projects and LSS improvement projects with PCT knowledge and experiences.
4. Responsible for scope definition and accountable for technical acceptance of plant modifications, from the reliability, product quality and control performance perspective.

5. Accountable to maintain and safeguard the as-built plant documentation standards in his/her area including critical equipment / instrument & safety PM/PdM compliance documentation, as well as control system configuration.
6. Accountable for maintaining legal and corporate compliance of PCT installations.
7. Ensuring safe and efficient PCT installation and PCT practices while ensuring technological advances via focused use of modern technology.

8. The job holder must be well versed in working with cross functional departments within Covestro to understand and anticipate the customer's needs for an efficient utilization of production assets and forward looking to understand and anticipate technology trends in all areas of process control technology.

9. Develop and maintain relationships with PCT engineer expert peers at other Covestro TPU facilities to foster (a) experience exchange and (b) identification of synergies, those of which could lead to PCT improvements at the site.

10. Support APAC TPU sites on PCT for production issues, investment projects, continuous improvements and functional safety.","自動控制工程師,電機技師／工程師,生產設備工程師",待遇面議,全職,彰化縣線西鄉,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,週休二日,一個月內,1人,不拘,大學以上,不拘,不拘,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：WHO YOU ARE:

2024/01/17,HY-美商電動車/能源領導品牌-電動車銷售顧問(門市業務 無須有車輛銷售經驗 重視過往銷售與服務業經驗) 月薪40K起,新加坡商立可人事顧問有限公司台灣分公司,"Tesla Advisor/ Sales Representative 電動車銷售顧問
上班地點：
大台北地區－台北信義/台北內湖/新北板橋/新北新莊/新北新店>分發制
The Role:
在 Tesla，我們的 Tesla 顧問始終如一地為我們所有當前和未來的客戶提供令人難以置信的教育、身臨其境和令人興奮的體驗。 他們構成了特斯拉的前線，是我們的品牌大使，支持我們通過為客戶創造難忘的體驗來加速世界向可持續能源過渡的使命。
作為 Tesla 顧問，從客戶走進我們的展廳了解 Tesla 的那一刻起，您就將為他們提供支持。 我們創造了有史以來最具創新性的車輛之一，您將幫助提供同樣創新的購買體驗。
Responsibilities:
• 及時、個性化地讓客人走進來，目標是開啟對話並確保他們感到賓至如歸
• 了解我們的客人是誰，是什麼讓他們來到特斯拉，他們的購買意圖和時間表，從而創建一個強大的客戶檔案
• 通過回答客人的問題並根據他們的興趣和議程提供量身定制的體驗來教育和激發客人的興趣
• 展示對所有 Tesla 產品和服務的精通，以及對 EV 車主的當地激勵措施

【全方位保險】提供員工及眷屬團體保險，並由公司全額負擔保費
【 年度健檢】每年定期健康檢查，員工進階健檢
【 公司贈飲】每月一箱公司產品贈飲、三節及生日贈飲
【 福委補助】員工福利委員會補助 (婚喪喜慶及教育獎勵)及福委特約商店優惠
【 生活平衡】員工旅遊補助、年度春酒
【 休假福利】優於法令預給特休假、每年5天全薪病假
【 太古可口可樂專屬】上班期間公司飲品無限暢飲、可口可樂商店員工優惠、公司產品員購價
== 兼顧工作與生活，樂在工作 ==
【 EAP員工協助方案】提供24小時外部專業諮詢服務，守護同仁及眷屬身心健康
【 VIOCE員工建議箱】鼓勵員工署名或匿名表達心聲與提供建議，共同打造良好環境
【健康促進】健康促進講座、運動及各項保健宣導
【志工關懷】每位同仁一年8小時給薪志工假，志工服務彈性選擇
【多元共融】委員會定期舉辦訓練、講座及活動，促進性別、年齡、種族、身心障礙及性傾向多元共融
【安全先行】安全促進宣導及行動、員工安全提報建議，打造職場安全環境
【友善環境】孕婦專屬停車位、哺乳室、性別友善廁所
== 暢快學習，發展不設限 ==
【專業職能精進】專業職能課程，技術證照以及定期回訓補助、英文學習補助
【領導力培育】因應不同職級需求，量身打造國內外領導力培訓課程
【內部傳承學習】內部種子講師團隊年度徵選、培訓及回訓補助
【多元企業大學】 線上學習系統，豐富學習資源隨身帶著走
【SPRINT Program】新進人員到職90天學程，入職夥伴(Buddy)支持
== 鼓勵高績效文化，關注職涯發展與表揚 ==
【薪酬獎金】每年定期檢視薪資結構、依個人績效及公司年度運營成果發放年度獎金
【職能晉級路徑】供應鏈及設備服務技術職能晉級路徑與年度評核
【職涯機會無設限】鼓勵職務輪調，提供內部職缺申請、人才調遷補助與人才推薦獎勵
【BRAVO榮譽之星認可】 BRAVO榮譽之星員工認可計畫，並在員工大會定期公開表揚

column2: Ensure to comply with AP and local safety, health and environment standard, fulfill the mandatory safety requirement and activities: safety training, safety meeting, and all other requirements by AP EH&S and local regulation.
Monitor the serviceability of plant equipment and facilities and ensure they adhere to safety, housekeeping and environmental requirements.
Responsible for maintenance for all instrument & control, analyzer & electrical equipment.

Response to maintenance requirements that could be scheduled or unscheduled/emergency jobs, on 24/7 base, prompt response to requests for assistance and putting in the time and effort to meet our customer’s expectations.
To be familiar with all equipment in plants, maintain all maintenance equipment accurate documents integrity and equipment history database reachable.
Provide hand-on technical skills at the troubleshooting and all related maintenance work or supporting work responsible.
Perform preventive maintenance work and support to implement Mechanical Integrity work, troubleshooting, repair for all equipment.
Coordinate or assist of supervision the contractor’s work in the facility or shop to guarantee safety and quality and reliability.
Provide technical reports through the specified datasheet or checklist.
Reporting-Time entry weekly and assist supervisor to prepare technical reports.

Coordinate maintenance matter with OP team.","機電技師／工程師,自動控制工程師,生產設備工程師",待遇面議,全職,台南市安南區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,3年以上,專科、大學、碩士,"電機電子工程相關,電機電子維護相關",英文--聽 /略懂、說 /略懂、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,不拘,"電力工程裝修與控制,配電裝修維護,電機設備操作","- 其他：1.

為新產品和轉換產品製定具體的查驗登記計劃，並為管理層提供戰略建議。

Specifying labelling and packaging requirements;
Perform promotional materials review, review and/or approve materials which descriptions and statements of a specific product are aligned with locally approved claims.
確保公司產品符合台灣FDA的相關法規要求，包含但不限於：

確認產品標示及包裝等法規要求。
執行產品行銷資料審查流程，審查和/或批准其產品的敘述和說明符合該產品在本地被核准的範圍的材料。

Adaptability to shifting priorities and strategies in response to the business climate.

[彈性工作模式]
默克的全新工作模式為員工提供更大彈性，使主管和員工雙方在經過討論後做出最佳工作安排，提升工作效率並兼顧個人生活；依照不同的工作類別、單位及地點，默克提供彈性工作時間、地點及部分工時之選擇。
[多元職涯發展]
(1)多元化的人才發展計畫
人才是默克的最大資產，除了工作中的專業訓練，我們更提供豐富的訓練課程，例如：實體、線上工作技能培訓，或語言能力課程等，從全球總部到當地市場也設有多元的潛力人才或領導技能培養課程。默克亦更投入大量資源與知名顧問公司、機構合作，提供給員工最完整的職涯發展規劃。
(2)多元職能/國際輪調機會
默克非常支持員工在不同職位發展輪調，鼓勵拓展更多職涯可能性，更提供豐富的國際職涯機會，歡迎員工依照自己的生涯規劃與目標申請。
(3)職涯雙軌制
在默克，我們實施職涯雙軌制，讓員工依自己的意願與專長，選擇發展管理職或專業職，無論是想要專精於特定領域，或是有興趣發展管理職能，在默克都可以找到最適合自己的發展機會。

column1: Minimum Qualifications:
• BS degree in electrical engineering or related.
• 8+ years of experience, in design of industrial electrical power systems
• Familiar with all major electrical engineering expertise including but not limited to:
•Regulation/Code:  CNS, IEC, NFPA ISO, NEMA and local code
•Power System: Single Line Diagram, Load Analysis, Arc Flash, Voltage Drop
Calculation, Wire/Cable Tray Selection.
•Building System: Illuminance Calculation, Load Balance Calculation,
Grounding/Lightning Protection, and Equipment Arrangement
•Component Sizing: Fuse Sizing, Transformer sizing, Switchgear & Switchboard
Power Panels, Motor Controllers (and/or Centers) & VFD, Standby Generator Sets,
Heat Trace Systems, Motor Selection, ATS
•Document Preparation: Data Sheet, MR (Material Requisition), TBE (Technical Bid
Evaluation)
•DCS Design and Analysis: I/O Points between MCC and DCS, Remote Terminal
Unit.
•Communication System
•Hazardous Classification: Relevant Design Regulation, Selection of Explosion-
proof EQ, Hazardous Material Table
•Fire Alarm System
Preferred Qualifications:
• Advanced degree in Engineering (MS or PhD)
• Experience in integration of firefighting
• National Certified Electrical Engineer(高考電機技師)

12. EAP員工協助方案
[彈性工作模式]
默克的全新工作模式為員工提供更大彈性，使主管和員工雙方在經過討論後做出最佳工作安排，提升工作效率並兼顧個人生活；依照不同的工作類別、單位及地點，默克提供彈性工作時間、地點及部分工時之選擇。
[多元職涯發展]
(1)多元化的人才發展計畫
人才是默克的最大資產，除了工作中的專業訓練，我們更提供豐富的訓練課程，例如：實體、線上工作技能培訓，或語言能力課程等，從全球總部到當地市場也設有多元的潛力人才或領導技能培養課程。默克亦更投入大量資源與知名顧問公司、機構合作，提供給員工最完整的職涯發展規劃。
(2)多元職能/國際輪調機會
默克非常支持員工在不同職位發展輪調，鼓勵拓展更多職涯可能性，更提供豐富的國際職涯機會，歡迎員工依照自己的生涯規劃與目標申請。
(3)職涯雙軌制
在默克，我們實施職涯雙軌制，讓員工依自己的意願與專長，選擇發展管理職或專業職，無論是想要專精於特定領域，或是有興趣發展管理職能，在默克都可以找到最適合自己的發展機會。

2024/01/16,Software Sales (業務代表 / 智慧工廠解決方案),台灣創浦股份有限公司,"德商創浦(TRUMPF) 成立於1923年，總部位於德國迪欽根，為全球雷射技術與工具機領導品牌。

TRUMPF以鈑金加工雷射工具機起家，產品包含：雷射切割機、折床、沖床、雷射焊接機、3D五軸雷射加工機等。隨著工業4.0的發展趨勢，近年TRUMPF將全球工具機的重心導向智慧製造。2017年TRUMPF於美國芝加哥成立第一座自動化的物聯網智慧示範工廠，板材生產線從下單、生產、倉儲、出貨，在機器、自動化裝置與軟體共同協作之下達到透明化生產，生產流程實現數字化、網路化、智慧平台化的模式，提高整體生產力、加工靈活度、生產穩定性。容易管理的智慧工廠概念也更貼近以中小企業為主的台灣鈑金加工製造業市場。
【What you will get】
TRUMPF Taiwan秉持TRUMPF培訓專業人才之理念，注重人才培訓。不論是思維或是管理，我們都注重於長遠的決策。因此，創浦鼓勵員工參與決策過程，互相尊重360度的溝通，並提供海外在職受訓機會，與來自全球的夥伴相互交流。

[彈性工作模式]
默克的全新工作模式為員工提供更大彈性，使主管和員工雙方在經過討論後做出最佳工作安排，提升工作效率並兼顧個人生活；依照不同的工作類別、單位及地點，默克提供彈性工作時間、地點及部分工時之選擇。
[多元職涯發展]
(1)多元化的人才發展計畫
人才是默克的最大資產，除了工作中的專業訓練，我們更提供豐富的訓練課程，例如：實體、線上工作技能培訓，或語言能力課程等，從全球總部到當地市場也設有多元的潛力人才或領導技能培養課程。默克亦更投入大量資源與知名顧問公司、機構合作，提供給員工最完整的職涯發展規劃。
(2)多元職能/國際輪調機會
默克非常支持員工在不同職位發展輪調，鼓勵拓展更多職涯可能性，更提供豐富的國際職涯機會，歡迎員工依照自己的生涯規劃與目標申請。
(3)職涯雙軌制
在默克，我們實施職涯雙軌制，讓員工依自己的意願與專長，選擇發展管理職或專業職，無論是想要專精於特定領域，或是有興趣發展管理職能，在默克都可以找到最適合自己的發展機會。

6. 優於勞基法假勤制度，讓同仁有更多彈性及足夠的假期安排:
-優於勞基法之特休假、生日假、志工假、浮動假、84天產假、陪產(檢)假、生理假、有薪病假、有薪家庭照顧假及有薪助孕假
7. 團體保險: 定期壽險、意外險、住院醫療(含配偶及子女)、癌症(含配偶及子女)

10. 育兒津貼: 每胎提供24,000元補助

12. EAP員工協助方案
[彈性工作模式]
默克的全新工作模式為員工提供更大彈性，使主管和員工雙方在經過討論後做出最佳工作安排，提升工作效率並兼顧個人生活；依照不同的工作類別、單位及地點，默克提供彈性工作時間、地點及部分工時之選擇。
[多元職涯發展]
(1)多元化的人才發展計畫
人才是默克的最大資產，除了工作中的專業訓練，我們更提供豐富的訓練課程，例如：實體、線上工作技能培訓，或語言能力課程等，從全球總部到當地市場也設有多元的潛力人才或領導技能培養課程。默克亦更投入大量資源與知名顧問公司、機構合作，提供給員工最完整的職涯發展規劃。
(2)多元職能/國際輪調機會
默克非常支持員工在不同職位發展輪調，鼓勵拓展更多職涯可能性，更提供豐富的國際職涯機會，歡迎員工依照自己的生涯規劃與目標申請。
(3)職涯雙軌制
在默克，我們實施職涯雙軌制，讓員工依自己的意願與專長，選擇發展管理職或專業職，無論是想要專精於特定領域，或是有興趣發展管理職能，在默克都可以找到最適合自己的發展機會。

We are searching for a passionate and detail-oriented Mechanical Engineer to join our growing structure.
You will collaborate with our cross-functional team of thinkers to define the future of mobility.

HOW YOU’LL MAKE A DIFFERENCE
•    Take requirements from Product Managers and support Industrial Design vision to create the future of two wheeled electric mobility
•    Design (3D and 2D) tubing, forgings, castings, stampings, plastic parts etc. for frames and components that meet project requirements while being manufacturable
•    Ideate, prototype, and iterate through new design concepts to confirm they meet fit/form/function and manufacturability requirements
•    Work closely with manufacturing to make sure parts and frames received from suppliers meet expectations
•    Organize frame/fork/component test samples to ensure all products meet testing requirements
WHAT YOU NEED TO WIN
•    Bachelor’s degree in Aerospace, Mechanical, or Manufacturing Engineering
•    Experience with injection molding, forging, tube manipulation and welding are required
•    3D/2D CAD Experience (Creo - Pro Engineer and/or surfacing skills required)
•    5+ years of experience in design and/or manufacturing engineering or 3+ years of bike frame design and/or manufacturing experience

2024/01/16,Senior EHS Engineer (EUV),台灣創浦股份有限公司,"We are a high-tech company providing machine tools and laser technology, driving digital connectivity in manufacturing industry through consulting, platform and software offers.
As an independent family company, we think and act long-term, and our desire to shape the future has made us a guarantor of continuous innovative strength.
We're now looking for people who can face new challenges with a fresh mind.
Join us, and we offer you the freedom and trust to put your brave ideas into practice!
This position has the role of EUV Senior Safety Engineer with the responsibility for human and machine safety in all working progress.
TRUMPF EUV team is closely working together with customer for EUV lithography.
The focus is on operational safety and arranging/ planning/ maintaining all mandatory safety trainings of the EUV team to secure safe installations.
Compliance with all legal regulations including local laws and international regulations, industrial regulations are also the key responsibility of this role.
•Coordinating of safety topics/trainings within EUV project with TRUMPF HQ, customer and end customers
• Escalation owner for safety issues and follow up
• Implementation and support risk assessments with installation and work environment.
• Coordination with customers in order to be able to incorporate requirements and obligations into the safety considerations
• Develop the EHS standard by Trumpf Policy and legal requirement.
• Ensure all the operation onsite in accordance with legal requirement.
• Implementing in ISO45001/ TOSHMS operation.
• Conducting accident and incident investigations and identify controls to prevent their reoccurrence.
• Developing, suggesting and conducting health and safety training.
• Conducting process safety assessment.
• Conducting management of change.
• Conducting contractor management.
• Conducting high-risk work management.
• Conducting semiconductor equipment safety management.
• Responsible for government document application.
• To cooperate with EHS activities as requested
Minimum Bachelor’s degree, preferable in Industrial Safety/Health engineering related.
6+ years’ experience in the field of Safety, SEMICON or Electronics industry.
•Better with Tool installation and inspection experiences.
•Fluent English skills in both written and verbal.
•Excellent communication skill.
•General knowledge of human/product safety.
•Customer focused, Optimistic, integrity and trust.
•Structured and conscientious way of working.
•Knowledge of product safety.
•Knowledge of chemistry and materials technology is preferred.
•勞工安全衛生管理員 certification/license is MUST.
Our employees are one of our key family to our company. To recognize that, we offer highly competitive packages to attract and retain our employees.
- State-of-the-art work environment with the latest technology
- Early assumption of responsibility and varied tasks
- Broad range of training offers

- Respectful and appreciative corporate culture","職業安全衛生管理師,職業安全衛生管理員",待遇面議,全職,台南市新市區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,依公司規定,可年後上班,1人,6年以上,大學、碩士,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,不拘,,"- 福利制度：BE THE TALENT IN TAIWAN TRUMPF

[薪資及福利]
1. 年薪保障13個月
2. 年度績效獎金(AIP)
3. 即時/高影響力獎勵(Spot Award / Impact Award)

6. 優於勞基法假勤制度，讓同仁有更多彈性及足夠的假期安排:
-優於勞基法之特休假、生日假、志工假、浮動假、84天產假、陪產(檢)假、生理假、有薪病假、有薪家庭照顧假及有薪助孕假

10. 育兒津貼: 每胎提供24,000元補助
11. 年度健檢及流感注射
12. EAP員工協助方案
[彈性工作模式]
默克的全新工作模式為員工提供更大彈性，使主管和員工雙方在經過討論後做出最佳工作安排，提升工作效率並兼顧個人生活；依照不同的工作類別、單位及地點，默克提供彈性工作時間、地點及部分工時之選擇。
[多元職涯發展]
(1)多元化的人才發展計畫
人才是默克的最大資產，除了工作中的專業訓練，我們更提供豐富的訓練課程，例如：實體、線上工作技能培訓，或語言能力課程等，從全球總部到當地市場也設有多元的潛力人才或領導技能培養課程。默克亦更投入大量資源與知名顧問公司、機構合作，提供給員工最完整的職涯發展規劃。
(2)多元職能/國際輪調機會
默克非常支持員工在不同職位發展輪調，鼓勵拓展更多職涯可能性，更提供豐富的國際職涯機會，歡迎員工依照自己的生涯規劃與目標申請。
(3)職涯雙軌制
在默克，我們實施職涯雙軌制，讓員工依自己的意願與專長，選擇發展管理職或專業職，無論是想要專精於特定領域，或是有興趣發展管理職能，在默克都可以找到最適合自己的發展機會。

默克的全新工作模式為員工提供更大彈性，使主管和員工雙方在經過討論後做出最佳工作安排，提升工作效率並兼顧個人生活；依照不同的工作類別、單位及地點，默克提供彈性工作時間、地點及部分工時之選擇。
[多元職涯發展]

默克非常支持員工在不同職位發展輪調，鼓勵拓展更多職涯可能性，更提供豐富的國際職涯機會，歡迎員工依照自己的生涯規劃與目標申請。
(3)職涯雙軌制
在默克，我們實施職涯雙軌制，讓員工依自己的意願與專長，選擇發展管理職或專業職，無論是想要專精於特定領域，或是有興趣發展管理職能，在默克都可以找到最適合自己的發展機會。

2024/01/16,Supplier Quality Engineer,香港商亞瑟有限公司台灣分公司,"In this role, you will get the chance to be the technical liaison between Accell and 3rd party suppliers. Working closely with chosen suppliers to resolve manufacturing issues, enforce specification and quality standards, implement and monitor advanced quality planning systems, lead on site audits and provide technical support throughout the lifecycle of the product.
MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:

column2: Ensure supplier understanding and compliance with Accell manufacturing specifications, Quality standards and processes.
Review and approve supplier manufacturing quality plans at both in process and end of line stages.
Determine root cause of supplier manufacturing problems and lead implementation of resolution in a timely, effective, and efficient manner.
Improve quality performance of suppliers by conducting onsite audits and workshops.
Provide technical assistance during supplier new product launch and change over to develop robust manufacturing and quality systems.
Creating, communicating and maintaining quality specifications within all relevant finished goods to provide reference points for the supplier to follow.
Liaise with NPD, during early development, to identify all requirements for the quality aspects of the product.
Assist suppliers to reach and maintain Accell quality requirements, this may include secondment during large or critical launches
Initiate, leading and tracking regularly/monthly quality meetings (calls or on site) with suppliers, procurement and Quality leaders.
Work closely with Quality and Procurement teams to ensure vendors are measured against product quality and warranty costs
Follow Frame Testing (ISO tests) at Suppliers factory and the consistency with ATP tests.
Work with Suppliers to set SOP and SIP definition
Conduct Technical Feasibility Study (check 3D / 2D and make sure frame a manufacturable)
Conduct Frame Measurement & Inspections where required.
Determine the supplier’s quality readiness level before mass production through Part Agreement before & during the new project pilot run stage.

Monitor and develop suppliers’ quality detection capability to an acceptable level (FQC Monitoring) in relation with Mu’s results","品管／品保工程師,ISO／品保人員,生產技術／製程工程師",待遇面議,全職,台中市西屯區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,週休二日,不限,1人,10年以上,大學、碩士,"工業工程相關,機械工程相關,電機電子工程相關",英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,"協助改善產品良率,新技術製程開發,產品驗證作業,可靠度分析報告撰寫與彙整","- 其他：EXPERIENCE/KNOWLEDGE:

column2: Tax Compliance and Reporting: Manage the company's tax affairs, including preparing and submitting various tax returns. Keep updated on the latest tax laws and regulations to ensure the company's tax procedures comply with legal requirements and maximize applicable tax incentives.

column1: 稅務申報與遵循： 負責處理公司的稅務事務，包括準備和提交各種稅務申報表。跟進最新稅法法規，確保公司的納稅程序合乎法規要求，並最大限度地利用可適用的稅收優惠。

column2: Adherence to Group Accounting Policies and Procedures: Assist in implementing accounting policies, procedures, and internal controls to ensure the company's financial operations comply with relevant group standards and local regulations.

column1: 遵循集團會計政策與程序： 協助和實施會計政策、程序和內部控制，以確保公司的財務運作符合相關集團規範及當地法令。

column2: Accounts Analysis: Analyze accounts payable data to assist in formulating financial strategies and decisions.

column1: 帳務分析：分析應付帳款資料，協助制定財務策略和決策。

column2: Cost Management and Control: Monitor and manage the company's costs, devise cost-control measures, and assist management in making effective budgeting and cost management decisions.

column1: 成本管理與控制： 監控和管理公司的成本，制定成本控制措施，幫助管理層做出有效的預算和成本管理決策。

column2: Audit Preparation and Assistance: Assist in preparing company audit-related documents and collaborate with internal and external auditors to complete audit procedures.

column1: 審計準備與協助： 協助準備公司審計相關文件，並配合內外部審計師完成審計程序。

column2: Communication and Coordination: Communicate with internal and external stakeholders, including suppliers, finance teams, and other departments, to resolve issues and ensure effective communication.

2024/01/16,神岡廠 - Senior Financial Analyst,愛爾蘭商速聯股份有限公司台灣分公司,"速聯(SRAM)創立於美國芝加哥，台灣分公司扎根台中也已逾三十一年，年營業額達新台幣六百億元，員工逾三千人，我們擁有包含高階自行車傳動系統品牌速聯(SRAM)、ROCKSHOX(避震系統)、ZIPP(碳纖維輪圈)與QUARQ(功率計)、TIME(踏板)、HAMMERHEAD(GPS導航車錶)、Velocio(車衣配件)在內八個世界知名自行車零組件品牌，產品深受世界各地騎士、職業選手熱愛，也是各自行車品牌優先指名合作夥伴。
本公司透過自主研發、測試與生產自行車無線電子變速系統、避震系統、碳纖維輪圈、功率計及車錶，透過SRAM、ROCKSHOX與ZIPP等品牌，組成自行車高階關鍵零組件的生態系。
Senior Financial Analyst一職隸屬速聯(SRAM)全球財務規劃管理(Financial Plan & Analysis, 簡稱FP&A)團隊，向該團隊台灣分公司主管匯報，負責在台灣以FP&A專家的身分在以下領域發揮貢獻:
1. Operate as a senior member of the Taiwan FP&A team and a Business Partner to the Taiwan Supply Chain & Purchasing groups
2. Support supply chain performance improvement goals with supplier & material cost analysis
3. Provide supplier cost structure profiles with the ability to model the impact of changing raw material costs, labor pay rates, utilities, and volume impacts
4. Provide timely, clear and accurate analysis of material cost trends compared to plan and prior year
5. Participate in the annual material cost planning and review process delivering continuous improvement
6. Provide finance support to the factory operations and FP&A management teams – make vs buy, multiple sourcing decisions etc.
7. Provide new product costing data related to new parts estimates
8. Effectively communicate on current and potential product cost changes – evaluating the impact
9. Participate in value-added discussions cross-functionally related to material and component costs focusing on the elements that teams can control
10. Participate in monthly factory operations reviews
11. Participate in quarterly factory slow moving and obsolete inventory reviews with a special focus on inventory at suppliers
12. Work on Ad-Hoc analysis and be an additional resource to the factory operations FP&A team as needed
在上述主要工作內容之外，還有兩項額外職責:
1. Continuously improve and evolve the role
2. Provide mentorship and training to other SRAM Taiwan team members
我們期望能邀請具備:
1. 良好英文溝通能力(能與芝加哥總部及歐美團隊書信、口說溝通之水準)
2. 扎實的企業財務流程知識與經驗
3. 豐富的ERP系統實務經驗

2024/01/16,Compliance Engineer - Taiwan 產品安規工程師,"Specialized Bicycle Components, Inc._美商斯貝特自行車股份有限公司台灣分公司","SUMMARY:

You will be a key part of compliance team and work directly with our engineers, engineering consultants, internal and external test lab teams around the world. You will have a central role in ensuring e-bike projects are in compliance with local and international laws. We are continually evolving and improving our compliance system, so your position will need to adapt from time to time to support our process improvements.
HOW YOU WILL MAKE A DIFFERENCE:

column2: Work with engineers, consultants and test lab to ensure e-bikes meet all international and local requirements.  Frequent communication with teams outside of Asia will be required.
Manage complete bike testing to international standards with bike assemblers.
Create and maintain complete bike certification documentation.
Ability to perform multitasks for supporting teams with different fields.

column1: ESSENTIAL RESPONSIBILITIES:

column2: E-bike Certifications

column1: • Coordinate with Product Developers and engineers to ensure international compliance of all pedal assist bicycle parts.
• Communicate with test labs and teams outside Taiwan, potentially requiring flexible hours.
• Ensure proper storage of certificates and documentation.

column2: Compliance Testing Review

column1: • Review test results to ensure comprehensive testing and approval of all aspects.
• Complete test records for each model, referencing in-house and 3rd party testing.

column2: Specialized RSL and PRSL Maintenance

column1: • Stay updated on changing chemical restrictions related to products and packaging.
• Communicate changes/updates to suppliers and resolve any issues.
• Collaborate with SGS or other test labs to facilitate RSL testing for suppliers.
• Request new supplier sign-off on RSL and PRSL documentation, uploading it to the Agile database. Provide clarification on RSL rules if suppliers have any questions.
EXPERIENCE & SKILLS REQUIRED:

column2: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Sciences with 1-2 years’ experience.
Understanding of international battery and electronic regulations a plus.
Excellent communication skills with an interest in working with teams around the world. Proficient in English.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment & complete tasks within product creation timelines.

column1: IF YOU HAVE WILL BE GREAT:
1.    Familiar with internal test standard, ISO 4210, EN 15194, CPSC, EMC, UL 2271 and UL 2849.

2024/01/16,化工廠製程安全及文件管理助理 (身心障礙人士職缺/約聘),台灣默克集團_台灣默克股份有限公司,"<<此為約聘職位>>
工作概述：
我們正在尋找一位身心障礙人士，願意協助我們的化工廠進行製程安全、CAPEx追蹤、P&ID管理等相關文書作業。我們歡迎有興趣的人士加入我們的團隊，不需要特定經驗，只要能細心負責即可。
工作職責：
1. 協助執行製程安全工作，如確保遵守安全規定，協助處理相關事故記錄等。
2. 協助追蹤CAPEx項目，協助建立預算，監督項目進展，確保按時完成。
3. 協助管理P&ID文件，確保文件的準確性、更新以及遵守相關法規。
4. 協助整理相關文件，如操作手冊、安全程序等，確保文件的完整性和容易存取。
5. 協助監測設備狀態，提供日常運作的支援。
要求：
1. 對製程安全和相關文件管理有興趣。
2. 能夠細心負責，注重細節。
3. 基本的溝通能力，能夠與不同部門合作。
4. 在快節奏的環境中工作，並願意學習。
5. 基本的電腦和文書處理能力。
我們歡迎各種背景的申請者，特別是身心障礙人士。如果您對這個職位感興趣，請將您的履歷發送至我們的人力資源部門。
Job Overview:

We're looking for an assistant interested in helping with process safety and documentation tasks in a chemical plant. Individuals with disabilities are encouraged to apply. You'll be involved in tasks like process safety checks, tracking projects, managing documents, and supporting daily operations.
Responsibilities:
1. Assist with process safety tasks, like ensuring safety rules are followed and handling incident records.
2. Help track projects, create budgets, and make sure projects stay on schedule.
3. Manage documents, making sure they're up to date and follow rules.
4. Organize documents like manuals and procedures for easy access.
5. Help keep an eye on equipment and support daily operations.
Requirements:
1. Interest in process safety and related tasks in a chemical setting.
2. Basic background knowledge in areas like chemistry or engineering.
3. Good organizational skills and attention to detail.
4. Basic communication skills and ability to work with different teams.
5. Ability to solve problems and work in a fast-paced environment.
6. Basic computer skills for word processing.

Applicants from various backgrounds are welcome, including those with disabilities. If you're interested, please send your resume to our Human Resources team.","文件管理師,行政助理,廠務助理",待遇面議,全職,高雄市路竹區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,2年以上,專科以上,化學工程相關,英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,AutoCAD,"報表彙整與管理,文件或資料輸入建檔處理,文件檔案資料處理、轉換及整合工作","- 其他：<<立刻加入我們的人才專區  Register now to our new Talent Zone >>

6. 優於勞基法假勤制度，讓同仁有更多彈性及足夠的假期安排:
-優於勞基法之特休假、生日假、志工假、浮動假、84天產假、陪產(檢)假、生理假、有薪病假、有薪家庭照顧假及有薪助孕假

12. EAP員工協助方案
[彈性工作模式]
默克的全新工作模式為員工提供更大彈性，使主管和員工雙方在經過討論後做出最佳工作安排，提升工作效率並兼顧個人生活；依照不同的工作類別、單位及地點，默克提供彈性工作時間、地點及部分工時之選擇。
[多元職涯發展]
(1)多元化的人才發展計畫
人才是默克的最大資產，除了工作中的專業訓練，我們更提供豐富的訓練課程，例如：實體、線上工作技能培訓，或語言能力課程等，從全球總部到當地市場也設有多元的潛力人才或領導技能培養課程。默克亦更投入大量資源與知名顧問公司、機構合作，提供給員工最完整的職涯發展規劃。
(2)多元職能/國際輪調機會
默克非常支持員工在不同職位發展輪調，鼓勵拓展更多職涯可能性，更提供豐富的國際職涯機會，歡迎員工依照自己的生涯規劃與目標申請。
(3)職涯雙軌制
在默克，我們實施職涯雙軌制，讓員工依自己的意願與專長，選擇發展管理職或專業職，無論是想要專精於特定領域，或是有興趣發展管理職能，在默克都可以找到最適合自己的發展機會。

2024/01/16,物料規劃專員 (身心障礙人士職缺/約聘),台灣默克集團_台灣默克股份有限公司,"<<此為約聘職位>>
工作概述：
我們正在尋找一位身心障礙人士，負責處理BU Display和半導體的交易商品，以滿足客戶需求，並負責其他計劃工作和客戶庫存報告的更新，以及物料追蹤，以保持高水平的客戶服務和穩健控制庫存指標在健康水平內。
您的角色：
．基於滾動預測的物料計劃和庫存管理，以滿足客戶訂單。
．管理供應和需求的變化，應對這些需求變化，解決可能出現的供應鏈問題。
．定期主持跨功能和跨地點的S&OP會議，確保與業務的高度一致性，並跟進未完成項目。
．優化預測準確性和庫存管理，確保高水平的客戶服務水準（準時交貨，完整交貨）。

R&R: This role is handling trading goods for both BU Display and Semiconductor to fulfil customer requirement, and the other planning affairs and customer stock report update, and material tracking to keep in high customer service level and resilience control INV index within healthy level.
YOUR ROLE-
．Materials planning and inventory management based on rolling forecast to fulfill customer orders.
．Manage changes in the supply and demand, respond to these changes in demand and solving any supply chain problems that arise.
．Regularly host S&OP with cross functions and across sites, assure strong alignment with business and follow up pending items.

．Optimize forecast accuracy and inventory management to assure high customer service level. (on-time & in-full)","生管,物管／資材,生管助理",待遇面議,全職,新竹縣湖口鄉,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,2年以上,專科、大學,企業管理相關,英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：資格要求：
．工作經驗：2年以上的物料計劃和庫存控制供應鏈工作經驗。
．具有物料管理、倉庫管理和生產控制方面的經驗者將獲優先考慮。
．流利的英語溝通能力（TOEIC >= 600）。
．具有SAP操作經驗以及良好的Microsoft Excel電腦技能者將獲優先考慮
WHO YOU ARE-
．Working Experiences: 2+ years of working experience in supply chain for material planning and INV control.
．Material management, warehouse management and production control filed will be a plus.
．Fluent in English communication. (TOEIC >=600)
．With SAP operating experiences and Good computer skills with Microsoft Excel will be a plus.

[彈性工作模式]
默克的全新工作模式為員工提供更大彈性，使主管和員工雙方在經過討論後做出最佳工作安排，提升工作效率並兼顧個人生活；依照不同的工作類別、單位及地點，默克提供彈性工作時間、地點及部分工時之選擇。
[多元職涯發展]
(1)多元化的人才發展計畫
人才是默克的最大資產，除了工作中的專業訓練，我們更提供豐富的訓練課程，例如：實體、線上工作技能培訓，或語言能力課程等，從全球總部到當地市場也設有多元的潛力人才或領導技能培養課程。默克亦更投入大量資源與知名顧問公司、機構合作，提供給員工最完整的職涯發展規劃。
(2)多元職能/國際輪調機會
默克非常支持員工在不同職位發展輪調，鼓勵拓展更多職涯可能性，更提供豐富的國際職涯機會，歡迎員工依照自己的生涯規劃與目標申請。
(3)職涯雙軌制
在默克，我們實施職涯雙軌制，讓員工依自己的意願與專長，選擇發展管理職或專業職，無論是想要專精於特定領域，或是有興趣發展管理職能，在默克都可以找到最適合自己的發展機會。

2024/01/16,Dow 2024 Campus – Research and Development (R&D),台灣陶氏化學股份有限公司,"Dow 2024 Campus – Research and Development (R&D)
Job Location: Taipei
Overview

Dow is hiring potential research talents to join R&D department, aiming to set you up to be world leading scientists who will contribute to solve current and future scientific difficulties. Corporate structured orientation and practical working experience will be provided to maximize your career potential, develop your innovative researching skills. This entry-level development opportunity has been recognized as one of the best in the industry.
Career Opportunity

In R&D department, theoretical training and practice-oriented working experience will concrete your technical foundation & innovation mind-set; enlighten to be future industry expert and world-class scientist. Working in R&D center enables you:

column2: Together with industrial experts and scientists all over the world, to develop cutting-edge technologies and applications
Providing innovative solutions to customers, witness strategic growth for Dow and our partnership
Networking with experienced Dow scientists and building mentoring relationship, obtain timely guidance in daily work
Coached by leaders to support you becoming industrial leading expert, achieve personal & professional career development

column1: Who We Are Looking For
We are looking for outstanding technical professional candidate who will graduated in 2024:
Master degree majored in polymer science, chemical engineering, chemistry, material science

column2: Innovative and Passionate, feel sense of achievement by providing real solutions
Solid in technical knowledge
Initiative and proactive on learning and working
Good Interpersonal Skills; People-oriented
Excellent communication skills, willing to work with top talents around the world
Adaptable and flexible to changing environment; Enjoy challenges

column1: About Dow

Dow (NYSE: DOW) combines global breadth; asset integration and scale; focused innovation and materials science expertise; leading business positions; and environmental, social and governance leadership to achieve profitable growth and help deliver a sustainable future. The Company's ambition is to become the most innovative, customer centric, inclusive and sustainable materials science company in the world. Dow's portfolio of plastics, industrial intermediates, coatings and silicones businesses delivers a broad range of differentiated, science-based products and solutions for its customers in high-growth market segments, such as packaging, infrastructure, mobility and consumer applications. Dow operates manufacturing sites in 31 countries and employs approximately 37,800 people. Dow delivered sales of approximately $57 billion in 2022. References to Dow or the Company mean Dow Inc. and its subsidiaries. For more information, please visit www.dow.com or follow @DowNewsroom on Twitter.

As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, Dow is committed to equal opportunities in employment.  We encourage every employee to bring their whole self to work each day to not only deliver more value, but also have a more fulfilling career. Further information regarding Dow's equal opportunities is available on www.dow.com.","材料研發人員,化工化學工程師,特用化學工程師","月薪58,000~64,000元",全職,台北市中山區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間約一個月以下,日班,週休二日,可年後上班,1人,不拘,大學以上,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,不拘,,"- 福利制度：- 薪資架構：優於市場的薪資架構，保障年薪十四個月，視公司營運狀況及個人績效表現另有績效獎金

[彈性工作模式]
默克的全新工作模式為員工提供更大彈性，使主管和員工雙方在經過討論後做出最佳工作安排，提升工作效率並兼顧個人生活；依照不同的工作類別、單位及地點，默克提供彈性工作時間、地點及部分工時之選擇。
[多元職涯發展]
(1)多元化的人才發展計畫
人才是默克的最大資產，除了工作中的專業訓練，我們更提供豐富的訓練課程，例如：實體、線上工作技能培訓，或語言能力課程等，從全球總部到當地市場也設有多元的潛力人才或領導技能培養課程。默克亦更投入大量資源與知名顧問公司、機構合作，提供給員工最完整的職涯發展規劃。
(2)多元職能/國際輪調機會
默克非常支持員工在不同職位發展輪調，鼓勵拓展更多職涯可能性，更提供豐富的國際職涯機會，歡迎員工依照自己的生涯規劃與目標申請。
(3)職涯雙軌制
在默克，我們實施職涯雙軌制，讓員工依自己的意願與專長，選擇發展管理職或專業職，無論是想要專精於特定領域，或是有興趣發展管理職能，在默克都可以找到最適合自己的發展機會。

2024/01/15,Assistant Service Manager/Service Manager 售後服務副理/經理 (高雄),台灣特斯拉汽車有限公司,"Tesla Motors is looking for an“Assistant Service Manager/ Service Manager” to work on one of the most progressive vehicles in the world.

This position is customer facing, so personality and technical ability go hand in hand. Excellent Oral and Written communication required. If you are interested in driving a positive customer experience, we are interested in speaking with you.
We are looking for self-motivated team players with a positive attitude!
We seek individuals who value customer satisfaction.

The Assistant Service Manager will provide communication to our customers on maintenance and repair needs that are identified during service. He / She will assist the local service manager in managing the Local Service Operation as well as providing active technical support in the store. It is a hands-on management role.
Our Service Managers must deliver excellent results and achieve goals quarter after quarter, month after month, on all aspects of customers, people, operations, and financials.
- Customer focused:
Our customers are changing the world, and it is your responsibility to exceed their expectations of what a service experience should be. We expect you to go above and beyond for our customers.

You will actively monitor customer service trends to make necessary improvements, and assist your team in developing appropriate standards and processes to continuously elevate the overall service experience.
- People:
Our Service Managers lead by example. We expect you to put your team’s success before your own, and actively involve yourself in your team members’ growth and development.
Your team will look to you to set the standard for open communication, active problem solving, and a positive work environment.
We will look to you to build a team of top talent and mentor the next generation of Tesla leaders.

Our Service Managers are the coaches of their teams – you must provide regular coaching and feedback, and have a deep knowledge of your team’s strengths and opportunities. You will be responsible for leading change and inspiring your team every day.
-Operational excellence:
As a Service Manager, you must understand and own every aspect of your service center’s performance.
You will be responsible for driving continuous improvements to facilitate exceptional team output and customer service.
We expect you to champion safety, efficiency, quality, and overall excellence in all of your actions and decisions.
-Financials: Service

Managers are expected to understand our business, know their numbers and lead the center’s daily operations to achieve specific goals in productivity, quality, output, cost as well as revenue / margin where applicable.
Our Service Managers act in the best interest of Tesla at all times. You must have a passion for our mission, our people, and our customers.

Technical acumen is required – you must develop a knowledge of all Tesla products, as well as Service systems, processes, and procedures.","產品售後技術服務,客服主管",待遇面議,全職,高雄市鼓山區,管理13人以上,需出差，一年累積時間約三個月以下,日班,週休二日,一個月內,1人,8年以上,大學、碩士,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,"專案成本╱品質╱風險管理,專案規劃執行╱範圍管理,工作任務╱業績項目分配,培育人員職涯發展,業績目標達成,督導人員工作績效,業務或通路開發,業績目標分配與績效達成,客訴案件處理",,"- 福利制度：• 年假: 入職即享有15天年假

2024/01/15,Energy-Commercial Energy Asset Manager(Mega Pack Account Manager),台灣特斯拉汽車有限公司,"What to Expect

The Commercial Energy Asset Manager is responsible for the oversight of commercial and operational deliverables for deployed solar & battery storage energy projects portfolios. This includes the continuous evaluation of improved operations, system performance, and site level profitability for the assigned asset.
What You'll Do

1. Facilitate, in coordination with other internal teams, monitor and challenge the operational performance and optimization metrics to achieve project's highest possible availability and gross profit.
2. Work closely with the onsite operations team to ensure safe and efficient operations of the asset.
3. Manage and resolve legal, contractual, regulatory, and commercial issues as they arise.
4. Ensure compliance with all project's governing documents including Power Purchase Agreements, O&M Agreements, Interconnection Agreements, land leases, etc.

5. Manage day-to-day stakeholder relationships (internally and externally) with local and state authorities, regulatory agencies, landowners, end customers, field service teams, finance / accounting teams, and other parties needed to operate the asset.
6. Review reoccurring reports on project performance as needed per contractual obligations and drive the closure of open cases / inquiries across the portfolio.
7. Negotiate contracts renewals as needed.
8. Monitor and influence all maintenance and operations for the assets based on fleet health, organizational priorities, and current fiscal relationship with end customer.

9. Work with internal and external resources to develop strategies that maximize revenue and reduce risk and market exposure of the asset.",專案管理主管,待遇面議,全職,台北市內湖區,管理人數未定,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,8年以上,大學以上,"一般商業學類,工程學科類",英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：What You'll Bring
1. Strong attention to detail with the ability to effectively multitask managing heavy workload.

2. Intimate knowledge of the energy and renewable energy market, and the ability to stay current with changing technologies, regulations, and trends influencing the continued adoption of renewable energy.
3. Commercial mindset, strong prioritization, communication, and organizational skills.
4. Understanding of integrated system design and operations. Prior operational experience at solar, wind, thermal, coal, hydro, or nuclear industries a plus.
5. Strong leadership skills with the ability to inspire people to action through his/her influence.
6. Strong understanding of project finance, legal contracts, accounting, and contract/warranty negotiations.
7. Self-motived with the ability to work with little supervision.
8. Strong learning skills with aptitude to independently research, understand, and implement knowledge in new areas.
9. Experience with standard financial metrics and analysis.

【全方位保險】提供員工及眷屬團體保險，並由公司全額負擔保費

【多元共融】委員會定期舉辦訓練、講座及活動，促進性別、年齡、種族、身心障礙及性傾向多元共融

【薪酬獎金】每年定期檢視薪資結構、依個人績效及公司年度運營成果發放年度獎金

2024/01/15,Delivery Advisor Tesla交付顧問 (台北),台灣特斯拉汽車有限公司,"The Role

The Tesla Delivery team is committed to providing the best Ownership Experience possible to our customers. This position is a great opportunity to join a world class expanding technology company and have a direct impact on our delivery promise as customers take ownership of their new vehicles. The Delivery Experience role is the direct point of contact for new customers preparing to take ownership.
Responsibilities
• Welcome customers to the Tesla family by making their journey to ownership a delightful experience.
• Regularly update the CRM system to ensure accurate and timely delivery information is available to management.

2024/01/15,Project Deployment Manager (Technical Project Manager) 充電站安裝專案管理,台灣特斯拉汽車有限公司,"The Role

Tesla’s Charging organization is looking for a skilled and motivated Deployment Manager to manage charging projects for Taiwan. This role will achieve “charging network build and operation goal in Taiwan” to meet Tesla’s mission: accelerating the world transition to sustainable energy.

The main duties of this role will be optimizing the installations of Tesla charging equipment, supporting construction centric with a relentless focus on reducing cost and increasing quality and efficiency. This role also involves working closely with project developers to support feasibility study and technical related matters.

Success will require knowledge and experience in project and vendor management. Being resilient and unfazed by ambiguity, ability to communicate effectively internally and externally in highly dynamic and changing environment.
Major responsibilities
- Being partnered with business development efforts from end to end as a technical reviewer and executioner
- Management and oversight of installation design, construction drawings, permitting, inspection, and closeout
- Manage overall project cost and quality
- Conduct with local authorities and power companies to solve any technical deployment issues
- Actively guide, track, maintain and develop external contractors with sharp eye on Tesla’s best interest
- Manage logistics, demand planning and equipment procurement
- Manage ongoing relationships with key external partners, including property owners/managers, general contractors, permitting authorities, utilities, and others
- Manage ongoing relationships with key internal teams, including purchasing, engineering, service and other stake holders

- Identify challenges affecting feasibility and timeline for installations and provide creative and resourceful solutions to ensure site opening","專案管理主管,其他專案管理師,業務支援工程師",待遇面議,全職,台北市內湖區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,週休二日,一個月內,1人,3年以上,大學、碩士,"電機電子工程相關,機械工程相關,電機電子維護相關",英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,"AutoCAD,AutoCad 2D,AutoCad 3D","預算編製與成本控管,專案成本╱品質╱風險管理,專案時間╱進度控管,專案規劃執行╱範圍管理,專案溝通╱整合管理,專案管理架構及專案說明,協商談判能力","- 其他：Requirements

·             Experience in contractor management and development

2024/01/15,E-Commerce Operation Planner 電商營運專員,台灣特斯拉汽車有限公司,"What to Expect
Tesla is seeking a highly motivated and organized E-Commerce operation planner to join our Team.

The E-Commerce Operation planner will be responsible for sales planning, goods order for e-shop website, on-hand inventory analysis and report sell-thru progress of products to improve sales, communicating with US E-commerce team, APAC team, Supply Chain team and work closely with relevant departments in local office.
What You’ll Do
-Fully understanding of customers need on products and liaise closely with consumer engagement team.
-Plan E-commerce features that enable customers to have a frictionless, engaging, and localized digital customer experience.
-Report on E-commerce business success criteria results, metrics, test and deployment management activities.

-Monitoring products information and stock in inventory regularly, managing the stock replenishment to each online channel periodically, as well as work with RDC for return and damage goods management.
-Collaborate with cross-functional partners including global/ regional office, CS, IT, Logistics and Marketing teams, to gather, review, and prioritize requirements.
-To assist in Customer service and liaise closely with RDC
-To plan the quarterly operation and promotion events on official online. Strategy for Promotion and discount activities with consumer engagement team.
-Analyze release readiness reviews, milestone reviews, and business go/no-go reviews.

- Maintain and manage effective relationship with all vendors, and partner to identify and apply solutions as needed for site experience improvement and operational optimization.","產品行銷企劃,產品管理師,行銷企劃",待遇面議,全職,台北市內湖區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,不拘,大學以上,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：-More than 2 years e-commerce platform management experience in multinational corporation
-BA degree in related fields
-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
-Experience to monitor daily trading operation
-Fluent in English and Chinese both written and speaking
-Proactive and highly result-oriented mindset
-Ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously
-Strong Excel and ppt skills","- 福利制度：• 年假: 入職即享有15天年假
• 病假: 20天全薪病假
• 團體保險
• 員工認股計畫 (ESPP)
• 彈性工時
員工配股,員工認股,不扣薪病假,家庭日,員工優惠,優於勞基法特休",https://www.104.com.tw/job/86plq
2024/01/14,（台中）電梯試車調校人員~【無經驗可】,富士達股份有限公司,"※到職後皆會先進行教育訓練，並協助考取證照。
《職務內容》
1.電(扶)梯試車、調校工作。
2.電(扶)梯機構安全檢查。
3.電(扶)梯故障維修。
*內容有高架或地下作業等體力工作。
《必備條件》
1.自備機車及駕照。
2.需配合公司要求至外縣市支援。
《加分條件》
1.具原住民身分者優先考量。
2.具勞工安全衛生管理員證照者優先錄取。
【補充說明】
*依學歷敘薪，經歷敘薪另計。

*加班費、各項獎金另計。
*歡迎肯學習、樂觀進取者應徵(無經驗可)。
*表現良好者有機會外派至日本工作。

2024/01/14,（台中）業務專員(台中-汰舊換新部),富士達股份有限公司,"《職務內容》
前期(預估1~2年)：電梯售後服務
1.保養契約洽談。
2.維修零件報價及議價。
3.請(收)款作業處理。
4.電梯部品更換工事洽談。
後期：電梯銷售業務
1.電梯、扶梯之汰舊更新銷售
2.開發及拜訪客戶，進行產品介紹
3.市場調查，配合營業方向推展業務。
4.工作地點主要在台中，但會有需前往北高支援的狀況。
《必備條件》
1.須能配合加班。
2.具備機車與汽車駕照，且自備交通工具。
3.能應用WORD、EXCEL、POWER POINT。
4.中打及英打每分鐘30字以上。
5.台語聽/說流利。
《加分條件》
1.工作經歷不拘，但具電梯產業相關工作、建築/建材銷售及營造現場監工背景者佳。
2.具升降機裝修技術士證者佳。
3.能應用AUTOCAD 2D者佳。
4.具備英日語溝通能力者佳。
【補充說明】
*依學經歷敘薪，經歷規格不同者另議。
*試用期考核通過者，將依表現調薪。
*加班費、各項獎金另計。
*歡迎肯學習、樂觀進取者應徵(無經驗可)。

3.具機動性--平日以機車通勤、並會開車。

2024/01/18,Scientific Advisor-Neurology and Rheumatology,台灣必治妥施貴寶股份有限公司,"Responsibilities
1. External Environment and Customer Focus

column2: Develop and maintain strong relationships with Thought Leaders, appropriate HCPs, and access stakeholders, within a given geography to answer scientific, unsolicited product and HEOR related questions. SAs will use various channels for interactions (1:1, group presentation; remote, etc).
Effectively present information to HCPs, as appropriate, ensuring medical accuracy and compliance with local procedures, ethical and legal guidelines and directives.

Actively profile the medical landscape and continuously update knowledge and expertise in products, patient treatment trends, unmet medical needs, clinical trials and scientific activities. Understand the competitive landscape and actively prepare to address informational needs of customers.
Collect and provide meaningful medical insights back to the medical and commercial organizations to be actioned in support of the strategy development.

column1: 2. Manage and Deliver the Medical Plan

column2: Provide strategic input into the development of Brand plans, develop and execute local Medical Plan and TL Interaction plans.
Deliver scientifically meaningful medical program proposals and ensure flawless execution of medical activities
Identify potential speakers for BMS educational programs and ensure that these speakers receive all necessary product and disease state training.

column1: 3. Provide Medical Support

column2: Contribute to the development and review of medical content within promotional and non-promotional materials (as appropriate, consistent with the Promotional and Non-Promotional BMS procedural documents and/or local codes), according to local resource and requirement.
Contribute to and coordinate the development of the medical / scientific sections of pricing and reimbursement files.
Contribute to the development of scientific publications or presentations, as appropriate.

As necessary and appropriate, may support the initial and ongoing medical/scientific area and product specific training and provide key scientific updates to internal stakeholders (Commercial, Regulatory, OR, PV, Legal, HEOR, Market Access, etc).

column1: 4. Support Clinical Trial Activities

column2: Support Interventional and Non Interventional Research (NIR) studies (including input on study feasibility, identification and assessment of potential study sites, facilitate BMS and investigator activities, and conduct site visits to support patient recruitment and/or discussions around the safe and effective use of BMS investigational products, as appropriate and in agreement with local medical management.

Provide recommendations and insights to GDO on study and site feasibilities within the therapeutic area based on knowledge of the field and through direct contacts with potential investigators, as appropriate and in agreement with local medical management.
Actively support CRO sponsored studies as appropriate or as defined by the study scope document
Provide medical support to GDO to transition patients from clinical trial to marketed and/or reimbursed supply of drug, where required and appropriate.
Ensure that BMS Pharmacovigilance procedural documents are understood and applied by Investigators of local studies, and alert appropriate BMS personnel to any identified Adverse Events.

column1: Experience Desired

column2: Working in a scientific and/or clinical research environment
Translating scientific or clinical data into compelling messages to help physicians best serve their patients
Effectively communicating and presenting scientific and/or clinical data to research or healthcare professionals
Developing peer-to-peer relationships with top-ranking medics, scientists or other healthcare professionals
Training others
Quickly and comprehensively learning about new subject areas and environments",其他醫療人員,待遇面議,全職,台北市松山區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,3年以上,碩士以上,不拘,不拘,不拘,不拘,,"- 福利制度：◆ 獎金 / 禮品類

2024/01/18,"OEM 業務客戶經理 (Account Manager, OEM)",台灣洛克威爾國際股份有限公司,"Job Purpose
Responsible for meeting sales targets (orders & shipments) for assigned account package through converting OEM machines to RA technology.
KPI (Key Performance Indicator)
Order/Shipment Target, % Growth of assigned accounts and the number of machine adoptions at assigned OEMs.
Key Responsibilities
DO
1. Develop comprehensive sales plans for assigned accounts.
2. Undertake daily sales calls in assigned accounts.
3. Develop prospect list for sales opportunities.
4. Analyze, identify, and create customer needs and where necessary leverage RA resources to meet these needs.
5. Qualify, follow up and close opportunities for assigned accounts.
6. Partner with customers in order to strategize and execute OEM machine adoption to RA technology.
7. Drive business growth in specific accounts in order to meet sales targets.
8. Maintain active funnel to satisfy sales targets.
9. Work with business units and logistics to satisfy customer demand for machine builds and maintain continuity of business.
10. Develop and maintain relationships with assigned customers.
11. Work with market access partners during the keep, find, and close process.
12. Coordinate and communicate cross-regional project information with sales teams in other geographies.
OVERSEE
13 N/A

2024/01/18,ALAM_Project Manager,液空台灣_亞東工業氣體股份有限公司,"About ALAM:

Today’s electronics industry demands materials that enable technologies that improve connectivity, computing power, and energy consumption. Air Liquide offers a complete range of electronics advanced materials including Voltaix™ and ALOHA™ deposition precursors and enScribe™ etchants. Air Liquide activities help the industry to fabricate increasingly complex, compact, and powerful semiconductor chips (or integrated circuits).

The primary focus of the Engineering department is to lead and execute large, mid size capital projects and smaller continuous improvement projects related to commercial chemical manufacturing processes.

The Senior Project manager will act as the central subject matter expert in Project management and perform/manage all aspects of project management activity for the projects executed in support of major product lines and manufacturing areas, providing technical insights, leadership, and disciplined project management for implementation of chemical process intensive projects.
Responsibilities include but are not limited to:

-Develop, track, and manage projects to ensure that projects are executed according to the Project Plan and are completed on time (schedule implies resources) and on budget. Keeps management and all the stakeholders informed on all issues affecting project timeline and budget. Proactively develops plans to mitigate potential issues.
-Responsible for procurement of equipment and materials, and services; and selection and hiring of subcontractors.
-Negotiates project cost with suppliers to achieve optimal cost of ownership.
-Manages material identification, application, receipt, staging, and tracking.
-Responsible for Project execution following various applicable design specifications and standards.
-Responsible for leading cross-functional design reviews, championing “Management of Change” process for project changes, and leading construction pre-startup reviews.
-Responsible for overall field coordination during the project. Coordinate project deliverables and timing with the construction manager(s), project engineers(s) and contractors.

-Ensures that work scope, project documentation, drawings, etc. are developed to meet internal standards/good engineering practice, and regulatory requirements are maintained current throughout the project.
-Ensures appropriate and timely reporting of project progress; including project closeout reports.
-Delivers timely, accurate, and high quality services and products to increase value and achieve customer satisfaction.

-Directly responsible for safe project execution.","其他專案管理師,專案管理主管",待遇面議,全職,彰化縣二水鄉,管理人數未定,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,10年以上,大學、碩士,"化學工程相關,機械工程相關","英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,中文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通",不拘,"專案成本╱品質╱風險管理,專案時間╱進度控管,專案規劃執行╱範圍管理,協商談判能力","- 其他：- 15 years of demonstrated experience in managing capital projects (> $2 MM) in the specialty chemical or similar industry.

- Attention to detail; precision and accuracy are important.","- 福利制度：Air Liquide 不僅為法商在台投資最大的製造商，也是唯一連續4年榮獲HR Asia Awards -「亞洲最佳企業雇主獎」的氣體製造商。
Air Liquide 傾聽員工聲音、鼓勵員工發展、提升員工體驗。如果你具備好奇心，喜歡接觸不同領域與挑戰、擁有高度彈性來面對解決問題、追求長遠多元發展與自我成長，那你絕不能錯過Air Liquide。你將加入一個安全為核心、重視多元與包容、實踐創新及永續行動的環境，讓你打造專屬的Air Liquide Career。

■ 開放、擁抱多元的企業文化

2024/01/18,AP Industry Consultant - Semiconductors,台灣洛克威爾國際股份有限公司,"Role Purpose:
The Regional Industry Consultant is a new role that brings in deep domain expertise for Semiconductors industry through their vast experience and thought leadership on the industry/ segment.
Key Responsibilities:
Provide domain expertise on industry/segment requirement and understand customer and their business challenges.
Deliver talk around emerging industry/segment trends and how they are relevant for a particular customer, the business benefits associated with these and how Rockwell can help achieve these outcomes.
Deliver initial plant walk and initiate consulting services to drive customer outcomes (productivity/OEE/Optimization/ROI).
Support sales in building C- level engagement for target accounts by driving business outcome discussions and be an advisory to identify necessary ecosystem to deliver outcomes.
Single contact for global Industry to launch and support key company initiatives (Kalypso/Strategic accounts/Process/ Sustainability, etc) and interface on critical projects.
Coordinate with Marketing and participate in Industry forums and tradeshows - speaking engagements and delivering white papers.
Coordinate with Market access and support SI/Partner’s enablement (training and credentialing) through industry domain knowledge.
Coordinate with Market access and sales; Identify gaps in industry coverage and identify partner to fill those gaps.
Provide Industry insights and value preposition to marketing/sales enablement for competency development (C level messaging / playbooks).
Support marketing to build Industry BSR (business strategy review and definition of winning across the region; and monitor execution.
Support Business units and Provide insight on Solution and technology gaps.
Requirements:
Bachelor/Master of Science degree in Computer Engineering or other technical fields
+5 years of experience in Semiconductor industry with solid Domain knowledge in the relevant industry and commercial experience is must.
Knowledge of the adequate solution through understanding and experience of “SEMI Standardization”.
Knowledge of new SEMI foundry process and architectures as well as silicon and compound semiconductor materials, device physics and structure, and the carrier transport mechanisms.
Knowledge of the types of SEMI fabrication and foundry process technologies used today and the gaps in today’s technologies and approaches, ongoing research, what promising efforts are underway.
Ability to perform analytical calculations of SEMI process technology, provide accurate technical assessment of various approach.
Ability to understand customer needs related to advanced technology and solution, evaluate the performance of various technology, and define a technology and business roadmap.
Understanding SEMI sustainability required by eco system and proposal “Smart Manufacturing roadmap” to End Users.
Knowledge of the adequate solution through understanding and experience of “SEMI Standardization”
Consultative mindshare and problem-solving capabilities.
Very high degree of customer orientation.
Strong self- drive and ability to create a mindshare by being seen as a thought leader.

Intermediate level of expertise on our equivalent products portfolios with intermediate level of expertise in training. Intermediate expertise in Prospecting & New Customer Development, Project / Implementation Management and Sales Fundamentals with a basic level of expertise in Market Research & Analysis (Market & Economic Trends, Customer Buying Behavior, Competitor Research).
The ability to manage complex, multi-month projects and personnel. Proven track record in delivering white papers and case studies.
Exhibits proficiency and personal accountability for project performance and meeting customer needs.
Geographic understanding of AP as a region is highly desirable.

Ability to travel greater than 30% of time (global travel may be required).","專案經理,國內業務主管,國內業務",待遇面議,全職,台北市中山區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,不拘,專科以上,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,不拘,,"- 福利制度：* 彈性上下班

2024/01/18,【Golf Pride台南】Supply Chain Operation Manager 供應鏈經理,伊頓飛瑞慕品股份有限公司,"財星前五百大Eaton伊頓飛瑞慕品誠徵供應鏈經理!此職位須具備供應鏈end to end完整經驗，我們提供具競爭力的薪酬福利與良好的工作升遷環境，歡迎同行加入我們的行列。
Materials Management

column2: Implement methods, practices, and techniques to ensure optimal movement of materials through the supply chain to achieve cost-effective logistics practices and inventory levels while delivering world class customer experience
Develop the replenishment strategy for part numbers in the MRP system to generate requirements for manufactured and purchased parts while ensuring desired inventory levels are maintained.

Ensure optimal supply chain execution and production through strong cross functional teamwork (Customer Service, Manufacturing, Finance, Program Management) by recommending actions based on ERP planning and reporting

Lead Step 3 (Production and Capacity Planning) and facilitate the SIOP process for the site, ensuring cross-functional participation, accountability, and procedural compliance with each critical step in the process, with focuses on Demand/Supply Alignment and maintaining lead times that meet market expectations.

Analyze and manage aggregate inventory levels in relation to customer requirements to meet profit and inventory targets and goals. Direct the materials planning and procurement team in analyzing the need for and size of strategic inventories to meet customer demand fluctuations. Arranges for the sale of scrap, obsolete, surplus materials and by-products in order to minimize excess material.
Initiating and monitoring a formalized cycle counting procedure to inspect and ensure inventory on-hand accuracy and insuring P L impact communicated to plant finance team.
Manage and develop Shipping/Receiving and Stockroom functions.

column1: Procurement

column2: Execute a global sourcing strategy that simplifies Golf Pride's supply base and leverages our scale for improved cost, delivery performance, and stability of supply.

Lead Golf Pride TW’s material cost out program to identify and execute cost savings projects totaling 3% of spend YoY (net of material economics) through actions including: cost saving project management, negotiation of favorable payment terms, pricing, MOQ, lot sizes, etc. with suppliers.

Ensures that suppliers comply with Eaton's Supplier Code of Conduct and Corporate Social Responsibility standards.  Regularly audits suppliers to ensure responsible sourcing and employment practices consistent with industry guidelines (e.g. ILO), customer requirements, and Golf Pride's brand standard.

Integrate and promote the subcontractor management capability.  Ability to determine capacity needed by subcontractor to meet customer demand. Manage the supplier assessment program and ensure suppliers are meeting or exceeding quality, cost and delivery expectations.

Manage plant purchasing activities for items procured on a local basis. Manages tooling/supplies costs and highlights issues and takes corrective actions to ensure plant meets its profit plant objectives.
Partner with site NPD teams to develop supplier relationships and source new materials necessary to develop breakthrough products in our category.

Partner with site manufacturing teams to drive lowest total cost of acquisition and highest material availability to support ongoing production operations.","資材主管,物管／資材,運輸物流類主管",待遇面議,全職,台南市關廟區,管理5-8人,無需出差外派,日班,週休二日,不限,1人,10年以上,大學以上,"工業工程相關,其他工程相關",英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,不拘,,"- 福利制度：◆ 獎金類

- 具備管理人員經驗尤佳
- 極佳的抗壓性","- 福利制度：Air Liquide 不僅為法商在台投資最大的製造商，也是唯一連續4年榮獲HR Asia Awards -「亞洲最佳企業雇主獎」的氣體製造商。
Air Liquide 傾聽員工聲音、鼓勵員工發展、提升員工體驗。如果你具備好奇心，喜歡接觸不同領域與挑戰、擁有高度彈性來面對解決問題、追求長遠多元發展與自我成長，那你絕不能錯過Air Liquide。你將加入一個安全為核心、重視多元與包容、實踐創新及永續行動的環境，讓你打造專屬的Air Liquide Career。
在Air Liquide，我們有：
■ 開放、擁抱多元的企業文化
■ 重視安全及員工體驗的工作環境
■ 鼓勵與支持人才多元發展及成長
■ 拓展國際視野，與不同國籍與背景的同仁一同合作
加入Air Liquide，跟我們一起成長！#IChooseAirLiquide
你的努力與實力備受矚目：
■ 具競爭力的薪資
■ 績效導向年度調薪制度，薪資再成長
■ 通過內部專業認證，技術津貼上看5,000元 (依職務需求而不同)
■ 員工即股東：以員工優惠價認購法國集團股票，增加被動收入
■ 員工推薦計畫，推薦優秀人才扮演獎金獵人
優於法令的假期，不只休息，更是培養感情、充實自我的好時機
■ 10天特休、8天Air Lquide彈性假，到職即享有 (第一年到職按比例發放)
■ 5天全薪病假，放心看病與休養
■ 14週產假 + 10天陪產假，讓媽媽及伴侶能充分兼顧家庭
■ 子女及兄弟姊妹婚假，不怕錯過家族喜事
讓健康與安全，作為你堅強的後援：
■ 員工團保，涵蓋人壽、意外、醫療及癌症保險。
■ 眷屬團保優惠價，提供父母、子女共同保障。
■ 免費年度健康檢查 + 加購項目優惠價客製個人需求。
■ 防護具及量身訂製耳塞，降低危害風險，保障工作安全。(依職務需求提供)
友善與舒適工作環境，提高工作效力：
■ 信任制的彈性工時及遠距辦公，靈活運用私人時間 (依職務需求調整)
■ 全自動研磨咖啡機、氣泡水機及茶包，讓你無限暢飲
■ 亞東水果日，提供新鮮水果或果汁補充維生素
■ 免費零食小點心，享受下午茶時光
■ 健身房、哺乳室、不定期視障按摩服務及瑜珈等課程
■ EAP員工協助方案，提供法律、財務、身心等諮詢服務，職場私生活不再兩頭燒
■ myVoice 調查，讓集團聽見你的心聲，提升你的員工體驗
運用人才發展資源，提升職能專業、打造職涯舞台：
■ 液空大學：多元主題與多國語系線上課程，隨時充電學習不中斷
■ 輪調文化：鼓勵跨職務、跨國 / 子公司輪調，培養及拓展多元職能
■ 透明、公正、績效導向升遷制度
■ 內部競賽獎勵與績優員工表揚，為你的液空職涯增添亮點
福委會與多元福利，職場生活更有趣：
■ 優渥的國內外旅遊津貼
■ 生日禮金及禮券，慶生續攤沒負擔
■ 三節禮金、禮品及應景活動，找回傳統節慶的回憶
■ 婚喪病生育補助，讓你窩心不傷心
■ 社團活動補助，結交志同道合的朋友
■ 樂活講座，輕鬆吸收生活及旅遊新知
■ 家庭日及志工日，培養親友感情還能為環境永續及弱勢關懷貢獻心力
