2024/01/18,ALES Asia_自動化/軟體設計工程師 (中科-法液空),液空台灣_亞東工業氣體股份有限公司,"法液空電子設備（ALES ASIA）在2006年於台灣成立，是液空集團的分公司，秉承Air Liquide品牌。
ALES ASIA為全球特殊氣體輸送設備需求，提供經過驗證、可靠且經濟高效的解決方案，不論是氣櫃，還是閥門歧管箱。我們還擁有內部的歧管和控制器PLC和HMI設計的客製化服務，確保滿足客戶對操作界面的偏好。法液空的客戶遍布全球，為客戶生產的氣體設備廣泛應用於半導體代工廠、面板廠、LED廠、太陽能廠、實驗室、學校…等應用領域。
1.規劃開發VMB、GC及新產品控制器之硬體及設計線路繪製。
2.建立控制系統原物料(BOM)。
3.撰寫開發VMB、GC及新產品之軟體(HMI&PLC)及程式功能測試。
4.撰寫及完成開發VMB、GC及新產品之相關技術文件。
5.確認控制系統硬體線路圖及相關組成元件符合相關法規安全規範。

6.修改、提升VMB、GC既有相關生產設備軟體功能。","自動控制工程師,軟體工程師,電機技師／工程師",待遇面議,全職,台中市大雅區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間約一個月以下,日班，9:00 ~ 18:00,週休二日,不限,1人,3年以上,大學、碩士,工程學科類,英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,PLC,"軟體工程系統開發,軟體程式設計","- 其他：1. PLC 可程式化邏輯控制器（programmable logic controller) 程式設計編寫,有如下廠牌經驗佳: SIEMENS, OMRON. ALLEN-BRADLEY
2. HMI 人機介面 程式設計編寫,有如下廠牌經驗佳: SIEMENS, Proface

2024/01/18,維保營運管理部_保養維修工程師(新竹),台灣通力電梯股份有限公司,"電梯/扶梯保養員的職責為依照合約、公司政策及作業流程提供現場保養及維修服務。
工作內容包括：
1. 以高品質的服務、主動拜訪及良好的溝通維持客戶滿意度。
2. 負責電梯/扶梯現場拜訪，包括定期保養、維修、及緊急報修(call out)，相關作業需符合通力作業流程規範，並確保回應時間及服務品質。
3. 負責作業現場安全，確實依照規範執行斷電及標示作業。
4. 與維保主任共同討論、有效安排日常維修保養行程。
5. 負責區域：以新竹地區為主。

2024/01/18,Vaccine 事業處 - 業務專員 (小兒疫苗 高雄 全通路),荷商葛蘭素史克藥廠股份有限公司台灣分公司,"Job Purpose and Key Responsibilities:
Why job exists / what it must achieve

column2: Job Purpose

column1: To drive performance of your territory through face-to-face and multi-channel selling and to establish GSK as the customer’s key partner and advisor by making relevant recommendations supported by scientific knowledge which are aligned to the customer’s patient types and needs.

column2: Key Responsibilities

column1: Scientific Knowledge

column2: Continuously builds knowledge of GSK multi-channel brand strategies and leverages that knowledge with customers in informing on prescribing behaviours
Understands GSK and competitor’s brands features and benefits and applies knowledge effectively in their PFSS and multi-channel selling approach
Builds a comprehensive disease and pathology knowledge and leverages it with customers to support decision making
Has strong understanding of treatment guidelines and patient profiles and leverages them to build credibility with customers

column1: Business Planning

column2: Uses multiple data sources to analyse and review territory performance dynamics (including competitor performance) identifying territory trends and opportunities for GSK

Builds territory insights that capture opportunities and drive decision making, including the selection and prioritization of customer targets and the development of robust territory coverage call plans
Develop, based on customer insights, multi-channel business plans with strategically aligned ASMART objectives, strategies and tactical activities that deliver business objectives
Implements multi-channel business plans, uses KPIs to track performance and adjust plans where required

column1: Selling Skills

column2: Effectively engages with customers through a PFSS selling approach or multi-channel selling approach and is proficient in using appropriate multi-channel selling platforms aligned to customer preferences
Actively prepares for, and executes the PFSS selling approach uncovering opportunities, making recommendations aligned to patient and customer needs, addressing objections and effectively closing
Regularly measures sales call performance and seeks FLSL feedback to continuously improve

Builds collaborative internal and external relationships that enhance the customer journey, channels customer feedback into the wider organisation and proactively delivers efficient and effective sales administration

column1: In all areas, demonstrate understanding of and compliance with laws, codes of conduct, policies and frameworks in which GSK operates and live our vision, values and expectations
DEI

GSK is an Equal Opportunity Employer and we want GSK to be a workplace where everyone can feel a sense of belonging and thrive. All qualified applicants will receive equal consideration for employment without regard to disability, race/ethnicity, national origin, religion, sex, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, or age.
Disability

GSK is committed to being inclusive for people with disabilities. With support from our Global Disability Council and our employee resource group, the Disability Confidence Network, we are working hard to create an inclusive workplace where all our people can thrive. Since 2020, GSK has been an active member of the Valuable 500 pledge, a collection of 500 global companies all committed to placing disability inclusion on the leadership agenda. We are delivering on its objectives through our disability confidence plan.",醫藥業務代表,待遇面議,全職,高雄市鹽埕區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,不拘,大學以上,不拘,不拘,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：Basic Requirements:
Critical/essential to accomplish the role

column2: Family Medicine/Endocrinology/Meta/ENT self-pay experience in GP channel is mandatory.
At least 2 years sales representative experience in pharma industry.
Tertiary Education preferably within life sciences
Patient focused
Business planning & execution
Influence, impact and convince others
Personal resilience","- 福利制度：[正職人員]

《員工福利》
＊　入職即按比例享特休假12天。
＊　員工享有生日假、聖誕節放假、全薪疫苗假及每月1天彈性提早下班。
＊　免費咖啡機及牛奶供應、定期發放防疫物資。
＊　提供節慶禮金或禮品、各項員工同樂活動(如年度餐會、家庭日等)。
＊　福利金由公司負擔，免扣員工薪資。
＊　提倡性別平等，保障同性伴侶及多元家庭福利。
＊　生日禮券、結婚禮金、生育補助、怡和集團特約廠商優惠等多項福利。
＊　前線人員配發公務機、油費補助及員工制服。
＊　新進人員享有到職禮包。
《員工保險》
＊　法定勞健保及退休金提撥。
＊　團體保險(員工本人保費為公司支付，員工亦可選擇幫配偶及子女以優惠保費加保)。
＊　機車責任險(前線人員適用)。
《職涯發展》
＊　教育訓練：結合實體訓練及內部線上學習平台，提供技術、管理、銷售、產品等專業課程，培養專業技能。
＊　鼓勵員工考取升降梯證照(考試費用由公司負擔、考取證照後亦可加薪)。
＊　多元升遷管道：跨部門、國內外輪調等多元管道。
＊　個人職涯發展：制定個人發展計畫，安排教育訓練以協助員工提升競爭力。
＊　多元人才培育計畫：集團全球技術/全球管理人才/業務人才培訓計畫，有機會前往海外參與培訓，培養員工成為領導人才。
《健康生活免煩惱》
＊　健康安全：定期員工健檢、公司內聘有專任安全衛生人員，提供職業安全及健康管理資訊。
＊　提供全套工作安全配備(春夏季/秋冬季)。
＊　心靈生活：免費定期駐廠醫療/電話諮詢服務(家屬也適用)，並不定期舉辦心理健康講座。

column2: Achieve sales target and brand objectives (IO products + Chemo) through development and implement brand strategies and sales execution plan in the territory.

Good in oncology operation by segmentation and targeting and build the patient flow in each indication.

Well do the alliance model with colleagues and another company partner to manage the account and reach the account sales goal

2024/01/18,E&C_Site Manager(Construction),液空台灣_亞東工業氣體股份有限公司,"Air Liquide E&C (Engineering & Construction) builds the Group's production units - mainly air gas separation, renewable and low carbon hydrogen production units - and provides external customers with efficient, sustainable, customized technology and process solutions.
Overall Purpose:
Manage and supervise site construction Engineer and subcontractors' job, on behalf of Company to communicate with customers and subcontractors on site.
Responsibilities:
- Represent Company towards other parties presented on construction site (Client, Local Authority, contractors and Company's subcontractor);

- Prior to construction phase, make necessary preparation for site construction works: elaborate construction work schedule; participate to the selection and pre-qualification of contractors; prepare or revises work package technical documents for inquiry; review and validate contractor technical proposals;
- Monitor and control the construction activities and work performed by the Construction Supervisors reporting to him, and by the contractors;
- Provide technical assistance and support to contractors to ensure the proper understanding and application of AL standards and procedures;

- Animate and co-ordinate HSE activities: define and up-date the Site Safety Plan, ensures the compliance with its requirements; take corrective actions and follow-up on the treatment of accidents and/or unsafe situations following safety audits; have the authority to notify any contractor to immediately suspend its work or part of its work if the hazard in question constitutes a serious and immediate threat to the safety of persons or property;

- Ensure Quality Assurance and Quality Control on site: define and up-date the CCMP and ITP, ensure compliance with its requirements; perform quality inspections; open, control and follow-up on the treatment of non conformance and/or anomalies; take corrective actions and follow-up on the treatment of non conformance and/or anomalies following quality audits; have the authority to request from any contractor quality controls, to check, inspect, witness, approve or reject work or part of work;
- Organize the reception, inspection and handing over of Company equipment and materials to contractors;
- Duly delivery weekly report with accurate information and data of execution and complete status on site HSE, construction schedule, quality control, and etc.
- Create, develop and keep monthly update the schedule and progress with activities properly linked , required format and usage the Global WBS.
- Organize, file and maintain project site documentation, make available the as-built documents by the end of construction works;
- Guarantee and Monitor management of IP protection on site.
- Organize the interface and conduct the transfer of responsibilities (work progress, quality, safety, site management) with Commissioning Manager;
- Collect lessons learned during construction and participate to and prepare Lessons Learned Review for Construction;

- Propose evolution to codes and standards related to construction works.","土木技師／工程師,營建主管,營造工程師",待遇面議,全職,新竹市,管理人數未定,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,5年以上,大學、碩士,"化學工程相關,機械工程相關,土木工程相關","英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,中文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通",不拘,"土木工程施工與監造,工程管理,工程管理-品質管理,工程施工監督管理,工地工程稽核與驗收,工程協調與問題處理","- 其他：- Bachelor degree in engineering (chemical / mechanical / civil) or above;
- At least 5 years experience in site construction;
- Good management, organization and coordination skills;
- Good English.","- 福利制度：Air Liquide 不僅為法商在台投資最大的製造商，也是唯一連續4年榮獲HR Asia Awards -「亞洲最佳企業雇主獎」的氣體製造商。
Air Liquide 傾聽員工聲音、鼓勵員工發展、提升員工體驗。如果你具備好奇心，喜歡接觸不同領域與挑戰、擁有高度彈性來面對解決問題、追求長遠多元發展與自我成長，那你絕不能錯過Air Liquide。你將加入一個安全為核心、重視多元與包容、實踐創新及永續行動的環境，讓你打造專屬的Air Liquide Career。
在Air Liquide，我們有：
■ 開放、擁抱多元的企業文化
■ 重視安全及員工體驗的工作環境
■ 鼓勵與支持人才多元發展及成長
■ 拓展國際視野，與不同國籍與背景的同仁一同合作
加入Air Liquide，跟我們一起成長！#IChooseAirLiquide
你的努力與實力備受矚目：
■ 具競爭力的薪資
■ 績效導向年度調薪制度，薪資再成長
■ 通過內部專業認證，技術津貼上看5,000元 (依職務需求而不同)
■ 員工即股東：以員工優惠價認購法國集團股票，增加被動收入
■ 員工推薦計畫，推薦優秀人才扮演獎金獵人
優於法令的假期，不只休息，更是培養感情、充實自我的好時機
■ 10天特休、8天Air Lquide彈性假，到職即享有 (第一年到職按比例發放)
■ 5天全薪病假，放心看病與休養
■ 14週產假 + 10天陪產假，讓媽媽及伴侶能充分兼顧家庭
■ 子女及兄弟姊妹婚假，不怕錯過家族喜事
讓健康與安全，作為你堅強的後援：
■ 員工團保，涵蓋人壽、意外、醫療及癌症保險。
■ 眷屬團保優惠價，提供父母、子女共同保障。
■ 免費年度健康檢查 + 加購項目優惠價客製個人需求。
■ 防護具及量身訂製耳塞，降低危害風險，保障工作安全。(依職務需求提供)
友善與舒適工作環境，提高工作效力：
■ 信任制的彈性工時及遠距辦公，靈活運用私人時間 (依職務需求調整)
■ 全自動研磨咖啡機、氣泡水機及茶包，讓你無限暢飲
■ 亞東水果日，提供新鮮水果或果汁補充維生素
■ 免費零食小點心，享受下午茶時光
■ 健身房、哺乳室、不定期視障按摩服務及瑜珈等課程
■ EAP員工協助方案，提供法律、財務、身心等諮詢服務，職場私生活不再兩頭燒
■ myVoice 調查，讓集團聽見你的心聲，提升你的員工體驗
運用人才發展資源，提升職能專業、打造職涯舞台：
■ 液空大學：多元主題與多國語系線上課程，隨時充電學習不中斷
■ 輪調文化：鼓勵跨職務、跨國 / 子公司輪調，培養及拓展多元職能
■ 透明、公正、績效導向升遷制度
■ 內部競賽獎勵與績優員工表揚，為你的液空職涯增添亮點
福委會與多元福利，職場生活更有趣：
■ 優渥的國內外旅遊津貼
■ 生日禮金及禮券，慶生續攤沒負擔
■ 三節禮金、禮品及應景活動，找回傳統節慶的回憶
■ 婚喪病生育補助，讓你窩心不傷心
■ 社團活動補助，結交志同道合的朋友
■ 樂活講座，輕鬆吸收生活及旅遊新知
■ 家庭日及志工日，培養親友感情還能為環境永續及弱勢關懷貢獻心力

2024/01/18,(宜康居家護理所)推廣專員-呼吸治療(台南),液空台灣_亞東工業氣體股份有限公司,"維佳(VitalAire)為法國液空集團(Air Liquide)成立的醫療事業群，致力於提供專業醫護人員及患者全方位的呼吸照護方案。我們有專業的團隊，提供病患從呼吸相關機器挑選、試用、諮詢及客製化服務，達到改善患者生活與支援醫護人員之目的。
因應持續成長，我們正在尋找對呼吸治療有熱忱的你加入我們的團隊，負責南部地區呼吸器產品推廣，運用你的專業去幫助更多病患，為他們打造更優質的生活。
職務內容：
1. 客戶關係管理，運用RT專業至南區醫療院所推廣呼吸器產品並分享相關知識
2. 提供專業呼吸器產品試機，進行衛教、銷售服務和保健建議
其他條件：
1. 具呼吸治療師證照且臨床經驗兩年以上
2. 需自備汽車，公司將提供油資補助
3. 工作時間穩定，讓你達到工作與生活平衡

4. 依照勞基法規定休假，不需要排班及輪班，有更多有家人朋友相處的時間","醫藥業務代表,國內業務,呼吸治療師",待遇面議,全職,台南市仁德區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,週休二日,不限,1人,2年以上,專科、大學、碩士,醫藥衛生學科類,不拘,不拘,"客戶資料更新維護,業務或通路開發,業績目標分配與績效達成,業績與管理報表撰寫,客戶情報蒐集,產品介紹及解說銷售,護理指導及諮詢,呼吸治療器材之使用與維護",,"- 福利制度：Air Liquide 不僅為法商在台投資最大的製造商，也是唯一連續4年榮獲HR Asia Awards -「亞洲最佳企業雇主獎」的氣體製造商。

e-learning教育訓練、或其他社內外教育訓練。
2. 完整有制度的員工評價升遷制度。
3. 每年語言學習補助：英文、日文學習費補助及檢定獎勵金。
4. 年中．年終獎金、每年調薪制度、三節禮金禮品。

6. 員工及眷屬團體保險（含壽險、意外險、醫療險、癌症險）。
7. 員工出差平安保險（含意外險及醫療險）。
8. 優於政府機關行事曆的休假（暑休等．．．）。
9.上班時間為星期一到五的9:00～17:30，為7個半小時。（中午休息時間為1小時）
FA事業部技術人員上班時機為8:30～17:00，為7個半小時。（中午休息時間為1小時）
10.每日上下班通勤之交通津貼實支實付。
11.專業健檢中心年度健康檢查及健檢餐。

職責/工作內容
1.協助現場服務經理，為現場服務的行政營運和客戶提供支援。
2.安排現場服務差旅事宜(包括但不限於住宿、航班、派車、簽證、工作許可證、環安培訓等事宜)。
3.協助向承攬商下採購訂單並驗證發票。
4.更新資料檔案、人員資料庫和其他須維護之文件。
5.監控和更新維修工作計劃時間表。
6.協助現場服務工期追蹤和人力調度。
7.報價和採購訂單的管理。
8.協助準備與工作相關信函。
9.執行一般行政文書，以及直屬主管指定的其他臨時要求，這可能包括協助現場服務團隊獲得工作許可證、將資訊更新到客戶資料庫/內部網路等...。
10.由於客戶需求的變化，有可能需要在正常辦公時間之外工作（或週末）。
11.擷取現場服務工作相關成本（工時和費用）並將其輸入 ERP 系統，包括收集時間表和費用報告。
12.協助準備發票，根據採購訂單定義計算發票金額。
13.協助為客戶提供有關發票事宜的所有查詢的支援。
14.為技術服務部門提供人員調度、發票等方面的支援。
15.維護 FSE 稼動率、簡歷、安全培訓記錄、個人資訊以及與工作派遣相關的所有資料。
16.提交報價單和銷售發票。
17.維護核准的供應商清單 (AVL)，包括人員詳細資料。
18.維護、更新ERP系統手冊，協助P6系統等。

2024/01/17,Product Compliance Program Manager,美商哥倫美雅有限公司台灣分公司_COLUMBIA SPORTSWEAR COMPANY,"Product Compliance Program Manager is responsible for the management of Product Compliance and Restricted Substances programs and maintaining company product compliance standards throughout the global manufacturing base, with the goal of meeting customer requirements and reduce/eliminate risk to consumers, the environment, the company, and brands. This role requires identifying the performance gap of the vendor partners, managing the complexity of the supply chain, and making recommendations to drive improvement in chemical management and product compliance.
Product Compliance and Chemical Management Policy Implementation and Training

- Manage corporate Restricted Substance List (RSL) policy implementation and product compliance failure remediation with vendors partners and internal business partners, supplier product compliance tracking and reporting.
- Manage corporate Chemical Management Policy deployment, aligning with industrial practice and meeting the minimal requirements.
- Establish a compliance testing program to meet country regulation requirements and validate product compliance to ensure we take the due diligence liability.

- Identify and analyze the performance gap of the supply chain to develop the required training program, collaborating with manufacturing partners including liaison office material team and production. Provide recommendations to solve vendor's challenges during the program implementation.

- Communicate and deliver technical RSL and chemical management training to internal and external stakeholders, acting as the technical center to business partners for product compliance requirements.
Supply Chain Product Compliance and Chemical Management Performance Assessment

- Establish and manage a database for product compliance documents and declarations of conformity. Facilitate with liaison office Materials, Production, Sourcing and Corporate Responsibility Managers to create a vendor compliance tracking process that incorporates RSL and product safety compliance.
- Execute the Chemical Management assessment tools (Higg FEM) to the supply chain, driving the completion and verification rate improvement to give visibility of supply chain performance.
- Manage factory KPI to measure chemical compliance performance and support the integration with the material sourcing system.
Supply Chain Engagement and Improvement
- Build relationships with vendors and provide support and leadership when vendor partners have difficulties with chemical management.
- Lead vendor meeting to communicate vendor performance and make recommendations of scorecard improvement.

- Manage Chemical Management capacity building programs by collaborating with business partner and service providers, including stakeholders' engagement, program status tracking, make recommendation of improvement, negotiate with vendors or manufacturing partners to adopt required change.","紡織化學工程師,產品管理師,永續管理師",待遇面議,全職,台北市中山區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間約一個月以下,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,10年以上,大學、碩士,"化學相關,環境工程相關,紡織工程相關",英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,Power BI​,不拘,"- 其他：- Degree holder of environmental /chemistry / textile related discipline
- Familiar with global compliance regulation such as CPSIA, REACH and KC mark

- Good communication and analytical skills
- Good command in spoken English and Chinese (including Mandarin)
- Candidate with practical testing experience from commercial laboratory is also considered
- Travelling is required

2024/01/17,【290838】GPN醫藥業務專員(雙北區) (Sr.) Medical Specialist/Supervisor,台灣諾和諾德藥品股份有限公司,"About the department
關於本部門

Novo Nordisk is a global healthcare company with 100 years of innovation and leadership in diabetes care. This heritage has given us experience and capabilities that also enable us to help people defeat obesity, hemophilia, growth disorders, rare diseases, and other serious chronic diseases. Headquartered in Denmark, Novo Nordisk employs over 55,000 people globally and markets its products in more than 170 countries.

As part of a globally successful pharmaceutical business, Novo Nordisk Taiwan is a high-growth affiliate with an exciting growth trajectory and pipeline in new products and therapy areas in the coming years. We proudly live our purpose of improving the lives of patients within the therapy areas our products treat and put both patients and people firmly in the centre of everything we do.
諾和諾德是一家全球醫療保健公司，擁有百年的糖尿病護理創新和領導經驗。這個傳統為我們帶來了豐富的經驗和能力，讓我們也能夠幫助人們戰勝肥胖症、血友病、生長障礙、罕見疾病和其他嚴重慢性疾病。諾和諾德總部位於丹麥，全球擁有超過55,000名員工，產品在170多個國家銷售。
作為一家全球成功的製藥企業的一部分，諾和諾德台灣是一家高成長的子公司，未來幾年在新產品和治療領域的發展計劃中具有令人興奮的增長潛力。我們自豪地實踐使命，改善我們產品治療的治療領域中患者的生活，並將患者和員工放在我們做事情的中心位置。
Key responsibilities and job tasks
主要職責與工作任務
-Responsible for territory management, including listing, scientific communication and tender protection.
(全方位的區域管理者, 包括進藥. 產品學術溝通, 及議價. 保藥)
-Keep closely relationship with KOL within responsible area according to segmentation and targeting, utilize selling skills to ensure customer needs are met in order to achieve sales target
(針對業績指標及客戶分級能有效的建立拜訪計劃並且與重要客戶維持良好關係,同時運用有效銷售技巧溝通, 來達到客戶需求並達成業績目標)
-Identify new business opportunities and gain new expanded business.
(洞察巿場契機並開發. 創造新的業績機會)

-Have willing to develop new accounts and new physicians/customers, as well as new source of businesses (meaning new patients, and new channels) and timely feedback market intelligence, request reports regularly.
(勇於開發潛力區域並且開創新業務機會點, 同時可以定期回饋巿場訊息並準時提供報表)
-Execute marketing strategy, execute sales call plans, but also identify new prospects, and also validate these new prospects and align with manager to achieve sales target and goal.
(確切執行行銷策略及制定拜訪計劃, 精確執行業務計劃並且和業務主官共同擬定主要策略以強化銷售行為並完成公司目標)
-Agility, accountability and resiliency to successfully manage task in a dynamic environment. willing to try out new paths, channels, get the learning, and evolve the plans and execution again.
(在變化快速的環境中擁有靈活及當責的精神去成功接受工作挑戰, 高執行力並擁有極高熱忱接受所有新的通路挑戰並勇於學習新事物)
-Ensure all activities in territory are executed with professionalism and comply with NN compliance standard.
(自我管理佳, 所有區域活動具高專業度並遵守諾和諾德商業行為規範)
-Be a professional problem solver, innovative thinker and good business acumen..
(專業問題解決者, 具有創新思考及高度巿場敏銳度)
-Can-do attitude, willing to explore new/underdeveloped territories, identify new opportunities, able to tackle uncertainties and adapt fast.
(勇於開拓新巿場及未知商機, 極積尋求機會點, 並迅速適應未知環境所帶來的挑戰及衝擊)
We commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants.
我們承諾實施共融的招聘流程，為所有求職者提供平等的機會。

At Novo Nordisk we recognize that it is no longer good enough to aspire to be the best company in the world. We need to aspire to be the best company for the world and we know that this is only possible with talented employees with diverse perspectives, backgrounds and cultures. We are therefore committed to creating an inclusive culture that celebrates the diversity of our employees, the patients we serve and communities we operate in. Together, we’re life changing.

在諾和諾德，我們認識到僅僅立志成為世界上最好的公司已經不夠了。我們需要立志成為最合適世界的公司，而我們知道這只有在擁有具有不同視角、背景和文化的才華員工的情況下才能實現。因此，我們致力於創建一個包容性文化，慶祝我們員工、我們服務的患者和我們所處的社區的多樣性。因為一起努力，我們共同改變生命。","國內業務,醫藥業務代表,其他醫療人員",待遇面議,全職,台北市大安區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班，09:00~18:00,依公司規定,一個月內,1人,3年以上,大學、碩士,"藥學相關,其他醫藥衛生相關",英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,"Excel,Outlook,PowerPoint,Word",不拘,"- 其他：Qualifications

The scope covers the management and support on Infrastructure, Servers and End-user working environment to ensure satisfied IT services and less interruption on business operation.

• In summary, the main mission is to be responsible for the delivery and end-to-end operation of Infrastructure (network, servers) and end-user working environment (workplace). Collaborate across functions to work on various IT solutions by utilizing Project Management measure, work with local or overseas IT teams and partners to prioritize tasks, manage project plans and tasks include analysis, review and reports to fulfill IT goals.
• Responsible for the management and issue resolving of Network according to plans, tasks and incidents.
• Responsible for the management, operations, issue resolving of Windows and Linux servers, ensure timely and proper patching, troubleshooting and recovery.

• Lead the IT helpdesk to manage all IT issues at user-end, ensure timely support for incidents by providing appropriate workaround or solutions. Also work as level 2 to support IT helpdesk appropriately.
• Support the management and issues of Oracle database. Work with Application owners, DBAs and overseas IT teams on Oracle database system for incident and operations.
• Work across teams to manage IT assets for the associated solutions and operations, including the device of network, voice, and user-end.
• Actively build the relationship with stakeholders to understand the demands, evaluate and recommend IT solutions from technology and process perspectives based on cost and benefits.
• Take the company lesson and utilize LEAN methodology to make improvements, collaborate with IT groups and stakeholders to explore, justify and prioritize the opportunities.
• Work with IT team to manage suppliers and contracts of IT services.
• Ensure all IT solutions and technology are tested per requirements before production; as well as the upgrade, patching and compliance after production according to policy and regulations.
• Ensure IT demands and tasks follows the processes of Incident, Problem and Change, and utilize appropriate report measure to track and present the status.

• Keep learning and developing personal technology, management skills and leadership according to IT development and demands.","MIS程式設計師,MIS／網管主管,系統工程師",待遇面議,全職,桃園市大園區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班，08:30~17:30,週休二日,不限,1人,8年以上,大學、碩士,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,"Database Management,MS SQL,Oracle ERP",不拘,"- 其他：Qualification and Requirements -

2024/01/17,【292019】Financial Planning& Analysis (Sr.) Specialist/Supervisor,台灣諾和諾德藥品股份有限公司,"About the department

Novo Nordisk is a global healthcare company with 100 years of innovation and leadership in diabetes care. This heritage has given us experience and capabilities that also enable us to help people defeat obesity, hemophilia, growth disorders, rare diseases, and other serious chronic diseases. Headquartered in Denmark, Novo Nordisk employs over 55,000 people globally and markets its products in more than 170 countries.

As part of a globally successful pharmaceutical business, Novo Nordisk Taiwan is a high-growth affiliate with an exciting growth trajectory and pipeline in new products and therapy areas in the coming years. We proudly live our purpose of improving the lives of patients within the therapy areas our products treat and put both patients and people firmly in the centre of everything we do.
Key responsibilities and job tasks:
• Liaise different Functions to support monthly forecast, rolling estimate, annual plan and long-term planning, and be able to validate the data
• Prepare management report to Leadership team with financial analysis.
• Prepare different reporting and ensure data accuracy and consistency across the deliverables
• Support operations of sales target setup for Sales Team.
• Leverage Business Intelligence tool to enable data analysis, visualization and driving simplicity.
• Provide analytical review and identify underlying financial performance trends with business dynamics.
• Ad-hoc business projects
You will join the Financial Planning and Analysis team under Finance Department and report to FP&A manager.
We commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants.

At Novo Nordisk we recognize that it is no longer good enough to aspire to be the best company in the world. We need to aspire to be the best company for the world and we know that this is only possible with talented employees with diverse perspectives, backgrounds and cultures. We are therefore committed to creating an inclusive culture that celebrates the diversity of our employees, the patients we serve and communities we operate in. Together, we’re life changing.",財務分析／財務人員,待遇面議,全職,台北市大安區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班，9:00~18:00,週休二日,不限,1人,3年以上,大學以上,"會計學相關,其他商業及管理相關,財稅金融相關",不拘,"Tableau,Power BI​",不拘,"- 其他：Minimum knowledge required to fulfill job responsibilities.

2024/01/17,IT Team Leader (課長),長異發動機維修股份有限公司,"Position Summary -
Information Technology department aims to provide secure, stable and trustworthy IT services including hardware and software to fulfill business goals, development and daily operations.
Key Responsibilities  -
• Owns the accountability and ownership of end-to-end IT operations to lead IT team to achieve the goals of Corporation and IT, fulfill function’s demands by systematic thinking.
• Lead the applications operation. Prioritize tasks, manage project plans include analysis, reviews and reports to fulfill IT goals.

• Responsible for IT Operation and report out to leaders periodically. Lead and manage IT operation groups, establish operational targets and decisions to achieve operational effectiveness and efficiency by cost-effective ways, ensure all IT groups continuously deliver services and fulfill function requirements, and act as a 2nd level in escalation framework to manage all IT issues.
• Assist IT leader to manage department based on IT plans. Lead, coach and train IT members by setting up expectation, performance reviews and career growth opportunities.

• Analyze demands, evaluate options and decide IT solutions from technology and process perspectives based on pros and cons. Actively build the relationship with stakeholders, realize demands and transform into IT services.
• Utilize project management methodology to lead and manage the development, operation and problem solving of IT services according to IT plans
• Utilize LEAN framework to make improvements, collaborate with IT groups and stakeholders to explore, justify and prioritize the opportunities.
• Manage suppliers and contracts of IT services. Participate negotiations and discussions across functions, IT groups and suppliers to design, build, operate and solve IT solutions.
• Ensure all IT application systems are tested per requirements before production, as well as the upgrade, patch and compliance after production according to policy and regulations.
• Evaluate IT risks and establish associated IT contingency plans based on defined and agreed service scope and levels
• Continuously improve IT services by the analysis of monitoring and statistics on performance and expenditure.
• Ensure IT management and support follows the processes of Incident, Problem and Change, and instructs IT groups by necessary technology and leadership.

• Provide IT solution options according to all constraints and analysis, manage the procurement of hardware and software to achieve expectations on benefits (ROI, VOI), and oversee the change on cost plan.
• Keep learning and developing personal technology, management skills and leadership according to IT development and demands.

• Provide leadership to IT groups to achieve missions and grow talents.","MIS／網管主管,軟體專案主管",待遇面議,全職,桃園市大園區,管理4人以下,無需出差外派,日班，08:30~17:30,週休二日,不限,1人,8年以上,大學、碩士,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,"SDLC,Java,Spring,Database Management",不拘,"- 其他：Qualification and Requirements -

2. 確保公司的產品、服務流程等，符合當地法令規範。
3. 規劃國際商展與企劃，協調並配合公司行銷策略（如：展覽、廣告、會議）。
4. 針對客戶提出的合約（交易條件、生產流程、產品要求、售後服務）作初步評估，並在必要時尋求其他部門協助，以即時回應客戶需求。
5. 提供報價確認訂單準時出貨。
6. 協助經銷商業績成長，維持通路價格秩序，訂定客戶業績目標，增加市場佔有率。
7. 反應及蒐集市場訊息，協助經銷商規劃行銷活動，或是以銷售競賽、佣金或折扣的方式鼓勵客戶進行銷售，以提昇品牌市佔率。
8. 即時反應客戶抱怨及協助客戶解決產品、出貨流程、退貨重工等相關的問題，並提出解決之道，以提高客戶滿意度。
9. 提醒客戶應收帳款情形，定期檢視客戶現行付款期限是否合理，並隨時回報客戶帳款異常情況，以保障公司權益。

2024/01/17,Senior Workday Integration Specialist - Taiwan,"Specialized Bicycle Components, Inc._美商斯貝特自行車股份有限公司台灣分公司","As the Workday Integrations Systems Analyst, you will be responsible for providing integration support to include requirements, design, development, testing, conversion, migration, and maintenance of assigned integrations associated with Workday systems.
How you will make a difference

column2: Manage and provide application integration support to include requirements, design, development, testing, conversion, migration, and maintenance of assigned integrations associated with Workday and other systems
Document business requirements, decisions, business processes, and workflows in relevant documentation, including SOP’s, training guides, quick reference guides.
Analyze, design and build new custom reports using standard Workday reporting functionality. Ensure custom reports function as designed based on business requirements.
Test, validate and implement configuration changes in Workday including Integrations, Business Processes, Calculated Fields, and Security.
Work directly with the business users, internal teams, and vendors for both support and project work.
Ability to prioritize Workday issues and enhancements and provide timely follow-up and resolution, including escalating to third-party vendors.
Stay up-to-date on Workday features and enhancements that could benefit the organization.
Create, review and participate in functional testing for all HR system fixes, upgrades, patches, and other maintenance; two major upgrades per year as well as weekly enhancements.
Assist with the planning of enterprise level projects including defining the scope, goals, course of action, work needed, timeline and budget.
Assist in development and implementation of user training for current and new systems; and knowledge sharing to associates.
Create, maintain and monitor system security roles and functionality.
Provide day-to-day system monitoring and user support.

column1: What you need to win

column2: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience
At least 5 years of experience with Workday integration projects (e.g. Recruitment, Learning, Talent, Benefits, Payroll, Time & Absence, Time Tracking)

Experience using Workday integration tools and technologies to manage and provide application integration support to include requirements, design, development, testing, conversion, migration, and maintenance of integrations
Experience leading projects, and reporting on work status
Experience with Enterprise Interface Builder (EIB).
Experience with global resources across multiple geographic locations is a plus
Strong communication skills. Fluent in English, both verbal and written.
Great organizational and analytical skills, with a track record of managing multiple priorities in a deadline-driven environment.
Results-oriented with the ability to thrive in chaotic situations, turning ambiguity into actions across multi-functional teams.
Affinity with HR and functional knowledge of core HR business processes.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Ability to manage and prioritize multiple tasks.
Ability to manage confidential data professionally.
Eager to learn and a true team player.
Passion for cycling or outdoor sports is a plus.

Workday Certifications from a Workday Partner or Workday Pro Certification preferred","人力資源人員,人力資源主管",待遇面議,全職,台中市南屯區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,週休二日,不限,1人,5年以上,大學以上,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,不拘,- 其他：Please also submit your English CV (resume) here at https://specialized.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/Specialized_External_Career_Site/job/Senior-Workday-Integration-Specialist_R0008404,"- 福利制度：* Work-Life Balance - Fun, active environment – ride bikes at lunch time (1.5 hrs)!

2024/01/17,|Services| Services Representative 客戶服務工程師(北部),法商_施耐德電機股份有限公司,"您將在客戶現場對所有施耐德產品進行安裝、檢查、維護、故障排除和維修客戶設備和提供技術支援。利用各種工具測試電路和設備、分析設備故障原因並為客戶說明維護手冊內容。
工作職責：
1. 提供卓越的客戶服務與建議。
2. 對施耐德電氣產品組合中的設備執行啟動/調整/測試。
3. 對設備進行預防性、計劃性和計劃外維護。
4. 記錄每個站點所有必需信息，並提供技術報告。
5. 現場工作執行後，提供當日的服務時間和費用，由客戶簽字驗收。
6. 正確記錄、標記設備維修時所使用的所有故障或短缺料件，並將其送回指定的維修地點。
※此職務須能配合客戶地點出差至其他縣市，但多為當日往返行程，無須長期派駐外地。
※台北/高雄皆有辦公室，歡迎北中南優秀人選踴躍投遞應徵。
What you will do:
1. Provide outstanding customer service.
2. Advise customers on best practice, new services and upgrade opportunities.
3. Perform Startup/Commissioning on equipment across the Schneider Electric product portfolio.
4. Perform Preventive, scheduled and unscheduled Maintenance on equipment.
5. Track Installed Base. (serviceable assets)
6. Submit Opportunity Detected during his interventions.
7. Support serviceable Schneider equipment including but not limited to: electrical switchgear, HVAC/CRAC systems, UPS systems, PDUs, RPPs, BMS systems, PLCs, HMIs, Drives.
8. Leads or contributes to Field Services small projects coordination and execution on customer site. (end of life, modernization, upgrade etc)
9. Must have proven skill level to interpret blueprints and other service documents, including but not limited to, specifications, reporting and quality requirements.
10. Perform basic audits of customer’s electrical systems and equipment.

2024/01/17,Product Marketing Director / 台北,ABB Ltd._艾波比股份有限公司,"Represent Global Division(s) in the Country to grow sales and market. Define, plan and ensure implementation of product marketing strategies in assigned area to meet business objectives and in line with global product strategy. Oversee all sales and marketing activities, and support sales organizations in driving sales and services of respective products.
Main Accountabilities:
Strategy leadership

• Creates, plans and ensures implementation of the local go-to–market product marketing strategy including definition and communication of product value propositions and product positioning in accordance with the global product marketing strategy.
Performance targets
• Ensures achievement of established targets through oversight and definition of improvement actions as needed.
• Focuses on achievement of total demand orders (ABB and 3rd Party), growth margin %, net price variance, Net Promoter Score (NPS), inventory turn on finished goods, and requested on-time delivery.
Marketing and business development
• Develops and implements annual marketing plan in conjunction with relevant Business Units/Product Groups.
• Prepares business plans focused on business development for a defined market.
• Evaluates market opportunities and decides appropriate activities in line with the strategy.
• Coordinates opportunities across local Divisions and local Business Units where appropriate.
Growth
• Ensures profitable business growth in the domestic market.
• Ensures a balanced growth through all product lines/Product Groups/Business Units.
• Creates demand through technical promotion, providing solutions and a value base selling approach.
• Implements Business Unit market pricing policy.
Sales support
• Provides product and technical support to sales team.
Customer relations and satisfaction
• Builds and maintains strong relationships with new and existing customers to ensure ongoing customer satisfaction.
• Understands customer needs in the market by visiting customers.
• Ensures the customer satisfaction surveys are executed; analyzes results and assists with corrective actions.
• Develops and implement product support and product training to ensure high customer satisfaction in cooperation with global Business Unit Marketing and Sales.
• Drives continuous improvement on NPS. Ensures the resolution of customer issues
Logistics and delivery
• Works together with the Order Handling team and the Logistics team to ensure operational efficiency on inventory and customer satisfaction on delivery.
Standards and governance

• Implements and ensures compliance with global and local standards, rules, tools, policies and processes related to operations/project execution and shares functional best practices and lessons learned across the organization.
People leadership and development

2024/01/17,Project Manager / 高雄,ABB Ltd._艾波比股份有限公司,"Job Summary:

Lead the execution of medium-size projects and ensure that all related activities are performed in accordance with ABB policy, relevant cyber security regulations and standards, contractual agreements, quality standards, health, safety & environment requirements, financial targets, and schedule commitments.
Main Accountabilities:
Project leadership

• Leads the project team, establishes the project execution approach, and oversees project hand-over, execution planning, and monitoring and control activities for both internal and external resources in order to accomplish all project goals.
• Provides performance feedback regarding allocated resources working on projects.
Instructions and guidelines
• Active involvement in continuous improvement and simplification.
• Supports improving guidelines, tools, and templates.
• Ensures compliance to relevant cyber security regulations, standards, and contractual requirements.
Budget, sales, and operations planning
• Supports local Sales and Tendering through early involvement in tenders.
Project execution and control
• Ensures that the project follows execution best practices and ABB policies.
• Effectively monitors and controls project progress and efficient resource utilization.
• Monitors and controls project financials, overseeing project invoicing status, cost, expenses, and cash flow.
• Identifies, qualifies, quantifies, and manages project risks and ensures that all opportunities are identified and pursued.
• Captures, analyses and shares lessons learned throughout the project.
• Drives the formal acceptance of the project, contract close-out and acknowledgement by the customer, all in accordance with the contract.
Contract and claims/ & Procurement Management
• Ensures that the project consistently applies contract and claims management, in accordance with ABB policies and contractual agreements.
• Coordinates with Supply Chain Management and successfully procures required services, materials, and equipment for the project from external and internal suppliers.
• Supports Procurement and Logistics in supplier negotiations, claims and project changes.
Stakeholder relations
• Acts as the key contact for the customer and an escalation point for project issues.
• Builds and maintains strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders and effectively communicates with all stakeholders.
Health, safety, and environment (HSE)
• Ensures the project follows and complies with company health, safety, and environmental policies.
• Creates project HSE Plans and ensures that common HSE policies and reporting are implemented across the project with all stakeholders, including collaboration/consortium partners and sub-suppliers.
• Demonstrates unique actions/initiatives to support site safety and ensures consistent HSE performance.
Project Recovery
• Demonstrates and proactively applies immediate recovery actions to mitigate schedule delays and cost overruns.
Planning and scheduling
• Defines and applies project scheduling techniques to manage schedule risks proactively to avoid possible future schedule deviations with OTD impact.
• Applies earned value method to manage critical path and project float to optimize the schedule.
• Accurately forecasts schedule to determine if the project is still within defined tolerance ranges and identifies any necessary change requests to drive the closure.
• Plans and tracks all project activities, establishes scheduling risks and opportunities in order to deliver projects on time according to commitments to the customer and ABB.
• Demonstrates ability to guide and collaborate with a project planning and control specialist.
Document Management
• Identifies and plans all document deliverables required by the contractual scope of work and incorporates this plan into the overall project plan/schedule.

• Tracks document progress and follows-up on overdue comments from customer.","專案經理,其他專案管理師",待遇面議,全職,高雄市前鎮區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,3年以上,大學以上,"電機電子工程相關,電機電子維護相關,機械工程相關",英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：Education and Experience:

【全方位保險】提供員工及眷屬團體保險，並由公司全額負擔保費
【 年度健檢】每年定期健康檢查，員工進階健檢

== 兼顧工作與生活，樂在工作 ==
【 EAP員工協助方案】提供24小時外部專業諮詢服務，守護同仁及眷屬身心健康
【 VIOCE員工建議箱】鼓勵員工署名或匿名表達心聲與提供建議，共同打造良好環境
【健康促進】健康促進講座、運動及各項保健宣導
【志工關懷】每位同仁一年8小時給薪志工假，志工服務彈性選擇
【多元共融】委員會定期舉辦訓練、講座及活動，促進性別、年齡、種族、身心障礙及性傾向多元共融
【安全先行】安全促進宣導及行動、員工安全提報建議，打造職場安全環境
【友善環境】孕婦專屬停車位、哺乳室、性別友善廁所
== 暢快學習，發展不設限 ==
【專業職能精進】專業職能課程，技術證照以及定期回訓補助、英文學習補助
【領導力培育】因應不同職級需求，量身打造國內外領導力培訓課程
【內部傳承學習】內部種子講師團隊年度徵選、培訓及回訓補助
【多元企業大學】 線上學習系統，豐富學習資源隨身帶著走
【SPRINT Program】新進人員到職90天學程，入職夥伴(Buddy)支持

【薪酬獎金】每年定期檢視薪資結構、依個人績效及公司年度運營成果發放年度獎金
【職能晉級路徑】供應鏈及設備服務技術職能晉級路徑與年度評核
【職涯機會無設限】鼓勵職務輪調，提供內部職缺申請、人才調遷補助與人才推薦獎勵

2024/01/11,"Professional Sales Specialist , Vaccine 成人疫苗 GP 高雄區",荷商葛蘭素史克藥廠股份有限公司台灣分公司,"Job Purpose and Key Responsibilities:
Why job exists / what it must achieve

column2: Job Purpose

column1: To drive performance of your territory through face-to-face and multi-channel selling and to establish GSK as the customer’s key partner and advisor by making relevant recommendations supported by scientific knowledge which are aligned to the customer’s patient types and needs.

column2: Key Responsibilities

column1: Scientific Knowledge

column2: Continuously builds knowledge of GSK multi-channel brand strategies and leverages that knowledge with customers in informing on prescribing behaviours
Understands GSK and competitor’s brands features and benefits and applies knowledge effectively in their PFSS and multi-channel selling approach
Builds a comprehensive disease and pathology knowledge and leverages it with customers to support decision making
Has strong understanding of treatment guidelines and patient profiles and leverages them to build credibility with customers

column1: Business Planning

column2: Uses multiple data sources to analyse and review territory performance dynamics (including competitor performance) identifying territory trends and opportunities for GSK

Builds territory insights that capture opportunities and drive decision making, including the selection and prioritization of customer targets and the development of robust territory coverage call plans
Develop, based on customer insights, multi-channel business plans with strategically aligned ASMART objectives, strategies and tactical activities that deliver business objectives
Implements multi-channel business plans, uses KPIs to track performance and adjust plans where required

column1: Selling Skills

column2: Effectively engages with customers through a PFSS selling approach or multi-channel selling approach and is proficient in using appropriate multi-channel selling platforms aligned to customer preferences
Actively prepares for, and executes the PFSS selling approach uncovering opportunities, making recommendations aligned to patient and customer needs, addressing objections and effectively closing
Regularly measures sales call performance and seeks FLSL feedback to continuously improve

Builds collaborative internal and external relationships that enhance the customer journey, channels customer feedback into the wider organisation and proactively delivers efficient and effective sales administration

column1: In all areas, demonstrate understanding of and compliance with laws, codes of conduct, policies and frameworks in which GSK operates and live our vision, values and expectations

GSK is an Equal Opportunity Employer and we want GSK to be a workplace where everyone can feel a sense of belonging and thrive. All qualified applicants will receive equal consideration for employment without regard to disability, race/ethnicity, national origin, religion, sex, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, or age.
Disability

GSK is committed to being inclusive for people with disabilities. 2024/01/11,Risk Management Business Partnering Specialist,荷商葛蘭素史克藥廠股份有限公司台灣分公司,"-Champion commercial governance within 1-2 BUs (including field and office as well as across the wider business), interfacing with stakeholders across medical, compliance, legal focusing on key risk area i.e. HCP engagement, HCO, PR/PO process, omni-channel engagement, T&E/A&P spent, PSP, DAC and TA-specific high-risk areas.
-Be the champion in one of the key risk areas (i.e. HCP engagement, HCO, PR/PO process) to oversee the GSK TW business practice in those risk areas
-Build effective partnering relationships across the organization
-Become an expert on IRPMA, GSK Code of Practice etc. and be the first point of contact for the escalation of issues
-Support to embed the compliance with GSK Code of Practice and local regulations such as IRPMA via training/workshop throughout the business unit

-Oversee key risks and issues from various governance boards across the business (e.g. Monthly Risk Management Compliance Boards (RMCBs)), share learnings with wider business and drive Commercial Practices input and decision. Generate report and share insights through regular comms across different forums
-Routine joint call/event and sampling spot check to understand practice at the front line
-Support the risk deep dives in the annual GM confirmation in partnership with the compliance team
-Drive accountability and clear decision making through the commercial organisation to manage risk and have smart risk-taking as appropriate
-Identify themes and trends arising from locally identified & managed CAPAs (e.g. deviations) and manage relevant monitoring dashboards
-Oversee insights and drive accountability for Content Lab certified material monitoring across the business, with insight reporting to the leadership team
-Support capability build on risk management for commercial team through close working with compliance officer
-Ensure the commercial organization is audit ready, and provide support to the preparation and provision of documentation related to IBM and audits
-Bring best practices from other markets and assess appropriateness for adoption

-Enable open and honest conversation in the BU through initiating training and forums",其他醫療從業人員,待遇面議,全職,台北市中正區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,2年以上,大學、碩士,不拘,不拘,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：-Bachelor's Degree (or equivalent) in a related field (Business/Marketing/Legal/Finance)
-A proven background working within compliance and audit is a plus
-A proven background in pharmaceutical brand management
-Must possess a good working knowledge of the pharmaceutical industry and ideally a good working knowledge of the relevant therapy area and market
-Must display excellent organizational/project management skills and must have a proven track record of working on one's own initiative
-Proven ability to lead cross internal functional teams
-Must demonstrate a proven track record of success as a team player and demonstrate a strong analytical track record
-Experience working within the field of ethics and compliance
-Understanding of the different commercial functions within the business to enable practical solutions for the business
-Good data analytic skills with MS Excel and presentation skills","- 福利制度：[正職人員]

2024/01/11,Field Service Engineer,道達爾能源股份有限公司,"This role is responsible for delivering field service technical support to Saft Energy Storage Solutions customers. Such support may be performed remotely through Remote Monitoring and Diagnostics processes and/or directly at the project's sites. In order to be successful, the Field Service Engineer must possess technical expertise in power electronics, strong trouble shooting and problem-solving skills, and solid customer interface experience. The ideal candidate will have field experience in the integration of battery energy storage systems with grid connected systems managing renewable energy, such as power conversion and power management systems.

Provide technical service support on fielded energy storage projects, including integration of Li-ion battery solutions with power conversion power systems on ulitiy scale energy storage installations (Solar PV, Wind, Grid Services, etc.) Scope of equipment shall include: Battery, Inverter, Medium Voltage Power Systems and Plant Management Systems.

Provide Remote Monitoring and Diagnostics support to Saft's ESS installed based. Troubleshoot field issues by performing data analysis and liaising with Saft ESS Engineering, Quality, and Safety teams.
Execute scheduled (preventive) and unscheduled (corrective) maintenance tasks. Document such tasks on Saft's ESS Field Service Operational reports.
Participate in and support of Installation & Commissioning activities in coordination with project requirements and as planned for with Saft's ESS I&C, Service, and Project Managers.
Deliver battery operations and maintenance training to Customers (System operators) and / or Saft's 3rd party sub-contractors of O&M services.

Define product maintenance tools based on return of experience from field service work scope. Share this information with Saft ESS Product Engineering so the respective programs are establish to develop such tools solutions.
Apply safety first culture on all processes and execution activities. Collaborate with ESS Quality and Safety Managers in doing so.
Document field service technical knowledge in revision controlled work instructions, user and maintenance manuals, services processes and procedures, etc.
Customer satisfaction

Perform other duties as assigned","電機工程技術員,電機設備裝配員,太陽能技術工程師",待遇面議,全職,台北市松山區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間約七個月以上,日班,依公司規定,兩週內,1人,3年以上,大學、碩士,電機電子工程相關,"英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,中文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通",不拘,電動機及電氣相關知識,"- 其他：Experience: 3 years +in field services, power electronics or electrochemistry and software engineering preferred Specific Knowledge:
Fluent in English, power systems, battery systems and techniques, professional software

2024/01/11,"(Sr.) Biopharmaceutical Specialist - South (Tainan), GMBU",台灣安進藥品有限公司,"HOW MIGHT YOU DEFY IMAGINATION?

Amgen is one of the world’s leading independent biotechnology companies. For over 4 decades, Amgen has pioneered biotechnology breakthroughs, to bring state-of-the-art medicines from laboratory to the patient. Amgen has not only discovered and developed innovative human therapeutics but has invested in cutting edge manufacturing capability and support services to deliver these exciting therapies to medical teams around the world. Japan and Asia Pacific (JAPAC) are the fastest growing region in Amgen. Now we are hiring a Biopharmaceutical Rep in Taipei.
Live
What you will do

The Biopharmaceutical Rep will be responsible for Collaborates with manager to implement agreed POA in line with marketing strategy. Deliver HCP scientific information and key message on the product including therapeutic indication, disease states and latest clinical data, Works within agreed budgets.
MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:
1. Achieves sales target of responsible hospital in Tainan Area.
2. Deliver scientific information and key message on the product including therapeutic indication, disease states and latest clinical data.
3. Collaborates with manager to implement agreed POA in line with marketing strategy.
4. Identifies and establishes high quality customer relationships and internal collaboration.
5. Organize and implement scientific events to efficiently deliver product information.
6. Knows in-depth knowledge of the product(s), market, stakeholders and competitors.
7. Works within agreed budgets.
8. Lives the Amgen Values.
9. Support other activities as required by the manager.

10. Comply with all relevant company policies, procedures and work practices.",醫藥業務代表,待遇面議,全職,台南市中西區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,3年以上,大學、碩士,"其他醫藥衛生相關,生物學相關",英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,不拘,"業務或通路開發,業績目標分配與績效達成,產品介紹及解說銷售","- 其他：Win
What we expect of you
Qualifications
- University degree
- Minimum 3 years of sales experience in medical centers/RHs
- Skill and knowledge of territory planning, sales analysis and sales excellence.
- Possess a high level of business ethics, integrity and professionalism and the ability to ensure those standards
- Excellent communication skill and interpersonal skill
- Good command of written and spoken English is preferred
Thrive
What you can expect of us
As we work to develop treatments that take care of others, so we work to care for our teammates’ professional and personal growth and well-being.
- Vast opportunities to learn and move up and across our global organization
- Diverse and inclusive community of belonging, where teammates are empowered to bring ideas to the table and act
- Generous Total Rewards Plan comprising health, finance and wealth, work/life balance, and career benefits
Apply now
for a career that defies imagination
In our quest to serve patients above all else, Amgen is the first to imagine, and the last to doubt. Join us.
careers.amgen.com

As a Field Service Engineer for Electrification Business Area in Taipei City, Kaohsiung, Taichung, Taiwan, you will be responsible for executing service work with low to medium complexity as per work instructions and in accordance with ABB standard processes, quality standards, and safety guidelines. Delivering quality customer service to satisfy customers.
Your responsibilities

• As a Field Service Engineer for Electrification Business Area in Taipei City, Kaohsiung, Taichung, Taiwan, you will be responsible for executing service work with low to medium complexity as per work instructions and in accordance with ABB standard processes, quality standards, and safety guidelines. 2024/01/11,Global Graduate Programme 儲備幹部計劃 - Human Resources  (February 2024),英商英美菸草商務股份有限公司台灣分公司,"BAT TAIWAN IS LOOKING FOR A GLOBAL GRADUATE – HUMAN RESOURCES FUNCTION
SENIORITY LEVEL: Management Trainee
FUNCTION: Human Resources
SALARY RANGE: Base Salary + World Class Training + Fast Track Development
LOCATION: Taipei City, Taiwan

Disclaimer: We might not have an open role at this moment, but, because our work environment is very dynamic, we would love to hear from you! We encourage you to apply and the moment we have an opening, the Recruitment Team will contact you as soon as possible.
Anticipating your enthusiasm, please be advised that we expect the recruitment process to kick off in February 2024.
ROLE POSITIONING AND OBJECTIVES

The Global Graduate Programme in British American Tobacco targets to develop graduates into management level position. In our Global Graduate Programme, you will work in a real job context with genuine responsibility; rotate through different functions. The Trainee with proven potential and performance record will be provided excellent career advancement opportunities within the organization after graduation.

The Graduate Talent must meet a series of performance targets during their training period and will be reviewed by every half a year. Failure to meet the predefined standards will mean departure from the programme.
This year, we are looking for Global Graduate Programme in functions of:

column2: Human Resources – It’s a fast-tracked, accelerated program with unprecedented international exposure that’s geared specifically for high-potential individuals, helping you to develop exceptional commercial skills with full understanding of the dynamics of the market you are operating in, and how Human Resources in BAT Taiwan develop our people through effective Business Partnering, Talent Management, HR Analytics, Performance Management, Change Management & Talent Acquisition to drive high performing teams achieve outstanding business results.

column1: Show us what you're made of, and we'll give you:

column2: a real job with real impact from day one
world-class leadership training and mentoring
an array of corporate benefits that certify us as an Asia Pacific Top Employer
international travel opportunities across the region
2-week incredible training / live case studies at BAT Academy in the UK (or virtual) along with graduates across 40 countries and the global leadership team
the flexibility to tailor your functional experience to align with your passions
the chance to progress to a management role in 18 months

column1: QUALIFICATIONS:

column2: Bachelor's or master's degree with any major (added advantage majoring in Human Resources).
Fresh graduate or a professional with maximum 2 years of relevant work experience
Proficiency in written and spoken English and Mandarin are essential
Excellent communication, presentation and interpersonal skills in English and Chinese
Possess entrepreneurial and analytical traits
Confident, highly motivated and result-driven
Proactive and able to work under pressure

column1: RECRUITMENT PROCESSES:

column2: Apply for the role on BAT Career Site
Online Assessment (Pymetrics)
Phone Interview
1st Interview
Assessment Center
Final Interview

【 公司贈飲】每月一箱公司產品贈飲、三節及生日贈飲
【 福委補助】員工福利委員會補助 (婚喪喜慶及教育獎勵)及福委特約商店優惠
【 生活平衡】員工旅遊補助、年度春酒
【 休假福利】優於法令預給特休假、每年5天全薪病假
【 太古可口可樂專屬】上班期間公司飲品無限暢飲、可口可樂商店員工優惠、公司產品員購價
== 兼顧工作與生活，樂在工作 ==
【 EAP員工協助方案】提供24小時外部專業諮詢服務，守護同仁及眷屬身心健康
【 VIOCE員工建議箱】鼓勵員工署名或匿名表達心聲與提供建議，共同打造良好環境
【健康促進】健康促進講座、運動及各項保健宣導
【志工關懷】每位同仁一年8小時給薪志工假，志工服務彈性選擇
【多元共融】委員會定期舉辦訓練、講座及活動，促進性別、年齡、種族、身心障礙及性傾向多元共融
【安全先行】安全促進宣導及行動、員工安全提報建議，打造職場安全環境
【友善環境】孕婦專屬停車位、哺乳室、性別友善廁所
== 暢快學習，發展不設限 ==
【專業職能精進】專業職能課程，技術證照以及定期回訓補助、英文學習補助
【領導力培育】因應不同職級需求，量身打造國內外領導力培訓課程
【內部傳承學習】內部種子講師團隊年度徵選、培訓及回訓補助
【多元企業大學】 線上學習系統，豐富學習資源隨身帶著走
【SPRINT Program】新進人員到職90天學程，入職夥伴(Buddy)支持

【薪酬獎金】每年定期檢視薪資結構、依個人績效及公司年度運營成果發放年度獎金

As a Field Service Engineer for Electrification Business Area in Taipei City, Kaohsiung, Taichung, Taiwan, you will be responsible for executing service work with low to medium complexity as per work instructions and in accordance with ABB standard processes, quality standards, and safety guidelines. Delivering quality customer service to satisfy customers.
Your responsibilities

• As a Field Service Engineer for Electrification Business Area in Taipei City, Kaohsiung, Taichung, Taiwan, you will be responsible for executing service work with low to medium complexity as per work instructions and in accordance with ABB standard processes, quality standards, and safety guidelines. Delivering quality customer service to satisfy customers.
• Contributing to customer satisfaction by planning and executing service work as per customer order and expectation(s)

2024/01/11,R0113725 Medical Science Liaison-GI,台灣武田藥品工業股份有限公司,"OBJECTIVES:

The Medical Science Liaison (MSL) establishes Takeda’s medical affairs presence with external stakeholders through scientific exchange and research support.  This role is the field-based therapeutic area (TA) expert responsible for execution of the TA specific medical plan in the field, predominantly by establishing, developing, and fostering relationships with key external stakeholders.   He/she will contribute to the achievement of business success by putting the patient’s needs and safety into primary focus.

This position is responsible for executing the medical plan in the field by communicating fair-balanced therapeutic area, product-related and clinical information to external stakeholders (e.g. key opinion leaders (KOLs), physicians, academic institutions, hospital formulary committees) and responding to unsolicited requests for medical information.  Additionally, this position will provide key insights learned from the medical and scientific community to internal stakeholders to guide the medical and brand plans.

This position will work closely with the Medical advisor(MA)/Scientific Advisor(SA) in the TA to lead the in-field execution of the MA/SA-developed medical plan.  This position will also collaborate cross-functionally to develop and execute medically-relevant strategies and tactics as well as provide scientific expertise and training to cross-functional stakeholders as needed.
This position is a field- based position, with approximately 50-70% time in the field collaborating with KOLs and other external customers as needed.
ACCOUNTABILITIES:
OVERALL-
-Lead the in-field execution of the Therapeutic Area (TA) Medical Plan by establishing, developing, and fostering relationships with key external stakeholders
-Support medical strategies for compounds via field-based support from the medical function that are aligned with overall corporate goals and objectives

-Maintain a very high level of knowledge and understanding of the latest scientific/medical knowledge in the relevant therapeutic area by conducting literature searches, analysing clinical papers, attending conferences, courses and other such events
-Provide insights from key external stakeholders to internal cross-functional stakeholders as needed to guide the Brand and Medical Plans.

Animal nutrition and feeding management professional to help customers enhance output, in cooperation with the business team, promotion of Cargill Animal Nutrition and Feeding Technology to external customers, and to achieve the success of the people to convert animal metabolism.
主要職責

推廣嘉吉動物營養與飼養科技，以傳達公司價值與正確動物營養知識給客戶(Deployment of Cargill animal nutrition and feeding technology to the customer, in order to convery the value of the company with the right knowledge of animal nutrition.)

建立與更新農場服務流程與農場分級系統(Creating and updating farm service processes and farm grading system.)

本科以上相關科系畢業(Bachelor graduates, Animal husbandry or veterinary related field)

具有一年以上的現場銷售飼料經驗 / 對動物營養與飼養管理服務充滿熱忱 / 精通畜舍設計(More than one year of experience in sales of feed / animal nutrition and feeding management services passionate / proficient barn design.)

具汽車駕照 / MS電腦應用中等/英文中等/精通國台語(With car driver’s license and car/ MS applications moderate/ English moderate/ Proficient in Mandarin and Taiwanese)",一般動物飼育工作者,待遇面議,全職,台中市大肚區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,5年以上,大學以上,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,不拘,,"- 福利制度：1.

●持續鑽研發展最新材料分析技術及其應用

●備製材料分析報告
●管理DOE(Design of Experiment)

2024/01/16,"Clinical Territory Associate (18-month contractor, South area)",Intuitive Surgical Sarl Taiwan Branch_瑞士商直覺股份有限公司台灣分公司,"Primary Function of Position:

Intuitive Surgical is widely considered the most exciting medical device company in the world today. Surgeons worldwide are changing the way surgery is performed by utilizing our robotic surgical device, the da Vinci® Surgical System, to enhance their surgical precision and greatly improve patient benefits. We have attracted some of the best and brightest on our team and now we are seeking entry level sales candidates to join our organization.

The Contingent Clinical Territory Associate will work closely with the Clinical Sales Manager to gain knowledge in all aspects of our business to include technical, clinical, and sales. He or She will train to be a da Vinci® Surgery technical and sales expert across all primary surgical specialties to develop surgical robotics programs in the assigned territory. Contingent Clinical Territory Associate will have the opportunity to support a specific region by maximizing the utilization of installed da Vinci® Surgical Systems by leading product demonstrations/in-services and sales activities.
This position is a developmental role and the time commitment includes some weekend work to accommodate surgeon schedules.
Roles and Responsibilities
• Case Support- Be a resource to the surgical team by providing guidance, insight, and training on the use of the da Vinci® Surgical System
• Product Demonstrations/In-Services- Lead all technical in-services for customers to include OR staff, surgeons, etc.

• Selling Activities- Contribute to Clinical Sales Manager team quarterly sales goals by helping influence behavior change in customers such as product demonstrations/in- services, OR selling activities, and customer support trainings

• Customer Support- Support and or coordinate, under the direction of the local sales management team, regional sales and marketing development events that create system awareness and procedure adoption through product demonstrations/in-services and selling activities

• Administrative Duties- Responsibly manage administrative tasks: reporting of sales/procedures, outcomes of sales activities, submission of expense reports, and assigned on-line modules using company required software systems","業務助理,國內業務,醫藥業務代表",待遇面議,全職,高雄市左營區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間約一個月以下,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,不拘,大學、碩士,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,"Excel,Outlook,PowerPoint,Word","報表彙整與管理,業績與管理報表撰寫,產品介紹及解說銷售","- 其他：• Bachelor’s degree required, major in medical related fields preferred
• Sales degree a plus
• Proven record of achievement and leadership
• Ambition and strong work ethic
• Ability to excel in a high-energy, fast-paced environment
• Excellent interpersonal skills and persuasive communication skills
• Proven ability to work effectively as part of a team
• Ability to travel up to 50% (domestic), and be flexible to accommodate surgeon schedules as needed","- 福利制度：Health & Wellness

2024/01/16,268640 Associate Sourcing Manager - Electronics Packaging & Container,台灣默克集團_台灣默克股份有限公司,"Legal Entity: Merck Ltd.
NOTE: Will directly report to the Head of Packaging & Container Sourcing in Headquarter, please provide your English resume while applying for this position.
Your Role: As Associate Sourcing Manager - Electronics Packaging & Container, Taiwan
．Be part of our global Electronics Packaging Sourcing Team within the Electronics Procurement organization.

．Be accountable for managing the 3rd party spend, drive supplier management activities such as negotiations and contracting, supplier qualifications, conduct supplier business reviews and evaluations and accompanying supplier audits.

．Work in close collaboration with the Procurement Team as well as our internal stakeholders such as Supply Chain, Operations, Marketing & Sales, Engineering and Quality to develop and implement sourcing strategies.
．Primary scope is to support the sites Kaohsiung, Nanke, Hsinchu and Taoyuan. Further you will support our Level Up projects in the region.

[薪資及福利]
1. 年薪保障13個月
2. 年度績效獎金(AIP)

-優於勞基法之特休假、生日假、志工假、浮動假、84天產假、陪產(檢)假、生理假、有薪病假、有薪家庭照顧假及有薪助孕假

9. 助孕補助最高可達625,000元
10. 育兒津貼: 每胎提供24,000元補助
11. 年度健檢及流感注射
12. EAP員工協助方案
[彈性工作模式]
默克的全新工作模式為員工提供更大彈性，使主管和員工雙方在經過討論後做出最佳工作安排，提升工作效率並兼顧個人生活；依照不同的工作類別、單位及地點，默克提供彈性工作時間、地點及部分工時之選擇。
[多元職涯發展]
(1)多元化的人才發展計畫
人才是默克的最大資產，除了工作中的專業訓練，我們更提供豐富的訓練課程，例如：實體、線上工作技能培訓，或語言能力課程等，從全球總部到當地市場也設有多元的潛力人才或領導技能培養課程。默克亦更投入大量資源與知名顧問公司、機構合作，提供給員工最完整的職涯發展規劃。
(2)多元職能/國際輪調機會
默克非常支持員工在不同職位發展輪調，鼓勵拓展更多職涯可能性，更提供豐富的國際職涯機會，歡迎員工依照自己的生涯規劃與目標申請。
(3)職涯雙軌制
在默克，我們實施職涯雙軌制，讓員工依自己的意願與專長，選擇發展管理職或專業職，無論是想要專精於特定領域，或是有興趣發展管理職能，在默克都可以找到最適合自己的發展機會。

column2: Lead the simplification of Demand and S&OP meetings and ensure ADS integrity to achieve efficient demand planning and drive high forecast accuracy.

Optimize supply planning by developing and implementing optimal supply strategies, guarding the time fence, and ensuring assurance of supply to minimize inventory obsolescence, prevent stock out, and deliver product to patients at right time.

Strategically manage logistics and warehousing by leading distributor integration, implementing operational excellence with process optimization and generating synergy. Build trust with distributor by generating high KPI and driving qualitative and strategic monthly meeting.

Partner with cross functions by developing key milestones and building strategic bridge stock plan with speed and quality to assure smooth transition for business continuity without supply disruption.
Oversee monthly order/ inventory management and support successful launch of new products into the market.
Drive and build high engaged team by developing direct reports and encouraging high performing team culture.

Develop strong collaborative working relationships with global supply chain and cross-functional stakeholders by identifying product supply issues, seeking alternatives, communicating issues to planning center and local management.",採購主管,待遇面議,全職,台北市中正區,管理4人以下,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,5年以上,大學以上,不拘,不拘,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

Bachelor's degree in Production Operations Management, Logistics Management, Business Administration, Accounting, Finance, or Supply Chain management disciplines preferred, or equivalent work experiences.
Min 5 years of experience in Demand Planning & Supply Management in MNC, preferably in pharmaceutical industry.
Effective written and verbal communication skills are required, especially in English.
Strong strategy development and planning skills coupled with necessary knowledge of pharmaceutical manufacturing activities.
Excellent organization and follow-up skills are critical to ensure timely communication across the supply chain in effective working relationships with internal and external stakeholders.
Requires proven problem-solving skills and the ability to develop and adapt strategies for changing business environments.
Creativity, innovation, decisiveness, and negotiation skills are necessary to resolve issues and drive the business forward.

column1: 。每週工作五天，四十小時，提供彈性工作時間安排(工作時間與居家工作安排)。
。每月第二個禮拜五，以及三大節日前一工作日可提早下班
休假制度
。各種休請假同於或優於勞基法規定。
。年休假:到職當年即享十二天年假。
。生日假:員工生日當天享有一天給薪假。
。公司彈性休假日與「艾伯維日」:除法定12天國定假日外，員工每年享有額外八天給薪假。
薪資制度

有工業軟體銷售(CAD/CAE/PLM/ERP) 相關產業經驗者尤佳

- 負責中大型客戶業務拓展與開發，拓展潛在需求市場。

- 大學以上學歷，專業不拘

column1: 。每週工作五天，四十小時，提供彈性工作時間安排(工作時間與居家工作安排)。
。每月第二個禮拜五，以及三大節日前一工作日可提早下班
休假制度
。各種休請假同於或優於勞基法規定。
。年休假:到職當年即享十二天年假。
。生日假:員工生日當天享有一天給薪假。
。公司彈性休假日與「艾伯維日」:除法定12天國定假日外，員工每年享有額外八天給薪假。
薪資制度
。基本薪資每年依市場變動調整架構，最具市場競爭性 。
。薪資依績效調整，良好表現者得到相對的獎勵。
。每年固定年終獎金，依職別另有不同的績效獎酬計劃 。
福利制度
。勞工保險、全民健保
。員工及眷屬團體保險（壽險、意外傷害險、醫療住院保險、癌症險、重大疾病險）。(適用正職員工)

。三節年節獎金、禮品。
。員工旅遊及活動補助，婚喪喜慶、生育禮金禮品。(適用正職員工)
。年度健康檢查、流感疫苗接種 。
。資深員工服務獎勵。(適用正職員工)
。家庭日、志工日、綠色環保活動。
。員工協助方案(適用正職員工)、職醫護臨場服務。
訓練制度
。有系統的業務人員業務推廣訓練核心課程。
。各種職能、績效管理、主管發展訓練核心課程及外語訓練辦法。主要以在職訓練，從工作中學習為主軸。
。專業訓練經理規劃訓練體系，公司並培訓內部講師群執行核心課程。主管及行銷企劃人員可輔以艾伯維海外訓練體系。

column2: Implement Business Unit (BU) strategies to accelerate hospitals listing, ensure sales goals and targets are achieved.  Develop sales plans for district; contribute to the development of annual Plan and Latest Best Estimates for BU, and convey objectives and milestones clearly to team so that he/she can lead others in the execution of activities to achieve desired sales results. Communicate closely with Marketing, Key Account Managers, Customer Excellence and sales colleagues to share information and help execute plans and programs across functions.

Monitor market trends and competitor activities in assigned territory.  Proactively analyze and evaluate data, input, and proposals from a variety of sources to confirm alignment and/or determine adjustments to plans and/or tactics. Stay current on a wide-range of business and industry concerns, and use this knowledge to identify key drivers. Furnish General Manager and Marketing with information on industry trends, customer attitudes, competitive activities, market opportunities and threats. Assess and prioritize potential business growth opportunities.

Utilize selling skills and develop account strategies and tactical approaches to ensure customer needs are met by the BU’s products where possible. Influence the development and enhancement of relationships with customers especially Key Opinion Leaders.
Implement and oversee inventory management processes in District in strict accordance with Company procedures governing product controls including expiry.
Address product experiences in timely fashion in accordance with Company policy.

Hire and develop sales staff in his/her district. Serve as a positive role model by exhibiting ethical principles and behaviors, and insist others follow this lead.  Provide employees with experiences and assignments that allow them to grow their capabilities. Coach and evaluate team members on performance, enhancement of their strength and improvement of developmental needs. Anticipate position openings by building the talent base and having candidates ready for appropriate opportunities. Support affiliate EHS policies related to driving safety and biohazard safety, etc.

Represent AbbVie in a professional manner that aligns with Company image, ensuring activities comply with Legal and AbbVie’s Code of Business Conduct. Support compliance and ethical practice initiatives by consistently being a leader in this area. Review compliance metrics and drives behavior to constantly reinforce initiatives and desired outcomes

2024/01/02,"Manager, Materials Manufacturing (Based in Taipei/Taichung)","Nike 360 Holding B.V., Taiwan Branch_荷商耐基股份有限公司台灣分公司","Become a Part of the NIKE, Inc. Team

NIKE, Inc. does more than outfit the world's best athletes. It is a place to explore potential, obliterate boundaries, and push out the edges of what can be. The company looks for people who can grow, think, dream, and create. Its culture thrives by embracing diversity and rewarding imagination. The brand seeks achievers, leaders and visionaries. At Nike, it’s about each person bringing skills and passion to a challenging and constantly evolving game.
WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR

Materials are key to Innovation and Product Excellence. We have built a new, unified Materials Sourcing & Manufacturing organization that will transform our material capabilities, teams, and processes and accelerate our vision to serve every athlete*.

As a Manager, Materials Manufacturing on the Footwear Materials Manufacturing and Sourcing (FW MSM) team, you will lead a team to drive materials excellence in partnership with our Materials vendors, collaborating closely with internal stakeholders.

Detail-oriented and results-driven, you thrive in a cross-functional environment. You are comfortable engaging with different external manufacturing vendors and internal teams, tailoring your messages accordingly, and building strong partnerships. This role is perfect for a team player with drive, curiosity, and exceptional communication skills.
WHAT WILL YOU WORK ON

Through your team, you will engage with vendors that deliver strong performance for Materials Manufacturing quality, delivery, costing, and sustainability priorities. You will manage key initiatives execution, alert to both opportunities and risks for relevant objectives, and manage and escalate as needed. You will manage manufacturing and delivery issues across your team, ensuring impacts are mitigated and issues are resolved.

Your typical day/week will include leading and supporting your team to deliver results by ensuring the team’s focus is on clearly defined weekly and seasonal priorities. You’ll organize the team against an annual calendar of engagement with vendors, working collaboratively with the full Footwear Materials Manufacturing team as well as relevant internal stakeholders in the Nike Materials ecosystem. You will balance workloads across your team, ensuring they can successfully deliver against immediate needs as well as long-term priorities.
WHO WILL YOU WORK WITH

This role can be based in either Taipei or Taichung, and it reports to the Director, Materials Manufacturing, based in Taichung.  This role will work collaboratively with external manufacturing partners, across the full MSM organization, and with other key stakeholders.
WHAT YOU BRING

Ability to maintain focus and drive through ambiguity and change
Experience leading and inspiring a team of direct reports preferred

Experience working in data systems or with data analytics preferred

Department: Quality Assurance
Location: Tainan City, Taiwan
Reporting to: Quality Assurance Manager

WHAT THIS POSITION IS ABOUT - PURPOSE

Responsible to establish and manage material shelf-life control and Incoming printed NTM control process. Back-up Factory Approver to assure the Change Order Status in SAP is being performed by all view maintainers in the factory. Coordinate quality-related activities for New Product Development (NPD) with R&D and factory cross-function departments. Responsible to manage the quality samples sent for R&D evaluation on time.
WHAT WILL YOU DO - RESPONSIBILITIES
NPD Support and Material Management

- Collaborate with NPD, R&D, Production, and Engineering teams to carry out related feasibility checks, material trials, specification approval, preproduction, and prototypes in line with the PLM schedule.
- Ensure NPD projects are realized as expectations and ensure smooth First production and required sampling for R&D and market with timely information sharing and documenting new product information.
- Material trial run with local /global strategy and handling the material issue
Specification and Factory Approval
- ​​​​​​​Act as the main contact person for factory approval and specification management related to NPD projects and brand maintenance activities initiated by either R&D or the factory.
- Ensure primary blend templates are maintained and shared with relevant functions accordingly.
Quality Guidelines and ISO 9001
- Coordinate R&D Manual revisions to be reflected in factory internal processes and ensure information is shared to all relevant functions smoothly and being followed up.
- Coordinate ISO 9001 activities within the factory.
Ingredient Submission and Shelf-Life Control
- Involvement in government audit and ingredient submission process to be fully in line with regulations.
- Closely monitor the shelf-life process and take relevant actions timely for smooth material management.
5S3R, EHS, Compliance, and Backup
- Carry out 5S3R, EHS, Contamination prevention, and ISO requirements to ensure a compliant and safe work environment.
