2023/12/27,Product Cost Analyst (產品成本分析師),日煙國際製造股份有限公司,"這個職位是關於什麼的？
負責直接材料和產成品的分析、控制和預算成本，例如採購價格的差異、產量表現以及轉換成本向產成品的分配。參與期末活動、三年工廠預算和各種財務研究和效益評估。協調季度庫存核銷並支援政府審計。向產品成本經理報告並支援財務和管理報告以及其他相關財務活動。
你會怎麼做？
根據內部控制政策計算材料和成品的標準成本並在 SAP 中進行維護。透過向工廠和市場提供可靠的成本來評估效益來支持新項目。
分析工廠每月的成本支出、產量和其他關鍵績效指標 (KPI) 績效。與其他部門合作監控和分析採購價格、材料消耗或產品規格的差異。進行月末結帳活動，包括庫存盤點結果驗證、過帳必要分錄和 SAP 物料分類帳結帳。
完成年度預算計劃活動，包括制定下一年的材料標準成本，提交路線圖供審核，並按計劃將所有材料和FG成本推入SAP。對每個類別的產品成本差異提供可靠的滾動預測。
協調季度庫存核銷流程並向稅務局提交所需報告。與其他部門和第三方監管機構配合，完成核銷流程並妥善登記。
能夠完成經理臨時佈置的任務，包括工廠績效分析、報告準備和審計問卷。
WHAT IS THIS POSITION ABOUT?

Taking ownership of analysis, control, and budget cost of direct materials and finished goods, e.g., variance in purchasing price, yield performance, and allocation of conversion cost to finished goods. Participating in period-end activities, 3-year factory budget, and various financial studies and benefit evaluations. Coordinating quarterly inventory write-offs and supporting government auditing. Reporting to the Product Cost Manager and supporting in financial and management reporting and other relevant financial activities.
WHAT WILL YOU DO?

Calculating standard cost and maintaining in SAP for materials and FGs in compliance with internal control policy. Supporting new projects by providing reliable cost to factory and market for evaluating benefits.

Analyzing monthly factory performance on cost spent, yield, and other KPIs. Coworking with other departments to monitor and analyze variances in purchasing price, materials consumption, or product specification. Conducting month-end closing activities including stock count result verifying, posting necessary entries, and SAP material ledger closing.

Completing annual budget plan activities, including setting up the standard cost for materials in the following year, delivering roadmaps for review, and rolling out all the costs of materials and FGs into SAP according to schedule. Delivering reliable rolling forecasts on each category of product cost variance.

Coordinating quarterly inventory write-off process and delivering required reports to the tax bureau. Coworking with other departments and 3rd party supervision agencies to complete the write-off process with proper booking.

Being able to complete ad-hoc assignments from managers including factory performance analysis, report preparation, and audit questionnaires.",成本會計,待遇面議,全職,台南市安南區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,一個月內,1人,2年以上,大學以上,"會計學相關,財稅金融相關","英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,中文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通","Excel,SAP",不拘,"- 其他：我们在找谁？

2023/12/21,維護經理 (Maintenance Manager),日煙國際製造股份有限公司,"這個職位是關於什麼的？
- 負責制定與零件可用性和低庫存成本相關的備件策略和分析，以便規劃和滿足維護和維修預算。
- 提供專業知識，確保製造/包裝和初級領域生產設備的功能可用性。
- 制定並推出設備改進計劃，以提高效率並滿足產品品質規格。
- 根據停機時間和檢查報告以及供應商建議制定和實施涵蓋預防性設備維護的程序。
- 與生產團隊、不同供應商以及 JTI 集團（GFT、MTC）內的專家合作，協調專案活動的人力需求。
你會怎麼做？
裝置最佳化
- 為工廠生產團隊提供支持，確保製造/包裝和主要區域生產設備的功能。
- 與 CI 團隊一起制定並推出設備改進計劃，以提高效率並滿足產品品質規格。
維修管理
- 規劃並協調生產設備維護的人力需求。根據停機時間、檢查報告和供應商建議，推出並協調預防性設備維護。建立和維護設備的未解決問題列表，並確保機器調整的正確文件/操作手冊。確保相關車間員工可以獲得和存取文件。
- 根據停機時間、檢查報告和供應商建議協調預防性設備維護。確保專家（電工、首席機械師）對故障排除和維修活動的支援。
備件管理
- 制定與零件可用性和低庫存成本相關的備件策略，以便規劃和滿足維護和維修預算。確保與 JTI 內的備件專家和供應商的良好合作。有能力的工作負責人有責任確保從其他日煙國際工廠、原始設備製造商或替代供應商訂購零件。
​​​​​​​- 這是透過與參與工作流程和最終結果交付的各方進行適當和及時的協調、跟進和溝通來實現的。
- ​​​​​​​與值班領導、不同供應商以及 JT 集團（GFT、MTC）內的專家合作，規劃和協調專案活動的人力需求。
- 與工程和品質部門密切合作，支援新生產設備的安裝、驗收和試運行。業主對新產品或規格/材料變更的產品的運作能力進行技術澄清。
- ​​​​​​​負責遵守特定的工作環境（確保適當的工作條件）。執行工廠安全規則，與EHS部門協調檢查並確保員工對安全規則的認識與遵守。負責生產設施內務管理標準－5S3R行為準則的實施，作為所有生產相關設施的「生活方式」。
其他
- ​​​​​​​根據經理的要求管理出現的各種任務和專案。
- 支援IWS部署並與團隊成員密切協作。
WHAT IS THIS POSITION ABOUT?
- Responsible for developing the strategy and analysis for spare parts such as parts availability and low stock cost to plan and meet the maintenance and repair budget.
- To provide expertise in ensuring functional availability of production equipment in Making/Packing and Primary areas.
- To develop and roll out plans for improvement of the equipment to increase efficiency and to meet the product quality specification.
- To develop and implement procedures covering preventive equipment maintenance based on downtime and inspection reports, as well as supplier recommendations.
- Coordinate the manpower requirements for project activities in cooperation with the Production team, the different suppliers, and with specialists within the JTI group (GFT, MTC).
WHAT WILL YOU DO?
- Equipment Optimization
- ​​​​​​​Maintenance Management
- ​​​​​​​Spare Parts Management
- ​​​​​​​Project Management

​​​​​​​Compliance","產品維修人員,機械加工技術人員,生產管理主管",待遇面議,全職,台南市安南區,管理9-12人,無需出差外派,日班,週休二日,一個月內,1人,5年以上,大學以上,不拘,"英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,中文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通","Excel,PowerPoint,Word,SAP",不拘,"- 其他：我们在找谁？

2023/12/21,卓越營運工程師（IWS培訓師）(Operational Excellence Engineer (IWS Trainer)),日煙國際製造股份有限公司,"這個職位是關於什麼的？
作為 IWS 工程師培訓師，您將透過車間內的整合工作系統 (IWS) 建立生產、品質和持續改進等操作領域。
你會怎麼做？
培訓與輔導
- 為 DMS 所有者和線上工作人員提供各知識領域（流程、維護、領導力）的培訓和指導，以便運行 RTT 部署。
- 根據 IWS 理念，透過提供培訓和輔導活動，促進各自工廠內觀念的轉變。
- 支援單元結構團隊和生產線團隊開發培訓材料和 OPL 文檔，並確保目標受眾可以存取這些材料。
IWS工具開發
- 支援 DMS 所有者和線路工作人員了解、使用和進一步開發 IWS 工具。
培養熟練的人力資源
- 指導直接向現任領導報告的管理團隊的專業發展。
- 確保具有足夠技能水準的人力資源的持續可用性。
- 員工的培訓和發展。
溝通與報告
- 報告在生產線上觀察到的與工具、DMS、DDS 和其他相關的 IWS 標準的所有偏差
其他
- 根據經理的要求管理出現的各種任務和專案。
WHAT IS THIS POSITION ABOUT?
As an IWS Engineer Trainer, you will gain exposure in operation areas including Producing, Quality, and Continuous Improvement by Integrated Working System (IWS) building on the shop floor.
WHAT WILL YOU DO?
Training & Coaching
- Deliver training and coaching for DMS owners and line crew on respective knowledge areas (Process, Maintenance, Leadership) in order to run RTT deployments.
- Contribute to mindset change within the respective factory through training delivery and coaching activities, in line with the IWS concept.
- Support Cell Structure Team and Line Team in developing training materials, and OPLs documentation and ensure those are accessible to the target audience.
Development of IWS tools
- Support DMS owners and line crew in understanding, using, and further development of IWS tools.
Development of Skilled Human Resources
- Guide the professional development of the management team reporting directly to the incumbent.
- Ensure the consistent availability of human resources with adequate skill levels.
- Training and development of employees.
Communication & Reporting
- Report all deviations from IWS standards observed on the production line in regards to tools, DMSs, DDSs, and other related
Other

- Manage various tasks and projects as they arise and upon the manager’s request.","品管／品保工程師,生產技術／製程工程師",待遇面議,全職,台南市安南區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,依公司規定,一個月內,1人,5年以上,大學以上,"工程學科類,數學及電算機科學學科類","英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,中文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通","Excel,PowerPoint","產品生產製程規劃及工時估算,提出生產標準改良方案,提昇設備產能稼動率與生產效率","- 其他：我們在找誰？
一定有：
- 擁有工程、科學或相關學科的大學學位
- 在相關領域沒有經驗到 10 年經驗者優先。
- 製造流程改進，包括效率、產量和品質改進。
- 英語和中文用於有效的口頭和書面溝通
- 高度參與學習以外的活動，具有潛在的領導技能
- 高度投入和自我驅動的個性
- 有在跨國快速消費品製造公司發展職業生涯的雄心和願望。
- 良好的團隊合作精神，具有出色的影響力
- 以主人翁態度自我激勵

2023/12/21,Regulatory Data & System Senior Analyst,台灣杜邦股份有限公司,"Position Summary

Product Stewardship and Regulatory (PS&R) is a cross-functional process that seeks to understand and minimize the impacts to human health and the environment throughout the product’s life-cycle—production, transport, use, and end-of-life management.  DuPont is a leading company in the full utilization of SAP’s Environmental, Health, and Safety (EH&S) Product Safety module for managing global regulatory compliance across many diverse specialty product businesses.  The PS&R Senior Analyst (Regulatory Data & System) position offers a challenging opportunity to gain exposure across the DuPont product portfolio and support the business units and/or the Corporation in the application of product regulatory systems and tools.   The role is also responsible for developing a proficiency in SAP EH&S, and a working knowledge of relevant regulatory compliance needs for the business(es).
Job Responsibility

column1: o
column2: Analyzing and retrieving data

column1: o

Support HazCom project and administrative work

Understand company confidential business information (CBI) requirements
Participate in and/or lead continuous improvement projects
Collaborate in global networks",商標／專利人員,待遇面議,全職,台北市松山區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,週休二日,不限,1人,1年以上,大學、碩士,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：•

2024/01/17,【Golf Pride 台南】SCM Planner 生產計劃專員,伊頓飛瑞慕品股份有限公司,"該職位負責依滾動預測和客戶訂單生成的總體計劃進行生產計劃，並追踪及控制日常生產進度。 根據日常生產狀態靈活管理生產優先順序，滿足客戶準時達交需求和月生產目標。 配合跨職能團隊持續提升生產品質，進行 VSM(Value Stream Mapping) 計劃流程，持續優化生產計劃。
1. 協調製造部門及外包商製定成每月生產目標，並依產能缺口與團隊合作制定緩解計劃以滿足每月生產量。
2. 通過產能管理進行計劃、數量分配和生產狀態追蹤，定期與生產團隊、外包商、和計劃團隊溝通，確保所有相關人員都了解供應缺口。
3. 每日移轉清單製作、生產進度追蹤、提供出貨風險警示及追回計劃，並控制WIP於目標範圍內。
4. 工單控管及每日/每週的生產報告及分析。
5. 根據客戶突然提前、延後、上行需求的信號管理生產計劃，並與業務、外包及倉庫協調出貨日期。
6. 召開每月與外包商會議，提供生產預估及了解外包能產狀況，以達成客戶訂單需求。
7. 執行主管的其他任務，以支持從工廠關鍵運營因素的持續改進項目。

• Implements the planned communication, promotion and training activities in the channel/segment.
Customer relations
• Supports in driving strategic partnerships, developing personal relationships with partners, customers and other decision makers.
Channel management support

2024/01/17,Project Manager /台北,ABB Ltd._艾波比股份有限公司,"Job Summary:

Lead the execution of medium-size projects and ensure that all related activities are performed in accordance with ABB policy, relevant cyber security regulations and standards, contractual agreements, quality standards, health, safety & environment requirements, financial targets, and schedule commitments.
Main Accountabilities:
Project leadership

• Leads the project team, establishes the project execution approach, and oversees project hand-over, execution planning, and monitoring and control activities for both internal and external resources in order to accomplish all project goals.
• Provides performance feedback regarding allocated resources working on projects.
Instructions and guidelines
• Active involvement in continuous improvement and simplification.
• Supports improving guidelines, tools, and templates.
• Ensures compliance to relevant cyber security regulations, standards, and contractual requirements.
Budget, sales, and operations planning
• Supports local Sales and Tendering through early involvement in tenders.
Project execution and control
• Ensures that the project follows execution best practices and ABB policies.
• Effectively monitors and controls project progress and efficient resource utilization.
• Monitors and controls project financials, overseeing project invoicing status, cost, expenses, and cash flow.
• Identifies, qualifies, quantifies, and manages project risks and ensures that all opportunities are identified and pursued.
• Captures, analyses and shares lessons learned throughout the project.
• Drives the formal acceptance of the project, contract close-out and acknowledgement by the customer, all in accordance with the contract.
Contract and claims/ & Procurement Management
• Ensures that the project consistently applies contract and claims management, in accordance with ABB policies and contractual agreements.
• Coordinates with Supply Chain Management and successfully procures required services, materials, and equipment for the project from external and internal suppliers.
• Supports Procurement and Logistics in supplier negotiations, claims and project changes.
Stakeholder relations
• Acts as the key contact for the customer and an escalation point for project issues.
• Builds and maintains strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders and effectively communicates with all stakeholders.
Health, safety, and environment (HSE)
• Ensures the project follows and complies with company health, safety, and environmental policies.
• Creates project HSE Plans and ensures that common HSE policies and reporting are implemented across the project with all stakeholders, including collaboration/consortium partners and sub-suppliers.
• Demonstrates unique actions/initiatives to support site safety and ensures consistent HSE performance.
Project Recovery
• Demonstrates and proactively applies immediate recovery actions to mitigate schedule delays and cost overruns.
Planning and scheduling
• Defines and applies project scheduling techniques to manage schedule risks proactively to avoid possible future schedule deviations with OTD impact.
• Applies earned value method to manage critical path and project float to optimize the schedule.
• Accurately forecasts schedule to determine if the project is still within defined tolerance ranges and identifies any necessary change requests to drive the closure.
• Plans and tracks all project activities, establishes scheduling risks and opportunities in order to deliver projects on time according to commitments to the customer and ABB.
• Demonstrates ability to guide and collaborate with a project planning and control specialist.
Document Management
• Identifies and plans all document deliverables required by the contractual scope of work and incorporates this plan into the overall project plan/schedule.

• Tracks document progress and follows-up on overdue comments from customer.","專案經理,其他專案管理師",待遇面議,全職,台北市內湖區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,3年以上,大學以上,"電機電子工程相關,電機電子維護相關,機械工程相關",英文--聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：Education and Experience:

2024/01/17,自動化工程師 /高雄,ABB Ltd._艾波比股份有限公司,"Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future.

At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

As an Engineer for Process Automation Business Area in Taipei City, Kaohsiung, Taiwan, you will Complete assignments on small projects or portions of larger projects, cost-effectively and in accordance with contract specifications, quality standards and safety requirements.This position reports to Operation Manager.
Main Accountabilities:
Technical contribution
• Evaluates, selects, and applies standard techniques and procedures to perform engineering assignments.
• Provides technical support for testing, installation, and commissioning activities.
• Prepares project documentation within one’s scope of deliverables.
Customer and Sales
• Finalizes ‘Fail-Safe Philosophy’ and other key concepts as part of Kick-Off and Design Freeze Meetings.
• Actively participates project meetings and resolves any outstanding technical issues to meet contractual obligations.
• Assists in preparing proposal/presentation of engineering projects/programs (provision of bills of materials, estimated engineering hours, etc.).
Technical leadership and knowledge sharing
• Applies basic Design Thinking / Design for Excellence concepts in projects.
• Actively utilizes checklists to perform design verification according applicable standards and engineering guidelines.
• Contributes and shares experiences in workshops pertaining to engineering design, tools, and processes.
• Shares best practices Lessons-Learned documentation across different projects and disciplines.
Processes and tools
• Uses standard processes and tools applicable to one’s area of responsibility.
• Ensures that engineering activities comply with required safety regulations and contractual requirements.
• Reports processes and tools inefficiencies and suggests improvements ideas.
Risk and opportunity management
• Supports technical risk assessments and implements resulting actions for one’s projects.
• Reports any contract / safety / quality / program / cost issues to Project Manager(s) for resolution.
Contract management
• Ensures Bill of Material (BOM) for the project meets contractual obligations; and project gross margin requirements by not generating Project Left-Over Material (PLOM).
• Identifies and implements variation requests to support contract claims based on the approval from Project Manager.
Planning and control
• Follows work plans and cost estimates provided by the Project Manager and ensures quality deliverables on time and at targeted cost
Manufacturing and Testing
• Coordinates with Manufacturing and Testing functions to ensure the technical solutions are appropriately manufactured/ staged and tested.
• Updates the engineering deliverables as-built.
Commissioning and Service
• Coordinates with Commissioning / Service functions to ensure the designs are appropriately installed and commissioned (if applicable as part of the contract).
• Updates the engineering deliverables post installation & commissioning (if applicable).

ABB Marine & Ports supplies world-leading technologies that are driving the evolution of sustainable shipping. Electrical propulsion, data-driven decision support and integrated solutions for ship and shore from ABB are paving the way to a zero-emission marine industry, providing greater efficiency and reliability to shipowners, and preparing vessels to meet the demands of tomorrow. Our automation and electrical solutions are making port and terminal operations safer, greener and more productive. 2024/01/17,Tendering Manager / 台北,ABB Ltd._艾波比股份有限公司,"Adapt and implement sales support strategy for designated area in accordance with the global support strategy with specific technical capability and focus to support configuration and quotation requirements. Ensure technical and commercial support for internal and external customers. Oversee estimations and bids and proposals ensuring alignment with ABB standards and targets.
Main Accountabilities:
Target
• Formulates competitive bids/estimates/quotations, taking into account best available product mix and appropriate technical and commercial considerations for each individual situation.
• Ensures tenders are well documented in a timely manner and with appropriate level of detail, including full and accurate costs.
Preparation

• Manages the preparation of all technical (e.g. defining the most suitable technology and product type(s)), financial (e.g. total price sheet, cash flow analysis) and if necessary project management (e.g. quantifies hours of engineering and commissioning) aspects of the bid/estimate/quotation, indicating prices and trading conditions.
Coordination
• In accordance with bid/estimate/quotation planning, ensures that inputs for editing activities are provided on time and according to established quality procedures.
• Manages external services to support bid/estimation preparation such as translations and governmental approvals.
Documentation
• Collects and archives documentation regarding the offer/order and records assumptions and decisions taken during the development process.
• Regularly reports the status of the bids/estimates/quotations using defined tools and collects and analyses the reasons for tenders being lost and won.
Risk
• Identifies potential risks in the bids, quotations and estimates, and in any related contract agreements across customers/channels.
• Provides information and/or participates in the Risk Review process in accordance with ABB policy.
Information coordination
• Responsible for collecting and collating all information needed to prepare the proposal, including both technical and cost elements.
Customer relations
• Establishes and maintains effective customer relationships to understand customer needs.
• Ensures a positive customer experience throughout the sales process.

• Provides any necessary technical support to Sales Managers during technical meetings with customers.","估算人員,專案經理,內業工程師",待遇面議,全職,台北市內湖區,不需負擔管理責任,需出差，一年累積時間未定,日班,依公司規定,不限,1人,5年以上,大學以上,不拘,英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,不拘,不拘,"- 其他：• +5 years for electrical tendering management

【 EAP員工協助方案】提供24小時外部專業諮詢服務，守護同仁及眷屬身心健康
【 VIOCE員工建議箱】鼓勵員工署名或匿名表達心聲與提供建議，共同打造良好環境
【健康促進】健康促進講座、運動及各項保健宣導
【志工關懷】每位同仁一年8小時給薪志工假，志工服務彈性選擇
【多元共融】委員會定期舉辦訓練、講座及活動，促進性別、年齡、種族、身心障礙及性傾向多元共融
【安全先行】安全促進宣導及行動、員工安全提報建議，打造職場安全環境
【友善環境】孕婦專屬停車位、哺乳室、性別友善廁所
== 暢快學習，發展不設限 ==
【專業職能精進】專業職能課程，技術證照以及定期回訓補助、英文學習補助
【領導力培育】因應不同職級需求，量身打造國內外領導力培訓課程
【內部傳承學習】內部種子講師團隊年度徵選、培訓及回訓補助
【多元企業大學】 線上學習系統，豐富學習資源隨身帶著走
【SPRINT Program】新進人員到職90天學程，入職夥伴(Buddy)支持
== 鼓勵高績效文化，關注職涯發展與表揚 ==
【薪酬獎金】每年定期檢視薪資結構、依個人績效及公司年度運營成果發放年度獎金
【職能晉級路徑】供應鏈及設備服務技術職能晉級路徑與年度評核
【職涯機會無設限】鼓勵職務輪調，提供內部職缺申請、人才調遷補助與人才推薦獎勵

2024/01/12,Microfluidic Engineer  / 微流機構工程師,生德奈生物科技股份有限公司,"Your Challenges:
1. Evaluates mechanical and electromechanical systems and products by designing and conducting research programs and applying principles of microfluidic, mechanics, hydraulics, and materials.
2. Design or redesign mechanical and electromechanical devices using analysis and computer-aided design plans.
3. Generate working prototypes for beta testing and customer demonstration.
4. Ensure the project timeline is met and the project stays within budget.
5. Coordinate research partners and cross-countries teams between Taiwan and Germany.
6. Plan and execute cell culture related experiments for product evaluation.
職務內容:
(1) 負責產品機構/機電系統設計與結構評估，包含微流體、機構、液壓和材料設計。
(2) 使用相關分析及輔助軟體來進行產品機構及機電系統設計。
(3) 試產prototype產品，並且透過客戶初步測試反饋修正產品設計。
(4) 掌握設計成本與開發時間。
(5) 擔任台灣與德國之間，以及跨國研究團隊之間溝通合作的協調角色。
(6) 規劃並執行細胞培養應用實驗、評估和驗證產品可行性。
Your Qualifications:

1. A minimum of three years in mechanical/microfluidic engineering for scientific laboratory products; candidates with experiences in the biotech market will be advantaged; Interest in biotech industry; Self-motivation for product development.
2. Experience using CAD software such as ProE, SolidWorks, AutoCAD, or similar.
3. Ability to define problems, collect data, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions independently.
4. Familiar with multidisciplinary collaboration Engineering vs Biology.
5. Open and collaborative style; must be comfortable working in an environment where ideas are shared and challenged.
6. Fluent in English or German is a must.
應徵條件:
(1) 機械/微流工程相關領域至少3年產品實驗經歷，能獨立開發產品，對生物技術產業有興趣，具備生物技術市場經歷加分。
(2) CAD/CAM繪圖技能，如ProE, SolidWorks, AutoCAD。
(3) 具備獨立思考、收集分析、解決問題能力。
(4) 熟悉工程和生物科學之間的跨領域整合。
(5) 能面對新挑戰、善於協調溝通。
(6) 精通英語或德語。
We offer:
。Cutting-edge technology in the fields of microtechnology, automation, software, and biotech.
。A unique opportunity to learn from both our German and Taiwanese team
。Personal development possibilities in a fast-growing and ambitious company
。Competitive salary package.

You are not expected to know everything, but you must be passionate, inspired, and persistent about solving problems and achieving your best. If you are a team player who always goes the extra mile, finds the most efficient solution, takes ownership of your work, and wants to be a part of the most ambitious team in the life sciences, then you might be the one we are looking for!","機構工程師,其他特殊工程師",待遇面議,全職,台北市信義區,不需負擔管理責任,無需出差外派,日班,週休二日,不限,1人,3年以上,大學以上,"電機電子工程相關,機械工程相關","英文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通,德文--聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通","AutoCAD,Pro/E,SolidWorks",繪製2D／3D模具設計圖,,"- 福利制度：1. 週休二日，彈性管理

2024/01/12,Sales Manager,生德奈生物科技股份有限公司,"The Sales Manager is responsible to achieve and exceed sales and financial targets through effective management of direct and indirect sales channels, as well as working with various stakeholders to obtain the desired results.

The Sales Manager has an in-depth understanding of the life sciences market and the customers within the territory and is committed to delivering the targets and the achievement of growth. This position should establish goals and objectives, measure performance, and analyze the potential for improvement.
Responsibilities:
1.Manage the sales activity of innovative products portfolio with high-throughput screening applications and cell-based assays mainly (but not limited) in the Taiwan area.
2.Ensure achievement of sales targets on a monthly, quarterly, and yearly basis.
3.Provide accurate and timely forecasts.
4.Support the annual strategic planning development and execution.
5.Design and implement a strategic business plan that expands the company’s customer base and ensures its strong presence.
6.Regularly communicate the status of its sales organization and current market condition to leadership, direct Report to CEO and Group’s APAC sales director.
7.Build and promote strong, long-lasting customer relationships by partnering with them and understanding their needs.
8.Visit customers regularly to promote strategic relationships and to identify new business opportunities and market shifts. Implement and manage an optimal sales organization.
9.Achieve customer satisfaction, customer-centric focus, and deliver high-quality business solutions.
10.Collaborate with the marketing team and establish all necessary activities to ensure the success of the organization.
11. Proactively works with other functions to drive efficient support for customers.
Desired Skills and Experience
(A) Minimum a bachelor's degree in life science or other related fields. An advanced degree is a plus.
(B) At least 5+ years experience in the field, with strong business sense and industry expertise.
(C) Fluent in English and Mandarin, able to communicate and present smoothly.
(D) Experience with cell-based assays, drug discovery and/or cell culture preferred
(E) Passionate about technology and laboratory automation
(F) Experienced in expanding business and growing market share, consistently meeting or exceeding targets, successful previous experience as a sales representative or sales manager.
(G) Demonstrated ability to communicate, present and influence credibly and effectively at all levels of the organization.

。Cutting-edge technology in the fields of microtechnology, automation, software, and biotech.
